  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-744">應用程式防護設定原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-744">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-745">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-745">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-746">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-746">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-747">應用程式防護容器 Proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-747">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-748">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-748">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-749">Windows 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-749">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-750">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-750">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-751">設定 Microsoft Edge 應用程式防護的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-751">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-752">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 應用程式防護會忽略 Proxy 設定的其他來源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-752">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-753">如果未設定此原則，Microsoft Edge 應用程式防護會使用主機的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-753">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-754">此原則不會影響應用程式防護 (主機上) 以外 Microsoft Edge 的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-754">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-755">ProxyMode 欄位可讓您指定 Microsoft Edge 應用程式防護所使用的 Proxy 伺服器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-755">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-756">ProxyPacUrl 欄位是 Proxy .pac 檔案的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-756">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-757">ProxyServer 欄位是 Proxy 伺服器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-757">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-758">如果選擇 'direct' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會忽略所有其他欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-758">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-759">如果選擇 'auto_detect' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會忽略所有其他欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-759">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-760">如果選擇 'fixed_servers' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會使用 'ProxyServer' 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-760">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-761">如果選擇 'pac_script' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會使用 'ProxyPacUrl' 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-761">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-762">如需透過雙 Proxy 識別應用程式防護流量的詳細資訊，請造訪 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-762">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-763">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-763">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-764">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-764">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-765">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-765">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-766">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-766">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-767">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-767">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-768">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-768">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-769">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-769">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-770">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-770">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-771">GP 唯一名稱：ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-771">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-772">GP 名稱：應用程式防護容器 Proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-772">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-773">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/應用程式防護設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-773">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-774">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-774">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-775">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-775">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-776">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-776">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-777">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-777">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-778">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-778">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-779">數值名稱：ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-779">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-780">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-780">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-781">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-781">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-783">投射原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-783">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-784">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-784">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-785">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-785">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-786">啟用 Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-786">Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-787">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-787">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-788">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-788">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-789">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-789">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-790">啟用此原則以啟用 Google Cast。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-790">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-791">使用者將可以從應用程式功能表、網頁內容功能表、已啟用投射的網站上的媒體控制項和 (如有顯示) 投射工具列圖示啟動它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-791">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-792">停用此原則可停用 Google Cast。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-792">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-793">根據預設，Google Cast 將會啟用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-793">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-794">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-794">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-795">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-795">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-796">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-796">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-797">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-797">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-798">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-798">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-799">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-799">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-800">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-800">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-801">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-801">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-802">GP 唯一名稱：EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-802">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-803">GP 名稱：啟用 Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-803">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-804">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/投射</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-804">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-805">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-805">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-806">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-806">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-807">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-807">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-808">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-808">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-809">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-809">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-810">數值名稱：EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-810">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-811">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-811">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-812">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-812">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-813">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-813">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-814">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-814">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-815">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-815">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-816">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-816">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-817">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-817">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-818">在工具列中顯示投射圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-818">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-819">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-819">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-820">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-820">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-821">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-821">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-822">將此原則設定為 true 即可在工具列或溢位功能表顯示投射工具列圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-822">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-823">使用者將無法移除它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-823">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-824">如果未設定或停用此原則，則使用者可使用圖示的關聯式功能表來釘選或移除圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-824">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-825">如果您也將 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 原則設定為 false，則會忽略此原則，且不會顯示工具列圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-825">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-826">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-826">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-827">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-827">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-828">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-828">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-829">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-829">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-830">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-830">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-831">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-831">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-832">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-832">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-833">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-833">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-834">GP 唯一名稱：ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-834">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-835">GP 名稱：在工具列中顯示投射圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-835">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-836">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/投射</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-836">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-837">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-837">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-838">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-838">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-839">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-839">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-840">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-840">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-841">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-841">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-842">數值名稱：ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-842">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-843">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-843">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-844">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-844">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-845">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-845">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-846">喜好設定機碼名稱：ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-846">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-847">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-847">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-848">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-848">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-849">內容設定原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-849">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-850">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-850">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-851">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-851">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-852">自動選取這些網站的用戶端憑證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-852">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-853">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-853">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-854">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-854">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-855">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-855">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-856">根據 URL 模式指定網站清單，Microsoft Edge 應為其自動選擇用戶端憑證 (如果網站要求)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-856">Specify a list of sites, based on URL patterns, for which Microsoft Edge should automatically select a client certificate, if the site requests one.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-857">該值必須是 JSON 字典字串化的陣列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-857">The value must be an array of stringified JSON dictionaries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-858">每個字典的格式必須為 { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }，其中 $URL_PATTERN 是內容設定模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-858">Each dictionary must have the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-859">$FILTER 會限制瀏覽器要自動選擇哪個用戶端憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-859">$FILTER restricts from which client certificates the browser will automatically select.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-860">與篩選器無關，僅選擇與伺服器憑證要求相符的憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-860">Independent of the filter, only certificates will be selected that match the server's certificate request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-861">例如，如果 $FILTER 的格式為{ "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }，則僅選擇由具有 CommonName $ISSUER_CN 的憑證所發佈的用戶端憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-861">For example, if $FILTER has the form { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, additionally only client certificates are selected that are issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-862">如果 $FILTER 包含 "ISSUER" 和 "SUBJECT" 部分，用戶端憑證必須同時滿足兩個要選擇的條件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-862">If $FILTER contains an "ISSUER" and a "SUBJECT" section, a client certificate must satisfy both conditions to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-863">如果 $FILTER 指定一個組織 ("O")，則憑證必須具有至少一個與要選擇的指定值相符的組織。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-863">If $FILTER specifies an organization ("O"), a certificate must have at least one organization which matches the specified value to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-864">如果 $FILTER 指定組織單位 ("OU")，則憑證必須具有至少一個與要選擇的指定值相符的組織單位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-864">If $FILTER specifies an organization unit ("OU"), a certificate must have at least one organization unit which matches the specified value to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-865">如果 $FILTER 為空字典 {}，則用戶端憑證的選擇沒有任何其他限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-865">If $FILTER is the empty dictionary {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-866">如果未設定此原則，則所有網站皆不會進行自動選擇。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-866">If you don't configure this policy, auto-selection isn't done for any site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-867">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-867">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-868">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-868">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-869">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-869">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-870">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-870">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-871">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-871">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-872">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-872">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-873">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-873">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-874">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-874">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-875">GP 唯一名稱：AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-875">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-876">GP 名稱：自動選取這些網站的用戶端憑證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-876">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-877">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-877">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-878">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-878">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-879">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-879">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-880">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-880">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-881">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-881">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-882">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-882">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-883">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-883">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-884">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-884">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-885">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-885">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-886">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-886">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-887">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-887">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-888">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-888">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-889">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-889">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-890">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-890">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-891">允許特定網站上的 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-891">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-892">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-892">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-893">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-893">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-894">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-894">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-895">根據 URL 的模式，定義允許設定 Cookie 的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-895">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-896">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-896">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-897">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-897">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-898">請注意，這三個原則之間不可有衝突的 URL 模式設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-898">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-899">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-899">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-900">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-900">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-901">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-901">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-902">若要避免在結束時刪除 Cookie，請設定 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-902">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-903">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-903">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-904">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-904">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-905">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-905">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-906">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-906">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-907">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-907">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-908">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-908">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-909">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-909">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-910">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-910">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-911">GP 唯一名稱：CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-911">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-912">GP 名稱：允許特定網站上的 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-912">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-913">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-913">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-914">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-914">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-915">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-915">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-916">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-916">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-917">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-917">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-918">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-918">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-919">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-919">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-920">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-920">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-921">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-921">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-922">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-922">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-923">喜好設定機碼名稱：CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-923">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-924">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-924">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-925">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-925">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-926">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-926">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-927">封鎖特定網站上的 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-927">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-928">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-928">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-929">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-929">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-930">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-930">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-931">根據 URL 的模式，定義無法設定 Cookie 的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-931">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-932">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-932">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-933">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-933">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-934">請注意，這三個原則之間不可有衝突的 URL 模式設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-934">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-935">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-935">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-936">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-936">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-937">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-937">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-938">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-938">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-939">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-939">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-940">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-940">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-941">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-941">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-942">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-942">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-943">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-943">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-944">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-944">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-945">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-945">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-946">GP 唯一名稱：CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-946">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-947">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-947">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-948">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-948">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-949">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-949">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-950">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-950">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-951">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-951">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-952">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-952">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-953">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-953">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-954">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-954">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-955">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-955">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-956">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-956">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-957">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-957">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-958">喜好設定機碼名稱：CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-958">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-959">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-959">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-960">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-960">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-961">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-961">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-962">限制來自特定網站的 Cookie 匯入目前的工作階段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-962">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-963">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-963">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-964">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-964">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-965">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-965">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-966">工作階段結束 (關閉視窗) 時，會刪除由符合您所定義 URL 模式的網站建立的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-966">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-967">由不符合模式的網站建立的 Cookie 會由 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或由使用者個人設定控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-967">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-968">如果未設定此原則，則這也是預設行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-968">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-969">如果 Microsoft Edge 正以背景模式執行，當最後一個視窗關閉時，則工作階段可能會停止執行，這表示視窗關閉時將不會清除 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-969">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-970">如需將 Microsoft Edge 設定在背景模式中執行時會發生之情況的詳細資訊，請參閱 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-970">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-971">您也可以使用 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 原則，以控制哪些網站可以建立 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-971">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-972">請注意，這三個原則之間不可有衝突的 URL 模式設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-972">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-973">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-973">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-974">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-974">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-975">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-975">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-976">如果將 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 原則設定為從先前的工作階段還原 URL，即會忽略此原則，並為這些網站永久儲存 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-976">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-977">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-977">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-978">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-979">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-980">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-981">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-981">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-982">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-982">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-983">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-983">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-984">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-985">GP 唯一名稱：CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-985">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-986">GP 名稱：限制來自特定網站的 Cookie 匯入目前的工作階段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-986">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-987">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-988">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-989">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-990">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-991">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-992">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-993">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-993">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-994">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-994">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-995">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-995">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-996">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-997">喜好設定機碼名稱：CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-997">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-998">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-999">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-999">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1000">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1000">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1001">設定 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1001">Configure cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1002">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1002">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1003">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1003">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1004">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1004">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1005">控制網站是否可在使用者的裝置上建立 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1005">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1006">此原則為全部或皆不 - 您可以讓所有網站建立 Cookie，或不讓任何網站建立 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1006">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1007">您無法使用此原則來啟用來自特定網站的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1007">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1008">將原則設定為 'SessionOnly'，以在工作階段關閉時清除 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1008">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1009">如果 Microsoft Edge 正以背景模式執行，當最後一個視窗關閉時，則工作階段可能會停止執行，這表示視窗關閉時將不會清除 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1009">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1010">如需將 Microsoft Edge 設定在背景模式中執行時會發生之情況的詳細資訊，請參閱 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1010">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1011">如果未設定此原則，則會使用預設值 'AllowCookies'，且使用者可以在 Microsoft Edge 設定中變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1011">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1012">(如果您不希望使用者能夠變更此設定，請設定原則。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1012">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1013">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1013">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1014">AllowCookies (1) = 讓所有網站建立 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1014">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1015">BlockCookies (2) = 不要讓任何網站建立 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1015">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1016">SessionOnly (4) = 在工作階段期間保留 Cookie，[SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 中所列的項目除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1016">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1017">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1017">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1018">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1018">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1019">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1019">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1020">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1020">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1021">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1021">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1022">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1022">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1023">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1023">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1024">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1024">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1025">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1025">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1026">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1026">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1027">GP 名稱：設定 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1027">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1028">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1028">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1029">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1029">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1030">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1030">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1031">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1031">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1032">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1032">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1033">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1033">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1034">數值名稱：DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1034">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1035">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1035">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1036">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1036">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1037">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1037">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1038">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1038">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1039">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1039">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1040">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1040">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1041">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1041">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1042">控制檔案系统 API 的讀取使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1042">Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1043">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1043">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1044">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1044">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1045">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1045">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1046">如果將此原則設定為 3，則網站可以使用檔案系統 API 請求對主機作業系統檔案系統的讀取存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1046">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for read access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1047">如果將此原則設為2，存取權會遭到拒絕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1047">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1048">如果未設定此原則，網站可以要求存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1048">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1049">使用者可以變更這個設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1049">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1050">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1050">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1051">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = 不允許任何網站透過檔案系統 API 要求對檔案和目錄的讀取存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1051">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Don't allow any site to request read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1052">BlockFileSystemRead (3) = 允許網站要求使用者透過檔案系統 API 授予對檔案和目錄的讀存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1052">AskFileSystemRead (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1053">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1053">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1054">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1054">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1055">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1055">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1056">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1056">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1057">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1057">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1058">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1058">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1059">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1059">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1060">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1060">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1061">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1061">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1062">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1062">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1063">GP 名稱：控制檔案系统 API 的讀取使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1063">GP name: Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1064">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1064">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1065">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1065">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1066">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1066">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1067">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1067">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1068">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1068">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1069">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1069">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1070">值名稱：DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1070">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1071">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1071">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1072">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1072">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1073">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1073">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1074">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1074">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1075">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1075">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1076">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1076">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1077">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1077">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1078">控制檔案系統 API 的寫入使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1078">Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1079">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1079">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1080">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1080">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1081">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1081">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1082">如果將此原則設定為 3，則網站可以使用檔案系統 API 請求對主機作業系統檔案系統的寫入存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1082">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for write access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1083">如果將此原則設為2，存取權會遭到拒絕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1083">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1084">如果未設定此原則，網站可以要求存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1084">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1085">使用者可以變更這個設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1085">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1086">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1086">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1087">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = 不允許任何網站要求對檔案和目錄的寫入存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1087">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Don't allow any site to request write access to files and directories</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1088">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = 允許網站要求使用者授予對檔案和目錄的寫入存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1088">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant write access to files and directories</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1089">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1089">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1090">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1090">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1091">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1091">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1092">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1092">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1093">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1093">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1094">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1094">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1095">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1095">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1096">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1096">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1097">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1097">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1098">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1098">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1099">GP 名稱：控制檔案系统 API 的寫入使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1099">GP name: Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1100">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1100">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1101">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1101">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1102">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1102">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1103">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1103">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1104">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1104">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1105">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1105">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1106">值名稱：DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1106">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1107">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1107">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1108">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1108">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1109">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1109">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1110">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultFileSystmWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1110">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1111">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1111">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1112">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1112">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1113">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1113">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1114">預設地理位置設定值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1114">Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1115">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1115">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1116">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1116">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1117">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1117">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1118">設定網站是否可追蹤使用者的實體位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1118">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1119">您可以預設允許追蹤 ('AllowGeolocation')、預設拒絕 ('BlockGeolocation')，或在每次網站要求其位置時詢問使用者 ('AskGeolocation')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1119">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1120">如果未設定此原則，則會使用 'AskGeolocation'，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1120">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1121">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1121">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1122">AllowGeolocation (1) = 允許網站追蹤使用者的實體位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1122">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1123">BlockGeolocation (2) = 不允許任何網站追蹤使用者的實體位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1123">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1124">AskGeolocation (3) = 在網站要追蹤使用者的實體位置時詢問使用者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1124">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1125">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1125">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1126">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1126">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1127">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1127">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1128">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1128">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1129">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1129">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1130">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1130">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1131">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1131">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1132">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1132">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1133">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1133">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1134">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1134">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1135">GP 名稱：預設地理位置設定值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1135">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1136">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1136">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1137">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1137">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1138">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1138">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1139">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1139">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1140">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1140">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1141">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1141">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1142">數值名稱：DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1142">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1143">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1143">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1144">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1144">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1145">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1145">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1146">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1146">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1147">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1147">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1148">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1148">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1149">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1149">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1150">預設影像設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1150">Default images setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1151">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1151">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1152">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1152">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1153">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1153">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1154">設定網站是否可以顯示影像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1154">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1155">您可以在所有網站上允許影像 ('AllowImages')，或在所有網站上封鎖影像 ('BlockImages')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1155">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1156">如果未設定此原則，則預設會允許顯示影像，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1156">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1157">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1157">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1158">AllowImages (1) = 允許所有網站顯示所有影像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1158">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1159">BlockImages (2) = 不允許任何網站顯示影像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1159">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1160">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1160">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1161">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1161">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1162">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1162">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1163">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1163">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1164">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1164">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1165">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1165">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1166">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1166">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1167">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1167">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1168">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1168">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1169">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1169">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1170">GP 名稱：預設影像設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1170">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1171">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1171">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1172">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1172">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1173">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1173">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1174">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1174">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1175">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1175">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1176">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1176">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1177">數值名稱：DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1177">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1178">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1178">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1179">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1179">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1180">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1180">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1181">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1181">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1182">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1182">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
