  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1183">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1183">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1184">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1184">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1185">控制不安全內容例外狀況的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1185">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1186">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1186">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1187">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1187">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1188">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1188">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1189">允許您設定使用者是否可以新增例外，以允許特定網站的混合內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1189">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1190">可以針對使用 [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) 和 [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) 原則的特定 URL 模式覆寫此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1190">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1191">如果未設定此原則，使用者將可以新增例外，以允許可封鎖的混合內容，並停用選擇性可封鎖混合內容的自動升級。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1191">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1192">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1192">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1193">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 不允許任何網站載入混合內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1193">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1194">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = 允許使用者新增例外，以允許混合內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1194">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1195">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1195">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1196">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1196">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1197">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1197">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1198">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1198">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1199">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1199">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1200">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1200">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1201">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1201">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1202">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1202">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1203">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1203">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1204">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1204">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1205">GP 名稱：控制不安全內容例外狀況的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1205">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1206">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1206">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1207">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1207">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1208">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1208">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1209">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1209">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1210">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1210">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1211">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1211">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1212">數值名稱：DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1212">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1213">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1213">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1214">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1214">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1215">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1215">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1216">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1216">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1217">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1217">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1218">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1218">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1219">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1219">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1220">預設 JavaScript 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1220">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1221">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1221">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1222">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1222">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1223">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1223">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1224">設定網站是否可以執行 JavaScript。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1224">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1225">您可以為所有網站允許 ('AllowJavaScript') 或為所有網站封鎖 ('BlockJavaScript')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1225">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1226">如果未設定此原則，則預設為所有網站都可以執行 JavaScript，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1226">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1227">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1227">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1228">AllowJavaScript (1) = 允許所有網站執行 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1228">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1229">BlockJavaScript (2) = 不允許任何網站執行 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1229">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1230">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1230">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1231">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1231">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1232">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1232">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1233">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1233">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1234">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1234">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1235">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1235">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1236">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1236">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1237">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1237">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1238">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1238">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1239">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1239">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1240">GP 名稱：預設 JavaScript 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1240">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1241">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1241">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1242">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1242">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1243">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1243">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1244">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1244">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1245">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1245">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1246">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1246">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1247">數值名稱：DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1247">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1248">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1248">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1249">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1249">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1250">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1250">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1251">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1251">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1252">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1252">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1253">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1253">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1254">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1254">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1255">預設通知設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1255">Default notification setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1256">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1256">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1257">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1257">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1258">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1258">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1259">設定網站是否可以顯示桌面通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1259">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1260">您可以預設允許 ('AllowNotifications')、預設拒絕 ('BlockNotifications')，或在每次網站想要顯示通知時詢問使用者 ('AskNotifications')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1260">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1261">如果未設定此原則，則預設為允許顯示通知，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1261">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1262">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1262">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1263">AllowNotifications (1) = 允許網站顯示桌面通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1263">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1264">BlockNotifications (2) = 不允許任何網站顯示桌面通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1264">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1265">AskNotifications (3) = 每次網站想要顯示桌面通知時詢問</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1265">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1266">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1266">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1267">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1267">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1268">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1268">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1269">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1269">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1270">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1270">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1271">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1271">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1272">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1272">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1273">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1273">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1274">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1274">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1275">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1275">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1276">GP 名稱：預設通知設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1276">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1277">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1277">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1278">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1278">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1279">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1279">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1280">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1280">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1281">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1281">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1282">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1282">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1283">數值名稱：DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1283">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1284">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1284">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1285">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1285">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1286">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1286">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1287">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1287">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1288">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1288">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1289">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1289">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1290">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1290">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1291">預設 Adobe Flash 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1291">Default Adobe Flash setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1292">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1292">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1293">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1293">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1294">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1294">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1295">首先檢查的是 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls)，然後才是此項原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1295">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1296">選項為 'ClickToPlay' 和 'BlockPlugins'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1296">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1297">如果您將此原則設為 'BlockPlugins'，則所有網站皆會拒絕這個外掛程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1297">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1298">'ClickToPlay' 可讓 Flash 外掛程式開始執行，但使用者可以按一下預留位置以啟動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1298">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1299">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以手動變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1299">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

                                                                                     

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1300">注意：自動播放只適用於在 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 原則中明確列出的網域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1300">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1301">若要開啟所有網站的自動播放功能，請將 http://\* 及 https://\* 新增至 URLs 的允許清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1301">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1302">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1302">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1303">BlockPlugins (2) = 封鎖 Adobe Flash 外掛程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1303">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1304">ClickToPlay (3) = 按一下以播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1304">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1305">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1305">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1306">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1306">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1307">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1307">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1308">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1308">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1309">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1309">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1310">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1310">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1311">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1311">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1312">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1312">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1313">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1313">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1314">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1314">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1315">GP 名稱：預設 Adobe Flash 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1315">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1316">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1316">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1317">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1317">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1318">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1318">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1319">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1319">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1320">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1320">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1321">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1321">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1322">數值名稱：DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1322">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1323">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1323">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1324">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1324">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1325">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1325">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1326">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1326">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1327">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1327">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1328">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1328">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1329">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1329">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1330">預設快顯視窗設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1330">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1331">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1331">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1332">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1332">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1333">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1333">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1334">設定網站是否可以顯示快顯視窗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1334">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1335">您可以在所有網站上允許 ('AllowPopups')，或在所有網站上封鎖 ('BlockPopups')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1335">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1336">如果未設定此原則，則預設會封鎖快顯視窗，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1336">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1337">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1337">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1338">AllowPopups (1) = 允許所有網站顯示快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1338">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1339">BlockPopups (2) = 不允許任何網站顯示快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1339">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1340">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1340">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1341">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1341">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1342">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1342">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1343">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1343">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1344">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1344">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1345">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1345">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1346">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1346">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1347">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1347">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1348">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1348">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1349">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1349">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1350">GP 名稱：預設快顯視窗設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1350">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1351">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1351">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1352">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1352">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1353">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1353">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1354">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1354">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1355">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1355">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1356">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1356">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1357">數值名稱：DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1357">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1358">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1358">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1359">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1359">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1360">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1360">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1361">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1361">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1362">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1362">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1363">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1363">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1364">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1364">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1365">控制 Web 藍牙 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1365">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1366">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1366">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1367">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1367">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1368">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1368">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1369">控制網站是否能夠存取附近的藍牙裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1369">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1370">您可以完全封鎖或存取權或要求網站在每次想要存取藍牙裝置時詢問使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1370">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1371">如果未設定此原則，則會使用預設值 (AskWebBluetooth'，表示每次都詢問使用者)，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1371">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1372">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1372">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1373">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = 不允許任何網站使用 Web Bluetooth API 來要求存取藍牙裝置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1373">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1374">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 允許網站要求使用者授與附近藍牙裝置存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1374">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1375">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1375">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1376">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1376">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1377">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1377">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1378">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1378">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1379">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1379">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1380">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1380">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1381">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1381">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1382">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1382">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1383">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1383">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1384">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1384">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1385">GP 名稱：控制 Web 藍牙 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1385">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1386">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1386">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1387">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1387">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1388">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1388">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1389">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1389">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1390">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1390">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1391">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1391">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1392">數值名稱：DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1392">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1393">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1393">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1394">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1394">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1395">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1395">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1396">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1396">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1397">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1397">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1398">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1398">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1399">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1399">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1400">控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1400">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1401">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1401">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1402">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1402">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1403">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1403">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1404">設定網站是否能夠存取連接的 USB 裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1404">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1405">您可以完全封鎖存取或在每次網站想要取得連接的 USB 裝置的存取時詢問使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1405">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1406">您可以使用 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 和 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 原則來針對特定 URL 模式覆寫此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1406">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1407">如果未設定此原則，則預設為網站可以詢問使用者是否可以存取連接的 USB 裝置 ('AskWebUsb')，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1407">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1408">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1408">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1409">BlockWebUsb (2) = 不允許任何網站透過 WebUSB API 要求存取 USB 裝置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1409">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1410">AskWebUsb (3) = 允許網站詢問使用者，以授與連接的 USB 裝置之存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1410">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1411">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1411">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1412">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1412">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1413">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1413">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1414">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1414">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1415">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1415">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1416">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1416">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1417">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1417">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1418">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1418">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1419">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1419">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1420">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1420">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1421">GP 名稱：控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1421">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1422">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1422">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1423">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1423">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1424">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1424">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1425">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1425">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1426">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1426">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1427">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1427">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1428">數值名稱：DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1428">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1429">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1429">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1430">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1430">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1431">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1431">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1432">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1432">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1433">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1433">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1434">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1434">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1435">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1435">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1436">允許透過這些網站上的檔案系統 API 讀取存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1436">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1437">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1437">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1438">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1438">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1439">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1439">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1440">透過設定原則，您可以列出URL模式，這些模式指定哪些網站可以要求使用者透過檔案系統 API 授予他們對主機作業系統檔案系統中的檔案或目錄的讀取存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1440">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1441">未設定原則意味著 [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) 將套用於所有網站（如果已設定）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1441">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1442">否則將套用使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1442">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1443">URL 模式無法與 [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls) 相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1443">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1444">如果URL與兩者都相符，則兩個原則都不優先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1444">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1445">如需有效 url 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1445">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1446">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1446">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1447">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1448">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1448">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1449">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1450">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1450">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1451">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1451">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1452">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1452">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1453">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1454">GP 唯一名稱：FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1454">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1455">GP 名稱：允許透過這些網站上的檔案系統 API 讀取存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1455">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1456">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1457">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1457">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1458">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1459">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1460">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1461">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1461">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1462">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1462">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1463">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1463">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1464">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1464">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1465">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1465">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1466">喜好設定機碼名稱：FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1466">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1467">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1467">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1468">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1468">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1469">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1469">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1470">封鎖透過這些網站上的檔案系統 API 讀取存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1470">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1471">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1471">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1472">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1472">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1473">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1473">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1474">如果設定此原則，您可以列出URL模式，這些模式指定哪些網站可以要求使用者透過檔案系統 API 授予他們對主機作業系統檔案系統中的檔案或目錄的讀存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1474">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1475">如果您不設定此原則，[DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) 將套用於所有網站（如果已設定）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1475">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1476">否則將套用使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1476">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1477">URL 模式無法與 [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls) 相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1477">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1478">如果URL與兩者都相符，則兩個原則都不優先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1478">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1479">如需有效 url 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1479">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1480">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1480">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1481">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1481">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1482">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1482">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1483">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1483">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1484">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1484">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1485">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1485">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1486">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1486">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1487">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1487">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1488">GP 唯一名稱：FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1488">GP unique name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1489">GP 名稱：封鎖透過這些網站上的檔案系統 API 讀取存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1489">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1490">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1490">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1491">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1491">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1492">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1492">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1493">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1493">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1494">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1494">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1495">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1495">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1496">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1496">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1497">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1497">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1498">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1498">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1499">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1499">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1500">喜好設定機碼名稱：FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1500">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1501">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1501">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1503">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1503">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1504">允許這些網站上的檔案和目錄的寫入存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1504">Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1505">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1505">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1506">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1506">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1507">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1507">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1508">如果設定此原則，您可以列出URL模式，這些模式指定哪些網站可以要求使用者授予他們對主機作業系統檔案系統中的檔案或目錄的寫入取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1508">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1509">如果您不設定此原則，[DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) 將套用於所有網站（如果已設定）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1509">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1510">否則將套用使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1510">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1511">URL 模式無法與 [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls) 相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1511">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1512">如果URL與兩者都相符，則兩個原則都不優先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1512">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1513">如需有效 url 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1513">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1514">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1514">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1515">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1515">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1516">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1516">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1517">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1517">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1518">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1518">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1519">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1519">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1520">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1520">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1521">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1521">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1522">GP 唯一名稱：FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1522">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1523">GP 名稱：允許這些網站上的檔案和目錄的寫入存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1523">GP name: Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1524">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1524">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1525">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1525">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1526">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1526">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1527">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1527">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1528">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1528">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1529">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1529">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1530">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1530">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1531">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1531">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1532">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1532">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1533">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1533">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1534">喜好設定機碼名稱：FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1534">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1535">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1535">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
