  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1537">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1537">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1538">封鎖這些網站上的檔案和目錄的寫入存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1538">Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1539">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1539">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1540">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1540">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1541">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1541">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1542">如果設定此原則，您可以列出URL模式，這些模式指定哪些網站不可以要求使用者授予他們對主機作業系統檔案系統中的檔案或目錄的寫入取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1542">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1543">如果您不設定此原則，[DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) 將套用於所有網站（如果已設定）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1543">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1544">否則將套用使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1544">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1545">URL 模式無法與 [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls) 相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1545">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1546">如果URL與兩者都相符，則兩個原則都不優先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1546">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1547">如需有效 url 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1547">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1548">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1548">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1549">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1549">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1550">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1550">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1551">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1551">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1552">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1552">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1553">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1553">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1554">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1554">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1555">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1555">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1556">GP 唯一名稱：FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1556">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1557">GP 名稱：封鎖這些網站上的檔案和目錄的寫入存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1557">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1558">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1558">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1559">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1559">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1560">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1560">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1561">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1561">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1562">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1562">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1563">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1563">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1564">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1564">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1565">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1565">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1566">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1566">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1567">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1567">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1568">喜好設定機碼名稱：FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1568">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1569">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1569">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1570">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1570">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1571">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1571">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1572">允許這些網站上的影像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1572">Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1573">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1573">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1574">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1574">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1575">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1575">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1576">根據 URL 的模式，定義可顯示影像的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1576">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1577">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1577">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1578">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1578">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1579">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1579">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1580">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1580">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1581">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1581">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1582">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1582">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1583">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1583">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1584">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1584">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1585">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1585">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1586">GP 唯一名稱：ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1586">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1587">GP 名稱：允許這些網站上的影像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1587">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1588">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1588">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1589">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1589">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1590">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1590">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1591">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1591">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1592">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1592">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1593">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1593">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1594">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1594">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1595">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1595">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1596">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1596">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1597">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1597">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1598">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1598">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1599">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1599">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1600">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1600">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1601">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1601">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1602">封鎖特定網站上的影像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1602">Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1603">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1603">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1604">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1604">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1605">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1605">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1606">根據 URL 的模式，定義不允許顯示影像的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1606">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1607">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1607">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1608">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1608">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1609">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1609">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1610">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1610">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1611">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1611">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1612">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1612">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1613">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1613">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1614">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1614">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1615">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1615">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1616">GP 唯一名稱：ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1616">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1617">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的影像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1617">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1618">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1618">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1619">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1619">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1620">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1620">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1621">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1621">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1622">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1622">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1623">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1623">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1624">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1624">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1625">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1625">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1626">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1626">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1627">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1627">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1628">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1628">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1629">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1629">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1630">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1630">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1631">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1631">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1632">允許指定網站上的不安全內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1632">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1633">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1633">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1634">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1634">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1635">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1635">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1636">建立 URL 模式的清單，以指定可顯示不安全混合內容 (即 HTTPS 網站上的 HTTP 內容) 的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1636">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1637">如果未設定此原則，則會封鎖可封鎖的混合內容，並升級選擇性可封鎖的混合內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1637">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1638">不過，將允許使用者設定例外，以允許特定網站的不安全混合內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1638">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1639">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1639">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1640">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1640">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1641">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1641">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1642">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1642">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1643">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1643">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1644">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1644">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1645">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1645">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1646">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1646">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1647">GP 唯一名稱：InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1647">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1648">GP 名稱：允許指定網站上的不安全內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1648">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1649">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1649">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1650">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1650">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1651">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1651">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1652">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1652">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1653">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1653">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1654">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1654">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1655">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1655">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1656">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1656">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1657">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1657">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1658">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1658">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1659">喜好設定機碼名稱：InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1659">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1660">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1660">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1661">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1661">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1662">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1662">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1663">封鎖指定網站上的不安全內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1663">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1664">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1664">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1665">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1665">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1666">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1666">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1667">建立 URL 模式的清單，以指定不允許顯示可封鎖 (即使用中) 混合內容 (即 HTTPS 網站上的 HTTP 內容) 的網站，並針對它將選擇性可封鎖混合內容升級停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1667">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1668">如果未設定此原則，則會封鎖可封鎖的混合內容，並升級選擇性可封鎖的混合內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1668">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1669">不過，將允許使用者設定例外，以允許特定網站的不安全混合內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1669">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1670">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1670">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1671">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1671">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1672">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1672">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1673">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1673">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1674">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1674">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1675">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1675">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1676">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1676">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1677">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1677">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1678">GP 唯一名稱：InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1678">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1679">GP 名稱：封鎖指定網站上的不安全內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1679">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1680">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1680">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1681">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1681">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1682">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1682">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1683">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1683">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1684">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1684">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1685">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1685">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1686">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1686">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1687">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1687">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1688">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1688">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1689">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1689">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1690">喜好設定機碼名稱：InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1690">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1691">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1691">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1692">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1692">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1693">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1693">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1694">允許特定網站上的 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1694">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1695">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1695">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1696">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1696">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1697">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1697">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1698">根據 URL 的模式，定義允許執行 JavaScript 的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1698">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1699">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1699">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1700">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1700">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1701">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1701">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1702">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1702">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1703">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1703">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1704">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1704">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1705">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1705">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1706">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1706">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1707">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1707">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1708">GP 唯一名稱：JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1708">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1709">GP 名稱：允許特定網站上的 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1709">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1710">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1710">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1711">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1711">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1712">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1712">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1713">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1713">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1714">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1714">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1715">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1715">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1716">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1716">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1717">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1717">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1718">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1718">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1719">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1719">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1720">喜好設定機碼名稱：JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1720">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1721">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1721">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1723">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1723">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1724">封鎖特定網站上的 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1724">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1725">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1725">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1726">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1726">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1727">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1727">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1728">根據 URL 的模式，定義不允許執行 JavaScript 的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1728">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1729">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1729">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1730">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1730">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1731">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1731">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1732">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1732">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1733">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1733">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1734">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1734">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1735">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1735">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1736">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1736">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1737">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1737">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1738">GP 唯一名稱：JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1738">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1739">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1739">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1740">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1740">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1741">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1741">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1742">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1742">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1743">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1743">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1744">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1744">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1745">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1745">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1746">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1746">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1747">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1747">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1748">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1748">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1749">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1749">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1750">喜好設定機碼名稱：JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1750">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1751">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1751">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1752">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1752">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1753">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1753">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1754">啟用預設舊版 SameSite Cookie 行為設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1754">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1755">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1755">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1756">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1756">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1757">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1757">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1758">讓您將所有 Cookie 還原為舊版 SameSite 行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1758">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1759">還原為舊版行為會導致未指定 SameSite 屬性的 Cookie 被視為 "SameSite=None"，並移除 "SameSite=None" Cookie 傳輸 "Secure" 屬性的需求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1759">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", and removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1760">如果未設定此原則，則未指定 SameSite 屬性的 Cookie 的預設行為，將取決於 SameSite-by-default 功能的其他設定來源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1760">If you don't set this policy, the default behavior for cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1761">此功能可能是由現場試驗或在 edge://flags 中啟用 same-site-by-default-cookies 旗標而設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1761">This feature might be set by a field trial or by enabling the same-site-by-default-cookies flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1762">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1762">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1763">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = 還原為所有網站上 Cookie 的舊版 SameSite 行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1763">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1764">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = 針對所有網站上 Cookie 使用預設的 SameSite 行為</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1764">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1765">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1765">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1766">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1766">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1767">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1767">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1768">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1768">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1769">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1769">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1770">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1770">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1771">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1771">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1772">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1772">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1773">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1773">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1774">GP 唯一名稱：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1774">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1775">GP 名稱：啟用預設舊版 SameSite Cookie 行為設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1775">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1776">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1776">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1777">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1777">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1778">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1778">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1779">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1779">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1780">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1780">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1781">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1781">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1782">數值名稱：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1782">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1783">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1783">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1784">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1784">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1785">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1785">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1786">喜好設定機碼名稱：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1786">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1787">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1787">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1788">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1788">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1789">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1789">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1790">將指定網站上的 Cookie 還原至舊版 SameSite 行為</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1790">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1791">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1791">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1792">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1792">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1793">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1793">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1794">針對符合指定模式網域設定的 Cookie 將還原為舊版 SameSite 行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1794">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1795">還原為舊版行為會導致未指定 SameSite 屬性的 Cookie 被視為 "SameSite=None"，並移除 "SameSite=None" Cookie 傳輸 "Secure" 屬性的需求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1795">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", and removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1796">如果未設定此原則，則會使用全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1796">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1797">全域預設值也將用於您指定的模式未涵蓋的網域上的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1797">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1798">全域預設值可以使用 [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) 原則進行設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1798">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1799">如果未設定 [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled)，則全域預設值會後援到其他設定來源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1799">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1800">請注意，您在此原則中列出的模式會被視為網域，而非 URL，因此不應指定配置或連接埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1800">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1801">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1801">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1802">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1802">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1803">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1803">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1804">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1804">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1805">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1805">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1806">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1806">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1807">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1807">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1808">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1808">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1809">GP 唯一名稱：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1809">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1810">GP 名稱：將指定網站上的 Cookie 還原至舊版 SameSite 行為</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1810">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1811">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1811">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1812">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1812">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1813">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1813">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1814">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1814">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1815">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1815">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1816">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1816">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1817">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1817">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1818">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1818">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1819">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1819">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = "www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1820">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1820">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1821">喜好設定機碼名稱：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1821">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1822">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1822">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1823">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1823">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1824">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1824">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1825">允許特定網站上的通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1825">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1826">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1826">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1827">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1827">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1828">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1828">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1829">讓您建立 URL 模式的清單，以指定允許顯示通知的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1829">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1830">如果您未設定此原則，全域預設值將會套用至所有網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1830">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1831">如果已設定此原則，預設值會取自　[DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 原則或使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1831">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1832">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1832">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1833">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1833">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1834">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1834">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1835">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1835">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1836">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1836">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1837">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1837">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1838">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1838">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1839">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1839">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1840">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1840">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1841">GP 唯一名稱：NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1841">GP unique name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1842">GP 名稱：允許特定網站上的通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1842">GP name: Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1843">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1843">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1844">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1844">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1845">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1845">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1846">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1846">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1847">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1847">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1848">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1848">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1849">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1849">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1850">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1850">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1851">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1851">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1852">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1852">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1853">喜好設定機碼名稱：NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1853">Preference Key Name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1854">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1854">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1855">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1855">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1856">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1856">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1857">封鎖特定網站上的通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1857">Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1858">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1858">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1859">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1859">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1860">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1860">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1861">讓您建立 URL 模式的清單，以指定不允許顯示通知的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1861">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1862">如果您未設定此原則，全域預設值將會套用至所有網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1862">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1863">如果已設定此原則，預設值會取自　[DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 原則或使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1863">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1864">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1864">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1865">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1865">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1866">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1866">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1867">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1867">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1868">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1868">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1869">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1869">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1870">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1870">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1871">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1871">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1872">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1872">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1873">GP 唯一名稱：NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1873">GP unique name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1874">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1874">GP name: Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1875">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1875">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1876">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1876">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1877">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1877">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1878">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1878">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1879">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1879">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1880">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1880">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1881">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1881">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1882">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1882">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1883">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1883">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1884">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1884">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1885">喜好設定機碼名稱：NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1885">Preference Key Name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1886">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1886">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1887">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1887">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1888">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1888">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1889">允許特定網站上的 Adobe Flash 外掛程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1889">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1890">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1890">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1891">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1891">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1892">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1892">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1893">根據 URL 的模式，定義可執行 Adobe Flash 外掛程式的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1893">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1894">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1894">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1895">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1895">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1896">不過，從 M85 開始，此原則已不再支援主機使用帶有 ‘*' 和 '[*.]’ 等的萬用字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1896">However, starting in M85, patterns with '*' and '[*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1897">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1897">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1898">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1898">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1899">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1899">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1900">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1900">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1901">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1901">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1902">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1902">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1903">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1903">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1904">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1904">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1905">GP 唯一名稱：PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1905">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1906">GP 名稱：允許特定網站上的 Adobe Flash 外掛程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1906">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1907">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1907">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1908">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1908">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1909">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1909">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1910">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1910">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1911">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1911">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1912">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1912">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1913">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1913">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1914">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1914">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1915">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1915">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1916">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1916">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1917">喜好設定機碼名稱：PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1917">Preference Key Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1918">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1918">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1919">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1919">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1920">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1920">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1921">封鎖特定網站上的 Adobe Flash 外掛程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1921">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1922">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1922">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1923">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1923">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1924">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1924">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1925">根據 URL 的模式，定義遭封鎖而無法執行 Adobe Flash 的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1925">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1926">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1926">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1927">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1927">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1928">不過，從 M85 開始，此原則已不再支援主機使用帶有 ‘*' 和 '[*.]’ 等的萬用字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1928">However, starting in M85, patterns with '*' and '[*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1929">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1929">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1930">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1930">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1931">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1931">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1932">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1932">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1933">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1933">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1934">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1934">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1935">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1935">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1936">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1936">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1937">GP 唯一名稱：PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1937">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1938">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的 Adobe Flash 外掛程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1938">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1939">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1939">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1940">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1940">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1941">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1941">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1942">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1942">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1943">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1943">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1944">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1944">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1945">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1945">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1946">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1946">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1947">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1947">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1948">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1948">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1949">喜好設定機碼名稱：PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1949">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1950">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1950">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1951">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1951">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1952">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1952">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1953">允許特定網站上的快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1953">Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1954">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1954">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1955">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1955">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1956">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1956">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1957">根據 URL 的模式，定義可開啟快顯視窗的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1957">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1958">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1958">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1959">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1959">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1960">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1960">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1961">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1961">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1962">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1962">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1963">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1963">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1964">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1964">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1965">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1965">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1966">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1966">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
