  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1967">GP 唯一名稱：PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1967">GP unique name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1968">GP 名稱：允許特定網站上的快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1968">GP name: Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1969">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1969">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1970">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1970">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1971">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1971">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1972">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1972">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1973">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1973">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1974">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1974">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1975">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1975">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1976">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1976">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1977">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1977">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1978">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1978">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1979">喜好設定機碼名稱：PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1979">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1980">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1980">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1981">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1981">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1982">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1982">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1983">封鎖特定網站上的快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1983">Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1984">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1984">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1985">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1985">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1986">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1986">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1987">根據 URL 的模式，定義遭封鎖而無法開啟快顯視窗的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1987">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from opening pop-up windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-1988">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1988">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1989">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1989">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1990">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1990">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1991">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1991">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1992">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1992">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1993">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1993">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1994">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1994">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1995">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1995">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1996">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1996">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1997">GP 唯一名稱：PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1997">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1998">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1998">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-1999">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-1999">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2000">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2000">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2001">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2001">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2002">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2002">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2003">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2003">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2004">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2004">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2005">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2005">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2006">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2006">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2007">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2007">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2008">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2008">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2009">喜好設定機碼名稱：PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2009">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2010">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2010">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2011">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2011">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2012">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2012">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2013">登錄通訊協定處理常式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2013">Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2014">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2014">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2015">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2015">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2016">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2016">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2017">設定這個原則 (僅限建議使用) 來登錄通訊協定處理常式清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2017">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2018">此清單會與使用者登錄的清單合併，而且兩者皆可供使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2018">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2019">登錄通訊協定處理常式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2019">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2020">將通訊協定屬性設定為配置 (例如「mailto」)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2020">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2021">將 URL 屬性設定為處理「通訊協定」欄位中指定配置的應用程式之 URL 屬性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2021">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2022">模式可以包含「%s」預留位置，它會由已處理的 URL 取代。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2022">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2023">使用者無法移除由此原則登錄的通訊協定處理常式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2023">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2024">不過，他們可以安裝新的預設通訊協定處理常式來覆寫現有的通訊協定處理常式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2024">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2025">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2025">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2026">可強制執行：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2026">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2027">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2027">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2028">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2028">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2029">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2029">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2030">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2030">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2031">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2031">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2032">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2032">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2033">GP 唯一名稱：RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2033">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2034">GP 名稱：登錄通訊協定處理常式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2034">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2035">GP 路徑 (強制)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2035">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2036">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2036">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2037">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2037">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2038">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2038">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2039">路徑 (強制)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2039">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2040">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2040">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2041">數值名稱：RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2041">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2042">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2042">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2043">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2043">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2044">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2044">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2045">喜好設定機碼名稱：RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2045">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2046">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2046">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2047">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2047">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2048">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2048">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2049">選擇使用者是否能夠收到自訂的桌面背景影像和文字、建議、通知，</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2049">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications,</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2050">和 [Microsoft 服務] 的提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2050">and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2051">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2051">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2052">Windows 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2052">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2053">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2053">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2054">選擇使用者是否能夠收到自訂的桌面背景影像和文字、建議、通知，及 [Microsoft 服務] 的提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2054">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2055">若您啟用或不設置此設定，精選體驗和建議便會開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2055">If you enable or don't configure this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2056">若您停用此設定，精選體驗和建議便會關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2056">If you disable this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned off.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2057">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2057">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2058">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2058">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2059">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2059">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2060">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2060">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2061">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2061">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2062">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2062">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2063">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2063">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2064">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2064">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2065">GP 唯一名稱：SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2065">GP unique name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2066">GP 名稱：選擇使用者是否能夠收到自訂的桌面背景影像和文字、建議、通知，及 [Microsoft 服務] 的提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2066">GP name: Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2067">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2067">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2068">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2068">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2069">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2069">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2070">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2070">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2071">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2071">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2072">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2072">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2073">數值名稱：SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2073">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2074">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2074">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2075">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2075">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2076">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2076">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2077">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2077">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2078">授與特定網站連線到特定 USB 裝置的存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2078">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2079">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2079">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2080">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2080">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2081">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2081">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2082">允許您設定一份 URL 清單，指定哪些網站會自動獲授與權限，以存取具有指定廠商和產品識別碼的 USB 裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2082">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2083">清單中的每個項目都必須包含裝置和 URL，原則才會有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2083">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2084">裝置中的每個項目都可以包含廠商識別碼和產品識別碼欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2084">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2085">省略的任何識別碼都會被視為萬用字元，並有一個例外，且該例外是不能指定產品識別碼但未同時指定廠商識別碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2085">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2086">否則，原則將會無效，且會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2086">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2087">USB 權限模型會使用要求端網站的 URL (「要求端 URL」) 和最上層框架網站的 URL (「內嵌 URL」)，將授權授與給要求端 URL 以存取 USB 裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2087">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2088">在 iframe 中載入要求端網站時，要求端 URL 可能與內嵌 URL 不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2088">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2089">因此，"urls" 欄位最多可包含兩個以逗號分隔的 URL 字串，以便分別指定要求端和內嵌 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2089">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2090">如果僅指定一個 URL，當要求端網站的 URL 與符合此 URL 時，就會授與對應的 USB 裝置的存取權，而無論內嵌狀態為何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2090">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2091">"urls" 中的 URL 必須是有效的 URL，否則將忽略該原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2091">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2092">如果將此原則保留為未設定，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2092">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2093">此原則中的 URL 模式不應與透過 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 設定的衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2093">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2094">如果發生衝突，則此原則優先於 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 和 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2094">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2095">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2095">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2096">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2096">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2097">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2097">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2098">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2098">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2099">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2099">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2100">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2100">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2101">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2101">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2102">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2102">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2103">GP 唯一名稱：WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2103">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2104">GP 名稱：授與特定網站連線到特定 USB 裝置的存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2104">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2105">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2105">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2106">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2106">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2107">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2107">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2108">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2108">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2109">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2109">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2110">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2110">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2111">數值名稱：WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2111">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2112">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2112">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2113">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2113">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2114">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2114">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2115">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2115">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2116">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2116">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2117">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2117">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2118">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2118">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2119">允許特定網站上的 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2119">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2120">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2120">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2121">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2121">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2122">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2122">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2123">根據 URL 的模式，定義可要求使用者取得 USB 裝置存取權的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2123">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2124">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2124">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2125">在此原則中定義的 URL 模式不能與 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 原則中設定的衝突，您不能同時允許和封鎖一個 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2125">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2126">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2126">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2127">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2127">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2128">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2128">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2129">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2129">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2130">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2130">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2131">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2131">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2132">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2132">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2133">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2133">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2134">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2134">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2135">GP 唯一名稱：WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2135">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2136">GP 名稱：允許特定網站上的 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2136">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2137">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2137">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2138">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2138">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2139">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2139">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2140">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2140">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2141">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2141">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2142">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2142">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2143">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2143">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2144">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2144">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2145">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2145">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2146">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2146">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2147">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2147">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2148">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2148">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2149">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2149">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2150">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2150">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2151">封鎖特定網站上的 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2151">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2152">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2152">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2153">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2153">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2154">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2154">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2155">根據 URL 的模式，定義無法要求使用者授與其 USB 裝置存取權的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2155">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2156">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2156">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2157">在此原則中定義的 URL 模式不能與 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 原則中設定的衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2157">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2158">您不能同時允許和封鎖 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2158">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2159">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2159">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2160">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2160">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2161">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2161">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2162">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2162">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2163">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2163">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2164">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2164">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2165">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2165">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2166">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2166">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2167">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2167">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2168">GP 唯一名稱：WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2168">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2169">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站上的 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2169">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2170">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/內容設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2170">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2171">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2171">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2172">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2172">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2173">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2173">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2174">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2174">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2175">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2175">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2176">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2176">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2177">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2177">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2178">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2178">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2179">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2179">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2180">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2180">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2181">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2181">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2182">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2182">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2183">預設搜尋提供者原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2183">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2184">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2184">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2185">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2185">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2186">啟用預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2186">Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2187">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2187">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2188">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2188">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2189">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2189">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2190">啟用使用預設搜尋提供者的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2190">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2191">如果啟用此原則，則使用者可以透過在網址列中輸入來搜尋字詞 (只要其輸入內容不是 URL 即可)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2191">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2192">您可以啟用其餘的預設搜尋原則，以指定要使用的預設搜尋提供者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2192">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2193">如果保留空白 (未設定) 或設定不正確，則使用者可以選擇預設提供者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2193">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2194">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法從網址列搜尋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2194">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2195">如果啟用或停用此原則，則使用者無法變更或覆寫它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2195">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2196">如果未設定此原則，則會啟用預設搜尋提供者，且使用者可以選擇預設搜尋提供者，並設定搜尋提供者清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2196">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2197">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2197">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2198">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2198">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2199">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2199">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2200">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2200">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2201">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2201">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2202">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2202">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2203">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2203">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2204">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2204">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2205">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2205">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2206">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2206">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2207">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2207">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2208">GP 名稱：啟用預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2208">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2209">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2209">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2210">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2210">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2211">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2211">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2212">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2212">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2213">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2213">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2214">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2214">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2215">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2215">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2216">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2216">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2217">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2217">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2218">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2218">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2219">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2219">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2220">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2220">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2221">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2221">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2222">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2222">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2223">預設搜尋提供者編碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2223">Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2224">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2224">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2225">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2225">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2226">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2226">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2227">指定的搜尋提供者所支援的字元編碼方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2227">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2228">編碼是字碼頁名稱，如 UTF-8、GB2312 和 ISO-8859-1。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2228">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2229">這些編碼會按提供的順序進行嘗試。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2229">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2230">此原則是選擇性的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2230">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2231">如果未設定，則使用預設值 UTF-8。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2231">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2232">僅在啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2232">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2233">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2233">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2234">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2234">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2235">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2235">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2236">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2236">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2237">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2237">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2238">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2238">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2239">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2239">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2240">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2240">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2241">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2241">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2242">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2242">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2243">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2243">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2244">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2244">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2245">GP 名稱：預設搜尋提供者編碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2245">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2246">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2246">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2247">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2247">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2248">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2248">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2249">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2249">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2250">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2250">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2251">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2251">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2252">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2252">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2253">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2253">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2254">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2254">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2255">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2255">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2256">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2256">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2257">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2257">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2258">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2258">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2259">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2259">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2260">指定預設搜尋提供者的影像搜尋功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2260">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2261">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2261">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2262">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2262">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2263">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2263">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2264">指定要用於影像搜尋的搜尋引擎 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2264">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2265">搜尋要求會使用 GET 方法傳送。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2265">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2266">此原則是選擇性的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2266">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2267">如果未設定，則影像搜尋無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2267">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2268">將 Bing 的影像搜尋 URL 指定為：'{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2268">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2269">將 Google 的影像搜尋 URL 指定為：'{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2269">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2270">請參閱 [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) 原則，以完成影像搜尋的設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2270">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2271">僅在啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2271">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2272">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2272">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2273">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2273">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2274">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2274">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2275">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2275">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2276">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2276">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2277">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2277">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2278">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2278">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2279">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2279">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2280">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2280">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2281">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2281">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2282">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2282">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2283">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2283">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2284">GP 名稱：指定預設搜尋提供者的影像搜尋功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2284">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2285">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2285">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2286">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2286">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2287">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2287">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2288">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2288">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2289">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2289">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2290">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2290">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2291">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2291">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2292">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2292">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2293">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2293">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2294">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2295">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2295">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2296">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2296">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2297">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2297">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2298">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2298">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2299">使用 POST 的影像 URL 參數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2299">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2300">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2300">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2301">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2301">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2302">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2302">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2303">如果啟用此原則，則會指定執行使用 POST 的影像搜尋時使用的參數。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2303">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2304">原則是由以逗號分隔的名稱/值對組成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2304">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2305">如果值為範本參數，像是前述範例中的 {imageThumbnail}，則會被實際影像縮圖資料所取代。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2305">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2306">僅在啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2306">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2307">將 Bing 的影像搜尋 URL Post 參數指定為：'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2307">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2308">將 Google 的影像搜尋 URL Post 參數指定為：'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2308">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2309">如果您未設定此原則，則會使用 GET 方式傳送影像搜尋要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2309">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2310">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2310">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2311">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2311">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2312">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2312">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2313">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2313">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2314">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2314">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2315">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2315">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2316">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2316">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2317">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2317">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2318">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2318">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2319">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2319">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2320">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2320">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2321">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2321">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2322">GP 名稱：使用 POST 的影像 URL 參數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2322">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2323">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2323">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2324">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2324">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2325">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2325">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2326">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2326">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2327">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2327">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2328">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2328">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2329">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2329">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2330">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2330">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2331">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2331">Example value:</span></span>
```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2332">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2332">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2333">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2333">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2334">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2334">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2335">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2335">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2336">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2336">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2337">預設搜尋提供者關鍵字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2337">Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2338">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2338">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2339">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2339">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2340">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2340">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2341">指定關鍵字，這是在網址列中用來觸發此提供者的搜尋的捷徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2341">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2342">此原則是選擇性的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2342">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2343">如果未設定，則任何關鍵字都無法啟動搜尋提供者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2343">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2344">僅在啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2344">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2345">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2345">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2346">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2346">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2347">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2347">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2348">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2348">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2349">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2349">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2350">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2350">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2351">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2351">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2352">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2352">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2353">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2353">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2354">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2354">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2355">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2355">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2356">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2356">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2357">GP 名稱：預設搜尋提供者關鍵字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2357">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2358">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2358">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2359">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2359">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2360">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2360">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2361">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2361">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2362">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2362">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2363">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2363">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2364">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2364">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2365">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2365">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2366">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2366">Example value:</span></span>
```
"mis"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2367">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2367">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2368">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2368">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2369">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2369">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2370">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2370">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2371">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2371">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2372">預設搜尋提供者名稱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2372">Default search provider name</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2373">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2373">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2374">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2374">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2375">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2375">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2376">指定預設搜尋提供者的名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2376">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>
