<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2377">如果啟用此原則，則您可以設定預設搜尋提供者的名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2377">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2378">如果未啟用此原則，或如果將它保留為空白，則會使用由搜尋 URL 指定的主機名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2378">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2379">'DefaultSearchProviderName' 應設定為與 DTBC-0008 中設定的加密搜尋提供者對應、組織核准的加密搜尋提供者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2379">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2380">僅在啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2380">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2381">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2381">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2382">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2382">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2383">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2383">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2384">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2384">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2385">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2385">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2386">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2386">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2387">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2387">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2388">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2388">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2389">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2389">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2390">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2390">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2391">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2391">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2392">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2392">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2393">GP 名稱：預設搜尋提供者名稱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2393">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2394">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2394">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2395">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2395">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2396">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2396">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2397">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2397">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2398">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2398">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2399">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2399">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2400">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2400">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2401">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2401">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2402">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2402">Example value:</span></span>
```
"My Intranet Search"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2403">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2403">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2404">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2404">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2405">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2405">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2406">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2406">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2407">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2407">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2408">預設搜尋提供者搜尋 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2408">Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2409">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2409">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2410">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2410">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2411">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2411">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2412">指定要用於預設搜尋的搜尋引擎 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2412">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2413">URL 包含字串 '{searchTerms}'，它會在查詢時以使用者搜尋的字詞取代。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2413">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2414">將 Bing 的搜尋 URL 指定為：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2414">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2415">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2415">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2416">將 Google 的搜尋 URL 指定為：'{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2416">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2417">啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 原則時，需要此原則；如果未啟用前項原則，則會忽略此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2417">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2418">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2418">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2419">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2419">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2420">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2420">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2421">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2421">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2422">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2422">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2423">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2423">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2424">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2424">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2425">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2425">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2426">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2426">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2427">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2427">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2428">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2428">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2429">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2429">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2430">GP 名稱：預設搜尋提供者搜尋 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2430">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2431">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2431">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2432">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2432">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2433">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2433">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2434">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2434">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2435">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2435">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2436">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2436">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2437">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2437">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2438">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2438">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2439">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2439">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2440">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2440">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2441">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2441">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2442">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2442">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2443">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2443">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2444">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2444">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2445">預設建議的搜尋提供者 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2445">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2446">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2446">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2447">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2447">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2448">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2448">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2449">指定用來提供搜尋建議之搜尋引擎的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2449">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2450">URL 包含字串 '{searchTerms}'，它會在查詢時以使用者目前輸入的文字取代。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2450">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2451">此原則是選擇性的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2451">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2452">如果未設定，則使用者不會看到搜尋建議；他們會看到來自瀏覽歷程記錄和我的最愛的建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2452">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2453">Bing 的建議 URL 可以指定為：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2453">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2454">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2454">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2455">Google 的建議 URL 可指定為：'{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2455">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2456">僅在啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2456">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2457">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2457">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2458">如果使用者已設定預設搜尋提供者，由這個建議原則設定的預設搜尋提供者就不會新增到可讓使用者選擇的搜尋提供者清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2458">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2459">如果這是您想要的行為，請使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2459">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2460">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2460">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2461">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2461">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2462">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2462">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2463">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2463">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2464">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2464">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2465">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2465">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2466">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2466">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2467">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2467">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2468">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2468">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2469">GP 名稱：預設建議的搜尋提供者 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2469">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2470">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2470">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2471">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2471">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2472">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2472">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2473">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2473">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2474">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2474">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2475">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2475">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2476">數值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2476">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2477">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2477">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2478">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2478">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2479">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2479">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2480">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2480">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2481">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2481">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2482">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2482">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2483">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2483">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2484">設定新的索引標籤頁面搜尋體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2484">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2485">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2485">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2486">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2486">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2487">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2487">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2488">您可以設定新的索引標籤頁面搜尋方塊，使用搜尋方塊「搜尋方塊 (建議使用) 」或「位址列」來搜尋新的索引標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2488">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2489">只有當您將搜尋引擎設定為 Bing 以外的值時，才能使用此原則，只要設定下列兩種原則：[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和[DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2489">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2490">如果您停用或未設定此原則以及：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2490">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2491">如果 [位址列] 預設搜尋引擎為 Bing，新增的索引標籤頁面會在新索引標籤上使用搜尋方塊進行搜尋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2491">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2492">如果 [位址列] 預設搜尋引擎不是 Bing，當使用者在新的索引標籤上搜尋時，系統會使用者提供其他的選項 (使用「位址列」)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2492">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2493">如果您啟用這個原則，並將它設定為：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2493">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2494">「搜尋方塊 (建議使用) 」 ("bing") ，新增的索引標籤會在新的索引標籤上使用搜尋方塊進行搜尋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2494">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2495">「位址列」 ([重新導向]) ，新增索引標籤的搜尋 方塊會在新的索引標籤上使用 [位址] 列進行搜尋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2495">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2496">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2496">Policy options mapping:</span></span>
  

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2497">bing (bing) = 搜尋方塊 (建議使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2497">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2498">重新導向 (redirect) = 網址列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2498">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2499">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2499">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2500">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2500">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2501">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2501">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2502">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2502">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2503">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2503">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2504">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2504">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2505">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2505">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2506">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2506">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2507">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2507">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2508">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2508">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2509">GP 名稱：設定新的索引標籤頁面搜尋體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2509">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2510">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2510">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2511">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/預設搜尋提供者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2511">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2512">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2512">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2513">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2513">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2514">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2514">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2515">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2515">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2516">數值名稱：NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2516">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2517">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2517">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2518">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2518">Example value:</span></span>
```
"bing"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2519">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2519">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2520">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2520">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2521">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2521">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2522">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2522">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2523">擴充功能原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2523">Extensions policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2524">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2524">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2525">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2525">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2526">設定允許的擴充功能類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2526">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2527">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2527">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2528">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2528">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2529">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2529">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2530">控制可以安裝的擴充功能類型，並限制執行階段存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2530">Controls which extension types can be installed and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2531">此設定會定義允許的擴充功能類型，以及其可以與哪些主機進行互動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2531">This setting defines the allowed types of extensions and which hosts they can interact with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2532">該值是字串清單，其中的每個應該為下列其中一項："extension"、"theme"、"user_script" 和 "hosted_app"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2532">The value is a list of strings, each of which should be one of the following: "extension", "theme", "user_script", and "hosted_app".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2533">如需有關這些類型的詳細資訊，請參閱 Microsoft Edge 擴充功能文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2533">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information on these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2534">請注意，此原則也會影響使用 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) 原則強制安裝的擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2534">Note that this policy also affects extensions to be force-installed by using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2535">如果啟用此原則，則只會安裝符合清單中類型的擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2535">If you enable this policy, only extensions that match a type in the list are installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2536">如果未設定此原則，則對強制執行的可接受擴充功能類型沒有限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2536">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable extension types are enforced.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2537">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2537">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2538">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2538">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2539">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2539">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2540">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2540">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2541">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2541">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2542">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2542">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2543">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2543">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2544">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2544">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2545">GP 唯一名稱：ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2545">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2546">GP 名稱：設定允許的擴充功能類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2546">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2547">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2547">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2548">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2548">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2549">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2549">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2550">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2550">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2551">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2551">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2552">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2552">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2553">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2553">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2554">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2554">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2555">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2555">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2556">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2556">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2557">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2557">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2558">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2558">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2559">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2559">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2560">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2560">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2561">允許安裝特定擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2561">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2562">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2562">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2563">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2563">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2564">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2564">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2565">預設會允許所有擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2565">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2566">不過，如果您將 'ExtensionInstallBlockList' 原則設定為 "\*" 以封鎖所有擴充功能，則使用者只能安裝此原則中定義的擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2566">However, if you block all extensions by setting the 'ExtensionInstallBlockList' policy to "\*," users can only install extensions defined in this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2567">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2567">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2568">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2568">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2569">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2569">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2570">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2570">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2571">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2571">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2572">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2572">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2573">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2573">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2574">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2574">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2575">GP 唯一名稱：ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2575">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2576">GP 名稱：允許安裝特定擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2576">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2577">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2577">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2578">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2578">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2579">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2579">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2580">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2580">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2581">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2581">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2582">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2582">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2583">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2583">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2584">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2584">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2585">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2585">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2586">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2586">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2587">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2587">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2588">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2588">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2589">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2589">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2590">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2590">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2591">控制不能安裝哪些擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2591">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2592">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2592">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2593">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2593">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2594">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2594">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2595">列出使用者「無法」在 Microsoft Edge 中安裝的特定擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2595">List specific extensions that users can NOT install in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2596">部署此原則時，此清單上先前安裝的任何擴充功能都將停用，而且使用者將無法啟用它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2596">When you deploy this policy, any extensions on this list that were previously installed will be disabled, and the user won't be able to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2597">如果您從封鎖的擴充功能清單中移除某個項目，則會在先前安裝該擴充功能的任何位置自動重新啟用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2597">If you remove an item from the list of blocked extensions, that extension is automatically re-enabled anywhere it was previously installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2598">使用 "\*" 可封鎖未在允許清單中明確列出的所有擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2598">Use "\*" to block all extensions that aren't explicitly listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2599">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以在 Microsoft Edge 中安裝任何擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2599">If you don't configure this policy, users can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2600">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2600">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2601">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2601">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2602">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2602">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2603">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2603">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2604">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2604">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2605">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2605">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2606">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2606">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2607">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2607">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2608">GP 唯一名稱：ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2608">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2609">GP 名稱：控制不能安裝哪些擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2609">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2610">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2610">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2611">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2611">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2612">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2612">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2613">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2613">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2614">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2614">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2615">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2615">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2616">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2616">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2617">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2617">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2618">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2618">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2619">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2619">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2620">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2620">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2621">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2621">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2622">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2622">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2623">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2623">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2624">控制哪些擴充功能會以無訊息方式安裝</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2624">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2625">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2625">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2626">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2626">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2627">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2627">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2628">指定以無訊息方式安裝、不需使用者互動且使用者無法解除安裝或停用 (「強制安裝」) 的擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2628">Specifies extensions that are installed silently, without user interaction, and that the users can't uninstall or disable ("force-installed").</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2629">擴充功能所要求的權限都是隱含授與，無需使用者互動，包括未來版本的擴充功能所要求的任何額外權限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2629">All permissions requested by the extensions are granted implicitly, without user interaction, including any additional permissions requested by future versions of the extension.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2630">此外，還會針對 enterprise.deviceAttributes 和 enterprise.platformKeys 擴充功能 API 授與權限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2630">Furthermore, permissions are granted for the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2631">(這兩個 API 僅適用強制安裝的擴充功能。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2631">(These two APIs are only available to extensions that are force-installed.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2632">此原則優先於可能會衝突的 [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2632">This policy takes precedence over a potentially conflicting [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2633">將擴充功能從強制安裝清單中去除，Microsoft Edge 會自動將其解除安裝。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2633">When you take an extension off of the force-installed list it's automatically uninstalled by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2634">[強制安裝] 僅限於 Microsoft Edge 附加元件網站中所列的應用程式和擴充功能，且不屬於下列範例：已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體、或已註冊裝置管理的 [Windows 10 專業版] 或企業版執行個體，以及透過 MDM 管理或經由 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2634">Forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website for instances that aren't one of the following: Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, or Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, and macOS instances that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2635">請注意，使用者可以使用開發人員工具來修改任何擴充功能的原始程式碼，而這可能會使得擴充功能的功能失常。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2635">Note that users can modify the source code of any extension by using Developer Tools, potentially rendering the extension dysfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2636">如果這是問題，請設定 [DeveloperToolsAvailability](#developertoolsavailability) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2636">If this is a concern, set the [DeveloperToolsAvailability](#developertoolsavailability) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2637">使用下列格式將擴充功能新增至清單：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2637">Use the following format to add an extension to the list:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2638">[extensionID];[updateURL]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2638">[extensionID];[updateURL]</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2639">extensionID - 在開發人員模式中，可於 edge://extensions 中找到的 32 個字母字串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2639">extensionID - the 32-letter string found on edge://extensions when in developer mode.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2640">updateURL (選用) 是應用程式或擴充功能的更新資訊清單 XML 文件位址，如 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) 中所述。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2640">updateURL (optional) is the address of the Update Manifest XML document for the app or extension, as described at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2641">如果您想要從 Chrome 線上應用程式 Microsoft Store 安裝擴充功能，請提供 Chrome 線上應用程式 Microsoft Store 的更新 URL https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2641">If you want to install an extension from the Chrome Web Store, provide the Chrome Web Store update URL, https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2642">請注意，此原則中設定的更新 URL 只適用於初始安裝；擴充功能的後續更新會使用在擴充功能資訊清單中指出的更新 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2642">Note that the update URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL indicated in the extension's manifest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2643">如果您沒有設定 updateURL，系統會假定此擴充功能是存放在 Microsoft Store，並使用下列的更新 URL (https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2643">If you don't set the updateURL, the extension is assumed to be hosted in Microsoft Store and the following update URL is used (https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2644">例如，gggmmkjegpiggikcnhidnjjhmicpibll;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx 會透過 Microsoft Store "update" URL 安裝 Microsoft Online 應用程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2644">For example, gggmmkjegpiggikcnhidnjjhmicpibll;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx installs the Microsoft Online app from the Microsoft Store "update" URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2645">如需有關裝載擴充功能的詳細資訊，請參閱：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2645">For more information about hosting extensions, see: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2646">如果未設定此原則，則不會自動安裝任何擴充功能，且使用者可以在 Microsoft Edge 中解除安裝任何擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2646">If you don't configure this policy, no extensions are installed automatically, and users can uninstall any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2647">請注意，此原則不適用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2647">Note that this policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2648">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2648">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2649">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2649">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2650">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2650">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2651">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2651">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2652">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2652">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2653">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2653">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2654">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2654">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2655">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2655">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2656">GP 唯一名稱：ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2656">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2657">GP 名稱：控制哪些擴充功能會以無訊息方式安裝</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2657">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2658">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2658">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2659">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2659">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2660">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2660">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2661">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2661">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2662">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2662">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2663">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2663">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2664">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2664">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2665">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2665">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2666">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2666">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2667">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2667">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2668">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2668">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2669">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2669">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2670">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2670">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2671">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2671">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2672">設定擴充功能與使用者指令碼安裝來源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2672">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2673">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2673">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2674">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2674">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2675">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2675">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2676">定義可安裝擴充功能和主題的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2676">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2677">依預設，使用者必須針對要安裝的每個擴充功能或指令碼下載 \*.crx 檔案，然後將它拖曳到 Microsoft Edge 設定頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2677">By default, users have to download a \*.crx file for each extension or script they want to install, and then drag it onto the Microsoft Edge settings page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2678">此原則可讓特定 URL 為使用者安裝擴充功能或指令碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2678">This policy lets specific URLs use install the extension or script for the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2679">此清單中的每個項目都是擴充功能式比對模式 (請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2679">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2680">使用者可以從符合此清單中項目的任何 URL 輕鬆安裝項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2680">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2681">這些模式必須同時允許 \*.crx 檔案的位置，以及開始下載網頁的位置 (也就是查閱者)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2681">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2682">[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 原則優先於此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2682">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2683">不會安裝封鎖清單上的任何擴充功能，即使它來自此清單上的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2683">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2684">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2684">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2685">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2685">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2686">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2686">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2687">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2687">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2688">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2688">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2689">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2689">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2690">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2690">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2691">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2691">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2692">GP 唯一名稱：ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2692">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2693">GP 名稱：設定擴充功能與使用者指令碼安裝來源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2693">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2694">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2694">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2695">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2695">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2696">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2696">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2697">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2697">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2698">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2698">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2699">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2699">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2700">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2700">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2701">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2701">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2702">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2702">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2703">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2703">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2704">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2704">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2705">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2705">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2706">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2706">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2707">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2707">ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2708">設定擴充功能管理設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2708">Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2709">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2709">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2710">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2710">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2711">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2711">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2712">設定 Microsoft Edge 的擴充功能管理設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2712">Configures extension management settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2713">此原則可控制多個設定，包括由任何現有擴充功能相關原則所控制的設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2713">This policy controls multiple settings, including settings controlled by any existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2714">此原則會覆寫任何舊版原則 (如果同時設定)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2714">This policy overrides any legacy policies if both are set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2715">此原則會將擴充功能識別碼或更新 URL 與其設定對應。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2715">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2716">利用擴充功能識別碼，設定只會套用至指定的擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2716">With an extension ID, the configuration is applied only to the specified extension.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2717">設定特殊識別碼 "\*" 的預設設定，以將它套用至此原則中未特別列出的所有擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2717">Set a default configuration for the special ID "\*", to apply to all extensions that aren't specifically listed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2718">利用更新 URL，設定會套用至具有此擴充功能的資訊清單中陳述的確切更新 URL 的所有擴充功能，如 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) 中所述。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2718">With an update URL, the configuration is applied to all extensions with the exact update URL stated in manifest of this extension, as described at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2719">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2719">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2720">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2720">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2721">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2721">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2722">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2722">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2723">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2723">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2724">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2724">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2725">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2725">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2726">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2726">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2727">GP 唯一名稱：ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2727">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2728">GP 名稱：設定擴充功能管理設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2728">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2729">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2729">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2730">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2730">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2731">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2731">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2732">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2732">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2733">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2733">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2734">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2734">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2735">數值名稱：ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2735">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2736">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2736">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2737">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2737">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2742">HTTP 驗證原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2742">HTTP authentication policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2743">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2743">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2744">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2744">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2745">允許跨原始來源 HTTP 基本驗證提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2745">Allow cross-origin HTTP Basic Auth prompts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2746">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2746">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2747">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2747">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2748">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2748">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2749">控制頁面上的協力廠商子內容是否能夠開啟 [HTTP 基本驗證] 對話方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2749">Controls whether third-party sub-content on a page can open an HTTP Basic Auth dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2750">通常，這會因為網路釣魚防禦而將它停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2750">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2751">如果未設定此原則，則會停用此原則，且協力廠商子內容無法開啟 [HTTP 基本驗證] 對話方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2751">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party sub-content can't open a HTTP Basic Auth dialog box.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2752">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2752">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2753">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2753">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2754">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2754">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2755">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2755">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2756">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2756">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2757">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2757">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2758">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2758">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2759">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2759">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2760">GP 唯一名稱：AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2760">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2761">GP 名稱：允許跨原始來源 HTTP 基本驗證提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2761">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Basic Auth prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2762">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2762">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2763">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2763">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2764">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2764">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2765">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2765">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2766">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2766">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2767">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2767">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2768">數值名稱：AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2768">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2769">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2769">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2770">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2770">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2771">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2771">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2772">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2772">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2773">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2773">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2774">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2774">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2775">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2775">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2776">指定 Microsoft Edge 可以委派使用者認證的伺服器清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2776">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2777">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2777">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2778">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2778">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2779">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2779">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2780">設定 Microsoft Edge 可以委派的伺服器清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2780">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2781">使用逗號分隔多個伺服器名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2781">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2782">允許使用萬用字元 (\*)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2782">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2783">如果未設定此原則，Microsoft Edge 將不會委派使用者認證，即使將伺服器偵測為內部網路亦然。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2783">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2784">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2784">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2785">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2785">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
