  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2786">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2786">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2787">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2787">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2788">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2788">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2789">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2789">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2790">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2790">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2791">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2791">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2792">GP 唯一名稱：AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2792">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2793">GP 名稱：指定 Microsoft Edge 可以委派使用者認證的伺服器清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2793">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2794">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2794">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2795">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2795">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2796">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2796">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2797">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2797">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2798">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2798">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2799">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2799">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2800">數值名稱：AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2800">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2801">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2801">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2802">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2802">Example value:</span></span>
```
"contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2803">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2803">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2804">喜好設定機碼名稱：AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2804">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2805">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2805">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2806">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2806">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2807">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2807">AuthSchemes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2808">支援的驗證配置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2808">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2809">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2809">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2810">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2810">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2811">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2811">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2812">指定支援的 HTTP 驗證配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2812">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2813">您可以使用這些值來設定原則：'basic'、'digest'、'ntlm' 和 'negotiate'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2813">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2814">使用逗號分隔多個值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2814">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2815">如果未設定此原則，則會使用所有四個配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2815">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2816">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2816">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2817">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2817">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2818">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2818">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2819">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2819">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2820">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2820">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2821">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2821">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2822">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2822">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2823">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2823">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2824">GP 唯一名稱：AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2824">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2825">GP 名稱：支援的驗證配置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2825">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2826">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2826">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2827">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2827">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2828">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2828">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2829">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2829">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2830">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2830">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2831">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2831">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2832">數值名稱：AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2832">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2833">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2833">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2834">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2834">Example value:</span></span>
```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2835">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2835">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2836">喜好設定機碼名稱：AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2836">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2837">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2837">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2838">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2838">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2839">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2839">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2840">設定允許驗證伺服器的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2840">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2841">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2841">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2842">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2842">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2843">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2843">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2844">指定要啟用整合式驗證的伺服器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2844">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2845">只有在 Microsoft Edge 收到來自 Proxy 或此清單中伺服器的驗證挑戰時，才會啟用整合式驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2845">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2846">使用逗號分隔多個伺服器名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2846">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2847">允許使用萬用字元 (\*)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2847">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2848">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會嘗試偵測伺服器是否在內部網路上，並在這麼做之後才會回應 IWA 要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2848">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2849">如果伺服器在網際網路上，則 Microsoft Edge 會忽略來自該伺服器的 IWA 要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2849">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2850">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2850">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2851">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2851">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2852">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2852">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2853">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2853">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2854">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2854">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2855">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2855">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2856">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2856">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2857">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2857">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2858">GP 唯一名稱：AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2858">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2859">GP 名稱：設定允許驗證伺服器的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2859">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2860">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2860">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2861">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2861">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2862">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2862">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2863">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2863">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2864">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2864">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2865">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2865">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2866">數值名稱：AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2866">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2867">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2867">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2868">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2868">Example value:</span></span>
```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2869">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2869">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2870">喜好設定機碼名稱：AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2870">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2871">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2871">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2872">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2872">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2873">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2873">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2874">當協調 Kerberos 驗證時停用 CNAME 查閱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2874">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2875">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2875">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2876">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2876">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2877">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2877">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2878">決定產生的 Kerberos SPN 是根據一般 DNS 名稱 (CNAME) 或是輸入的原始名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2878">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2879">如果啟用此原則，則會略過 CNAME 查閱，並使用伺服器名稱 (如輸入的內容)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2879">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2880">如果停用或未設定此原則，則會使用伺服器的正式名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2880">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2881">這是透過 CNAME 查閱決定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2881">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2882">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2882">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2883">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2883">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2884">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2884">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2885">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2885">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2886">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2886">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2887">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2887">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2888">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2888">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2889">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2889">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2890">GP 唯一名稱：DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2890">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2891">GP 名稱：當協調 Kerberos 驗證時停用 CNAME 查閱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2891">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2892">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2892">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2893">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2893">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2894">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2894">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2895">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2895">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2896">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2897">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2898">數值名稱：DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2898">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2899">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2899">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2900">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2900">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2901">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2901">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2902">喜好設定機碼名稱：DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2902">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2903">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2903">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2904">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2904">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2905">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2905">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2906">Kerberos SPN 中包含非標準連接埠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2906">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2907">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2907">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2908">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2908">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2909">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2909">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2910">指定產生的 Kerberos SPN 是否應包含非標準連接埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2910">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2911">如果啟用此原則，且使用者在 URL 中包含非標準連接埠 (80 或 443 以外的連接埠)，則該連接埠會包含在產生的 Kerberos SPN 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2911">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2912">如果未設定或停用此原則，則在任何情況下，產生的 Kerberos SPN 將不會包含連接埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2912">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2913">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2913">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2914">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2914">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2915">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2915">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2916">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2916">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2917">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2917">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2918">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2918">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2919">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2919">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2920">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2920">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2921">GP 唯一名稱：EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2921">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2922">GP 名稱：Kerberos SPN 中包含非標準連接埠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2922">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2923">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2923">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2924">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2924">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2925">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2925">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2926">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2926">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2927">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2927">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2928">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2928">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2929">數值名稱：EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2929">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2930">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2930">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2931">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2931">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2932">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2932">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2933">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2933">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2934">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2934">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2935">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2935">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2936">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2936">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2937">控制是否要啟用 NTLMv2 驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2937">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2938">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2938">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2939">macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2939">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2940">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2940">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2941">控制是否已啟用 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2941">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2942">所有新版的 Samba 和 Windows 伺服器均支援 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2942">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2943">您僅應為了解決回溯相容性問題而停用 NTLMv2，因為這會降低驗證的安全性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2943">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2944">如果未設定此原則，則預設會啟用 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2944">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2945">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2945">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2946">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2946">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2947">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2947">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2948">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2948">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2949">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2949">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2950">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2950">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2951">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2951">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2952">喜好設定機碼名稱：NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2952">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2953">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2953">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2954">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2954">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2955">原生訊息原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2955">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2956">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2956">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2957">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2957">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2958">控制使用者可以使用的原生訊息主機</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2958">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2959">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2959">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2960">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2960">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2961">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2961">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2962">列出使用者可在 Microsoft Edge 中使用的特定原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2962">List specific native messaging hosts that users can use in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2963">預設會允許所有原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2963">By default, all native messaging hosts are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2964">如果將 [NativeMessagingBlocklist](#nativemessagingblocklist) 原則設定為 \*，則會封鎖所有原生訊息主機，且只會載入此處所列的原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2964">If you set the [NativeMessagingBlocklist](#nativemessagingblocklist) policy to \*, all native messaging hosts are blocked, and only native messaging hosts listed in here are loaded.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2965">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2965">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2966">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2966">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2967">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2967">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2968">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2968">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2969">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2969">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2970">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2970">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2971">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2971">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2972">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2972">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2973">GP 唯一名稱：NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2973">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2974">GP 名稱：控制使用者可以使用的原生訊息主機</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2974">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2975">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/原生訊息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2975">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2976">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2976">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2977">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2977">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2978">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2978">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2979">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2979">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2980">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2980">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2981">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2981">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2982">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2982">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2983">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2983">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2984">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2984">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2985">喜好設定機碼名稱：NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2985">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2986">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2986">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2987">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2987">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2988">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2988">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2989">設定原生訊息封鎖清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2989">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2990">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2990">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2991">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2991">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2992">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2992">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2993">指定不應使用的原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2993">Specifies which native messaging hosts that shouldn't be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2994">使用 "\*" 以封鎖所有原生訊息主機，除非它們明確列在允許清單中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2994">Use '\*' to block all native messaging hosts unless they are explicitly listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-2995">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會載入所有安裝的原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2995">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will load all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2996">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2996">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2997">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2997">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2998">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2998">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-2999">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-2999">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3000">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3000">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3001">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3001">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3002">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3002">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3003">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3003">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3004">GP 唯一名稱：NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3004">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3005">GP 名稱：設定原生訊息封鎖清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3005">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3006">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/原生訊息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3006">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3007">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3007">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3008">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3008">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3009">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3009">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3010">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3010">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3011">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3011">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3012">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3012">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3013">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3013">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3014">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3014">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3015">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3015">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3016">喜好設定機碼名稱：NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3016">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3017">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3017">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3018">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3018">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3019">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3019">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3020">允許使用者層級原生訊息主機 (安裝時不需要系統管理員權限)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3020">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3021">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3021">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3022">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3022">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3023">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3023">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3024">啟用原生訊息主機的使用者層級安裝。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3024">Enables user-level installation of native messaging hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3025">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 只會使用在系統層級上安裝的原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3025">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only use native messaging hosts installed on the system level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3026">如果未設定此原則，依預設，Microsoft Edge 將允許使用使用者層級的原生訊息主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3026">By default, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will allow usage of user-level native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3027">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3027">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3028">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3028">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3029">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3029">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3030">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3030">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3031">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3031">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3032">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3032">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3033">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3033">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3034">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3034">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3035">GP 唯一名稱：NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3035">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3036">GP 名稱：允許使用者層級原生訊息主機 (安裝時不需要系統管理員權限)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3036">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3037">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/原生訊息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3037">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3038">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3038">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3039">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3039">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3040">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3040">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3041">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3041">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3042">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3042">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3043">數值名稱：NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3043">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3044">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3044">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3045">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3045">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3046">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3046">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3047">喜好設定機碼名稱：NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3047">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3048">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3048">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3049">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3049">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3050">密碼管理員和保護原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3050">Password manager and protection policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3051">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3051">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3052">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3052">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3053">啟用將密碼儲存到密碼管理員</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3053">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3054">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3054">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3055">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3055">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3056">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3056">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3057">讓 Microsoft Edge 可儲存使用者密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3057">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3058">如果啟用此原則，則使用者可以將其密碼儲存在 Microsoft Edge 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3058">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3059">使用者下次瀏覽網站時，Microsoft Edge 即會自動輸入密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3059">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3060">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法儲存新的密碼，但仍然可以使用先前儲存的密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3060">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3061">如果啟用或停用此原則，則使用者無法在 Microsoft Edge 中變更或覆寫它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3061">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3062">如果未設定，則使用者可以儲存密碼，並關閉此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3062">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3063">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3063">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3064">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3064">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3065">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3065">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3066">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3066">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3067">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3067">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3068">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3068">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3069">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3069">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3070">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3070">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3071">GP 唯一名稱：PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3071">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3072">GP 名稱：啟用將密碼儲存到密碼管理員</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3072">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3073">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3073">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3074">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3074">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3075">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3075">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3076">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3076">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3077">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3077">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3078">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3078">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3079">數值名稱：PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3079">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3080">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3080">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3081">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3081">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3082">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3082">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3083">喜好設定機碼名稱：PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3083">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3084">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3084">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3085">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3085">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3086">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3086">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3087">允許使用者在密碼不安全時收到警示提醒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3087">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3088">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3088">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3089">Windows 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3089">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3090">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3090">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3091">允許 Microsoft Edge 監管使用者密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3091">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3092">如果您啟用此項原則，且提供使用者同意書啟用此原則，如果任何儲存在 Microsoft Edge 中的密碼出現不安全的情形，使用者會收到警示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3092">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3093">Microsoft Edge 會顯示警示訊息，而此資訊也可在 [設定] > [密碼] > [密碼監視器] 中取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3093">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3094">如果您停用這項原則，啟用此功能與否可不須詢問使用者的同意。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3094">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3095">使用者的密碼不會被掃瞄，使用者也不會收到警示訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3095">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3096">如果您啟用或未設定原則，使用者可以選擇將此功能開啟或關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3096">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3097">若要深入瞭解 Microsoft Edge 如何發現密碼不安全，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3097">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3098">其他指導方針：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3098">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3099">您可以將此原則同時設為建議性使用和強制性使用，但必須使用重要標註。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3099">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3100">強制性啟用：因個人使用者同意是為特定使用者啟用此功能的預先條件，所以此原則沒有強制執行的設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3100">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3101">如果將此原則設定為 [強制性啟用]，則不須變更 [設定] 中的 UI，且下列的錯誤訊息會顯示在 edge://policy。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3101">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3102">錯誤狀態訊息範例：「忽略此原則值是因為密碼監控器須有個人使用者的同意才能開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3102">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3103">您可以要求貴組織的使用者至設定 > 設定檔 > 密碼，然後開啟此功能。」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3103">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3104">建議性啟用：假如將此原則設為建議性使用，在設定中的 UI 即會維持在 ‘關閉’ 的狀態．但在其旁邊會顯示一個公事包的圖示，在暫留懸停時會有以下說明顯示 -「您的組織建議使用此設定適用的特定值，而您選擇了一個不同的值」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3104">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3105">已停用強制性使用和建議性使用：這兩種狀態都能正常運作，且使用者可以看到常用的標題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3105">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3106">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3106">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3107">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3107">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3108">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3108">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3109">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3109">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3110">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3110">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3111">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3111">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3112">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3112">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3113">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3113">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3114">GP 唯一名稱：PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3114">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3115">GP 名稱：允許使用者在密碼不安全時收到警示提醒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3115">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3116">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3116">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3117">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3117">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3118">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3118">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3119">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3119">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3120">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3120">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3121">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3121">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3122">數值名稱：PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3122">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3123">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3123">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3124">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3124">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  
  
   
 
 
   
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3125">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3125">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3126">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3126">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3127">設定變更密碼 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3127">Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3128">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3128">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3129">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3129">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3130">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3130">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3131">設定變更密碼 URL (僅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 配置)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3131">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3132">在瀏覽器中看到警告之後，密碼保護服務會將使用者傳送到此 URL 以變更其密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3132">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3133">如果啟用此原則，則密碼保護服務會將使用者傳送到此 URL 來變更其密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3133">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3134">如果停用或未設定此原則，則密碼保護服務不會將使用者重新導向至變更密碼 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3134">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3135">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3135">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3136">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3136">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3137">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3137">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3138">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3138">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3139">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3139">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3140">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3140">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3141">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3141">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3142">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3142">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3143">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3143">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3144">GP 唯一名稱：PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3144">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3145">GP 名稱：設定變更密碼 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3145">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3146">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3146">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3147">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3147">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3148">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3148">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3149">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3149">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3150">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3150">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3151">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3151">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3152">數值名稱：PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3152">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3153">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3153">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3154">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3154">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3155">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3155">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3156">喜好設定機碼名稱：PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3156">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3157">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3157">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3158">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3158">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3159">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3159">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3160">設定密碼保護服務應擷取密碼加料雜湊的企業登入 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3160">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3161">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3161">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3162">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3162">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3163">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3163">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3164">設定企業登入 URL 的清單 (僅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 配置)，Microsoft Edge 應在其中擷取密碼的加料雜湊，並將它用於密碼重複使用偵測。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3164">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3165">如果啟用此原則，則密碼保護服務會在定義的 URL 上擷取密碼的指紋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3165">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3166">如果停用或未設定此原則，則不會擷取密碼指紋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3166">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3167">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3167">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3168">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3168">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3169">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3169">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3170">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3170">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3171">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3171">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3172">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3172">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3173">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3173">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3174">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3174">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3175">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3175">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3176">GP 唯一名稱：PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3176">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3177">GP 名稱：設定密碼保護服務應擷取密碼加料雜湊的企業登入 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3177">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3178">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3178">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3179">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3179">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3180">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3180">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3181">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3181">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3182">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3182">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3183">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3183">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3184">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3184">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3185">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3185">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3186">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3186">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3187">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3187">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3188">喜好設定機碼名稱：PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3188">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3189">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3189">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3190">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3190">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3191">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3191">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3192">設定密碼保護警告觸發程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3192">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3193">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3193">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3194">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3194">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3195">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3195">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3196">允許您控制觸發密碼保護警告的時機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3196">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3197">當使用者在潛在可疑網站上重複使用受保護的密碼時，密碼保護會警示使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3197">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3198">您可以使用 [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 原則來設定要保護的密碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3198">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3199">免除：[PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 中所列的網站的密碼，以及 [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains) 中所列網站，將不會觸發密碼保護警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3199">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3200">設定為 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff'，以不顯示密碼保護警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3200">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3201">設定為 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse'，以在使用者於非列為允許的網站上重複使用其受保護之密碼時，顯示密碼保護警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3201">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3202">如果停用或未設定此原則，則不會顯示警告觸發。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3202">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3203">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3203">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3204">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = 密碼保護警告已關閉</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3204">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3205">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = 密碼保護警告會在重新使用密碼時觸發</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3205">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3206">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3206">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3207">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3207">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3208">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3208">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3209">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3209">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3210">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3210">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3211">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3211">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3212">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3212">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3213">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3213">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3214">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3214">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3215">GP 唯一名稱：PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3215">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3216">GP 名稱：設定密碼保護警告觸發程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3216">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3217">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/密碼管理員和防護</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3217">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3218">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3218">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3219">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3219">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3220">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3220">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3221">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3221">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3222">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3222">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3223">數值名稱：PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3223">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
