  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3224">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3224">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3225">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3225">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3226">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3226">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3227">喜好設定機碼名稱：PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3227">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3228">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3228">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3229">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3229">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3230">列印原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3230">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3231">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3231">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3232">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3232">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3233">預設印表機選擇規則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3233">Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3234">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3234">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3235">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3235">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3236">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3236">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3237">覆寫 Microsoft Edge 預設印表機選擇規則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3237">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3238">此原則會決定用於在 Microsoft Edge 中選取預設印表機的規則，這會在使用者第一次嘗試列印頁面時發生。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3238">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3239">設定此原則時，Microsoft Edge 會嘗試尋找符合所有指定屬性的印表機，並將它當成預設印表機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3239">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3240">如果有符合條件的多個印表機，則會使用符合的第一個印表機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3240">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3241">如果未設定此原則，或未在逾時內找到相符的印表機，印表機會預設為內建的 PDF 印表機，或無印表機 (如果沒有 PDF 印表機)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3241">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3242">值會剖析為 JSON 物件，符合下列架構：{ "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "用來比對印表機識別碼的規則運算式。", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "用來比對印表機顯示名稱的規則運算式。", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3242">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3243">省略某個欄位表示比對所有值；例如，如果您未指定連線，則預覽列印會開始探索各種本機印表機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3243">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3244">規則運算式模式必須遵循 JavaScript RegExp 語法，且比對會區分大小寫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3244">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3245">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3245">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3246">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3246">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3247">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3247">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3248">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3248">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3249">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3249">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3250">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3250">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3251">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3251">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3252">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3252">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3253">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3253">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3254">GP 名稱：預設印表機選擇規則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3254">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3255">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3255">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3256">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3256">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3257">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3257">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3258">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3258">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3259">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3259">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3260">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3260">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3261">數值名稱：DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3261">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3262">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3262">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3263">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3263">Example value:</span></span>
```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3264">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3264">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3265">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3265">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3266">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3266">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3267">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3267">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3268">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3268">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3269">列印頁首與頁尾</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3269">Print headers and footers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3270">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3270">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3271">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3271">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3272">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3272">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3273">在列印對話方塊中，強制開啟或關閉 [頁首及頁尾]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3273">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3274">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以決定是否要列印頁首和頁尾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3274">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3275">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法列印頁首及頁尾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3275">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3276">如果啟用此原則，則使用者一律會列印頁首及頁尾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3276">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3277">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3277">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3278">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3279">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3279">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3280">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3281">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3281">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3282">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3282">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3283">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3283">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3284">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3285">GP 唯一名稱：PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3285">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3286">GP 名稱：列印頁首及頁尾</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3286">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3287">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3288">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3288">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3289">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3290">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3291">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3292">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3292">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3293">數值名稱：PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3293">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3294">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3294">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3295">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3295">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3296">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3296">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3297">喜好設定機碼名稱：PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3297">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3298">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3298">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3299">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3299">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3300">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3300">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3301">將系統預設的印表機設定為預設印表機</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3301">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3302">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3302">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3303">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3303">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3304">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3304">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3305">告知 Microsoft Edge 使用 [預覽列印] 中的預設印表機，而非最近使用的印表機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3305">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3306">如果停用或未設定此原則，則預覽列印會將最近使用的印表機視為預設的目的地選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3306">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3307">如果啟用此原則，則預覽列印會使用 OS 的系統預設印表機做為預設目的地選擇。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3307">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3308">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3308">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3309">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3309">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3310">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3310">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3311">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3311">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3312">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3312">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3313">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3313">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3314">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3314">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3315">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3315">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3316">GP 唯一名稱：PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3316">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3317">GP 名稱：將系統預設的印表機設定為預設印表機</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3317">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3318">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3318">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3319">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3319">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3320">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3320">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3321">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3321">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3322">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3322">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3323">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3323">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3324">數值名稱：PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3324">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3325">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3325">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3326">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3326">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3327">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3327">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3328">喜好設定機碼名稱：PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3328">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3329">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3329">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3330">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3330">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3331">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3331">PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3332">啟用列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3332">Enable printing</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3333">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3333">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3334">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3334">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3335">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3335">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3336">在 Microsoft Edge 中啟用列印，並防止使用者變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3336">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3337">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3337">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3338">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法從 Microsoft Edge 列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3338">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3339">在扳手功能表、擴充功能、JavaScript 應用程式等項目中會停用列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3339">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3340">使用者仍可以從列印時會略過 Microsoft Edge 的外掛程式進行列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3340">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3341">例如，某些 Adobe Flash 應用程式的內容功能表中有列印選項，而此原則並未涵蓋它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3341">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3342">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3342">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3343">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3343">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3344">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3344">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3345">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3345">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3346">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3346">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3347">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3347">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3348">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3348">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3349">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3349">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3350">GP 唯一名稱：PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3350">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3351">GP 名稱：啟用列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3351">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3352">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3352">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3353">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3353">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3354">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3354">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3355">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3355">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3356">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3356">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3357">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3357">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3358">數值名稱：PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3358">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3359">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3359">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3360">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3360">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3361">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3361">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3362">喜好設定機碼名稱：PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3362">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3363">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3363">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3364">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3364">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3365">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3365">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3366">預設列印頁面大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3366">Default printing page size</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3367">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3367">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3368">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3368">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3369">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3369">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3370">覆寫預設列印頁面大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3370">Overrides default printing page size.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3371">如果所需紙張大小不在清單中，名稱應包含列出的其中一種格式或 [自訂]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3371">name should contain one of the listed formats or 'custom' if required paper size is not in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3372">如果提供了 [自訂] 值則需指定 custom_size 屬性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3372">If 'custom' value is provided custom_size property should be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3373">它以微米為單位描述所需的高度和寬度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3373">It describes the desired height and width in micrometers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3374">否則請不要指定 custom_size 屬性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3374">Otherwise custom_size property shouldn't be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3375">違反這些規則的原則會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3375">Policy that violates these rules is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3376">如果使用者選擇的印表機無法列印此紙張尺寸，則忽略此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3376">If the page size is unavailable on the printer chosen by the user this policy is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3377">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3377">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3378">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3378">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3379">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3379">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3380">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3380">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3381">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3381">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3382">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3382">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3383">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3383">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3384">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3384">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3385">GP 唯一名稱：PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3385">GP unique name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3386">GP 名稱：預設列印頁面大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3386">GP name: Default printing page size</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3387">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3387">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3388">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3388">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3389">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3389">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3390">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3390">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3391">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3391">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3392">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3392">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3393">值名稱：PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3393">Value Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3394">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3394">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3395">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3395">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {
  "custom_size": {
    "height": 297000, 
    "width": 210000
  }, 
  "name": "custom"
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3396">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3396">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3397">喜好設定機碼名稱：PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3397">Preference Key Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3398">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3398">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3399">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3399">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3400">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3400">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3401">使用系統列印對話方塊列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3401">Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3402">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3402">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3403">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3403">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3404">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3404">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3405">顯示系統列印對話方塊，而非預覽列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3405">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3406">如果啟用此原則，當使用者列印頁面時，Microsoft Edge 會開啟系統的列印對話方塊，而非內建的預覽列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3406">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3407">如果未設定或停用此原則，則列印命令會觸發 Microsoft Edge 預覽列印畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3407">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3408">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3408">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3409">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3409">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3410">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3410">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3411">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3411">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3412">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3412">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3413">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3413">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3414">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3414">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3415">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3415">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3416">GP 唯一名稱：UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3416">GP unique name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3417">GP 名稱：使用系統列印對話方塊列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3417">GP name: Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3418">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/列印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3418">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3419">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3419">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3420">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3420">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3421">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3421">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3422">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3422">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3423">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3423">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3424">數值名稱：UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3424">Value Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3425">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3425">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3426">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3426">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3427">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3427">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3428">喜好設定機碼名稱：UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3428">Preference Key Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3429">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3429">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3430">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3430">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3431">Proxy 伺服器原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3431">Proxy server policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3432">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3432">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3433">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3433">ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3434">設定 Proxy 許可規則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3434">Configure proxy bypass rules</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3435">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3435">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3436">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3436">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3437">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3437">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3438">定義 Microsoft Edge 略過任何 Proxy 的主機清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3438">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3439">只有當您在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 原則中選取 [使用固定的 Proxy 伺服器] 時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3439">This policy is applied only if you have selected 'Use fixed proxy servers' in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3440">如果已選取用於設定 Proxy 原則的任何其他模式，請勿啟用或設定此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3440">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3441">如果啟用此原則，則可以建立 Microsoft Edge 不使用 Proxy 的主機清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3441">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3442">如果未設定此原則，則不會為 Microsoft Edge 略過其 Proxy 的主機建立清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3442">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3443">如果已指定用於設定 Proxy 原則的任何其他方法，請將此原則保留為未設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3443">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3444">如需更詳細的範例，請移至 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3444">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3445">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3445">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3446">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3446">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3447">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3447">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3448">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3448">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3449">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3449">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3450">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3450">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3451">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3451">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3452">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3452">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3453">GP 唯一名稱：ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3453">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3454">GP 名稱：設定 Proxy 許可規則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3454">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3455">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/Proxy 伺服器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3455">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3456">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3456">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3457">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3457">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3458">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3458">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3459">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3459">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3460">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3460">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3461">數值名稱：ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3461">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3462">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3462">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3463">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3463">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3464">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3464">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3465">喜好設定機碼名稱：ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3465">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3466">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3466">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3467">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3467">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3468">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3468">ProxyMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3469">設定 Proxy 伺服器設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3469">Configure proxy server settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3470">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3470">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3471">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3471">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3472">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3472">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3473">指定 Microsoft Edge 所使用的 Proxy 伺服器設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3473">Specify the proxy server settings used by Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3474">如果啟用此原則，則使用者無法變更 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3474">If you enable this policy, users can't change the proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3475">如果選擇一律不使用 Proxy 伺服器且一律直接連線，則會忽略所有其他選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3475">If you choose to never use a proxy server and to always connect directly, all other options are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3476">如果選擇使用系統 Proxy 設定，則會忽略所有其他選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3476">If you choose to use system proxy settings, all other options are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3477">如果選擇自動偵測 Proxy 伺服器，則會忽略所有其他選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3477">If you choose to auto detect the proxy server, all other options are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3478">如果選擇固定伺服器 Proxy 模式，則可以在 [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 和「逗點分隔的 Proxy 許可規則清單」中指定更多選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3478">If you choose fixed server proxy mode, you can specify further options in [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and 'Comma-separated list of proxy bypass rules'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3479">如果選擇使用 .pac Proxy 指令碼，則必須在 [Proxy .pac 檔案的 URL] 中指定指令碼的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3479">If you choose to use a .pac proxy script, you must specify the URL to the script in 'URL to a proxy .pac file'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3480">如需詳細範例，請移至 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3480">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3481">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會忽略從命令列指定的所有 Proxy 相關選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3481">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will ignore all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3482">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以選擇其自己的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3482">If you don't configure this policy users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3483">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3483">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3484">ProxyDisabled (direct) = 永遠不使用 Proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3484">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3485">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = 自動偵測 Proxy 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3485">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3486">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = 使用 .pac Proxy 指令碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3486">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3487">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = 使用固定的 Proxy 伺服器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3487">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3488">ProxyUseSystem (system) = 使用系統 Proxy 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3488">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3489">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3489">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3490">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3490">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3491">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3491">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3492">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3492">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3493">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3493">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3494">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3494">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3495">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3495">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3496">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3496">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3497">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3497">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3498">GP 唯一名稱：ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3498">GP unique name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3499">GP 名稱：設定 Proxy 伺服器設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3499">GP name: Configure proxy server settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3500">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/Proxy 伺服器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3500">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3501">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3501">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3502">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3502">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3503">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3503">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3504">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3504">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3505">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3505">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3506">值名稱︰ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3506">Value Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3507">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3507">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3508">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3508">Example value:</span></span>
```
"direct"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3509">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3509">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3510">喜好設定機碼名稱：ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3510">Preference Key Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3511">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3511">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>direct</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3512">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3512">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3513">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3513">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3514">設定 Proxy .pac 檔案 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3514">Set the proxy .pac file URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3515">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3515">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3516">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3516">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3517">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3517">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3518">指定 Proxy auto-config (PAC) 檔案的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3518">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3519">只有當您在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 原則中選取 [使用 .pac Proxy 指令碼] 時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3519">This policy is applied only if you selected 'Use a .pac proxy script' in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3520">如果已選取用於設定 Proxy 原則的任何其他模式，請勿啟用或設定此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3520">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3521">如果啟用此原則，則可以為 PAC 檔案指定 URL，其定義瀏覽器如何自動選擇用於擷取特定網站的適當 Proxy 伺服器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3521">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3522">如果停用或未設定此原則，則不會指定任何 PAC 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3522">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3523">如果已指定用於設定 Proxy 原則的任何其他方法，請將此原則保留為未設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3523">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3524">如需詳細範例，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3524">For detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3525">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3525">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3526">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3526">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3527">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3527">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3528">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3528">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3529">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3529">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3530">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3530">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3531">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3531">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3532">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3532">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3533">GP 唯一名稱：ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3533">GP unique name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3534">GP 名稱：設定 Proxy .pac 檔案 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3534">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3535">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/Proxy 伺服器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3535">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3536">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3536">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3537">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3537">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3538">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3538">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3539">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3539">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3540">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3540">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3541">值名稱︰ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3541">Value Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3542">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3542">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3543">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3543">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3544">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3544">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3545">喜好設定機碼名稱：ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3545">Preference Key Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3546">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3546">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3547">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3547">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3548">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3548">ProxyServer</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3549">設定 Proxy 伺服器的位址或 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3549">Configure address or URL of proxy server</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3550">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3550">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3551">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3551">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3552">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3552">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3553">指定 Proxy 伺服器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3553">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3554">只有當您在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 原則中選取 [使用固定的 Proxy 伺服器] 時，才會套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3554">This policy is applied only if you have selected 'Use fixed proxy servers' in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3555">如果已選取用於設定 Proxy 原則的任何其他模式，請勿啟用或設定此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3555">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3556">如果啟用此原則，則將對所有 URL 使用此原則設定的 Proxy 伺服器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3556">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3557">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以在處於此 Proxy 模式時選擇其自己的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3557">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3558">如果已指定用於設定 Proxy 原則的任何其他方法，請將此原則保留為未設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3558">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3559">如需更多選項和詳細範例，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3559">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3560">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3560">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3561">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3562">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3562">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3563">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3564">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3564">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3565">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3565">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3566">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3566">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3567">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3568">GP 唯一名稱：ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3568">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3569">GP 名稱：設定 Proxy 伺服器的位址或 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3569">GP name: Configure address or URL of proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3570">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/Proxy 伺服器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3571">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3571">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3572">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3573">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3574">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3575">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3575">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3576">值名稱︰ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3576">Value Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3577">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3577">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3578">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3578">Example value:</span></span>
```
"123.123.123.123:8080"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3579">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3580">喜好設定機碼名稱：ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3580">Preference Key Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3581">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3582">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3583">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3583">ProxySettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3584">Proxy 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3584">Proxy settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3585">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3585">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3586">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3586">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3587">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3587">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3588">設定 Microsoft Edge 的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3588">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3589">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會忽略從命令列指定的所有 Proxy 相關選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3589">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3590">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以選擇其自己的 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3590">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3591">此原則會覆寫下列個別原則：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3591">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3592">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3592">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3593">ProxyMode 欄位可讓您指定 Microsoft Edge 所使用的 Proxy 伺服器，並防止使用者變更 Proxy 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3593">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3594">ProxyPacUrl 欄位是 Proxy .pac 檔案的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3594">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3595">ProxyServer 欄位是 Proxy 伺服器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3595">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3596">ProxyBypassList 欄位是 Microsoft Edge 略過的 Proxy 主機清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3596">The ProxyBypassList field is a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3597">如果選擇 'direct' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則永遠不會使用 Proxy，並忽略所有其他欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3597">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3598">如果選擇 'system' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會使用系統的 Proxy，並忽略所有其他欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3598">If you choose the 'system' value as 'ProxyMode', the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3599">如果選擇 'auto_detect' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會忽略所有其他欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3599">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3600">如果選擇 'fixed_server' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會使用 'ProxyServer' 和 'ProxyBypassList' 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3600">If you choose the 'fixed_server' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' and 'ProxyBypassList' fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3601">如果選擇 'pac_script' 值做為 'ProxyMode'，則會使用 'ProxyPacUrl' 和 'ProxyBypassList' 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3601">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' and 'ProxyBypassList' fields are used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3602">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3602">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3603">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3603">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3604">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3604">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3605">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3605">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3606">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3606">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3607">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3607">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3608">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3608">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3609">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3609">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3610">GP 唯一名稱：ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3610">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3611">GP 名稱：Proxy 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3611">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3612">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/Proxy 伺服器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3612">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3613">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3613">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3614">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3614">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3615">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3615">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3616">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3616">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3617">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3617">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3618">數值名稱：ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3618">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3619">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3619">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3620">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3620">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3621">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3621">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3622">喜好設定機碼名稱：ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3622">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3623">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3623">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>direct</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3624">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3624">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3625">SmartScreen 設定原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3625">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3626">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3626">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3627">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3627">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3628">防止略過網站的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3628">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3629">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3629">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3630">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3630">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3631">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3631">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3632">此原則設定可讓您決定使用者是否可覆寫有關潛在惡意網站的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3632">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3633">如果啟用此設定，使用者就不能忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，並且會封鎖使用者，使其無法繼續瀏覽網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3633">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3634">如果停用或未設定此設定，則使用者可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，並繼續瀏覽網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3634">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3635">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3635">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3636">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3636">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3637">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3637">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3638">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3638">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3639">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3639">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3640">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3640">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3641">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3641">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3642">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3642">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3643">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3643">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3644">GP 唯一名稱：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3644">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3645">GP 名稱：防止略過網站的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3645">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3646">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3646">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3647">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3647">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3648">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3648">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3649">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3649">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3650">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3650">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3651">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3651">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3652">數值名稱：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3652">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3653">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3653">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3654">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3654">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3655">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3655">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3656">喜好設定機碼名稱：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3656">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3657">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3657">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3658">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3658">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3659">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3659">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3660">防止略過關於下載項目的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3660">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3661">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3661">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3662">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3662">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3663">macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3663">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>
