  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3664">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3664">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3665">此原則可讓您判斷使用者是否可以覆寫關於未經驗證下載的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3665">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3666">如果啟用此原則，則組織中的使用者無法忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，且會防止其完成未經驗證的下載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3666">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3667">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，並完成未驗證的下載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3667">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3668">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3668">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3669">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3669">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3670">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3670">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3671">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3671">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3672">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3672">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3673">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3673">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3674">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3674">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3675">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3675">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3676">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3676">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3677">GP 唯一名稱：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3677">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3678">GP 名稱：防止略過關於下載項目的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3678">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3679">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3679">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3680">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3680">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3681">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3681">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3682">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3682">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3683">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3683">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3684">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3684">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3685">數值名稱：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3685">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3686">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3686">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3687">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3687">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3688">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3688">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3689">喜好設定機碼名稱：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3689">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3690">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3690">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3691">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3691">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3692">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3692">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3693">設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 篩選工具將不會觸發警告的網域清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3693">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3694">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3694">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3695">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3695">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3696">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3696">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3697">設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的信任網域清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3697">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3698">這表示，如果來源 URL 符合這些網域，則 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 不會檢查是否有潛在的惡意資源，例如網路釣魚軟體和其他惡意程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3698">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3699">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 下載保護服務不會檢查在這些網域上託管的下載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3699">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3700">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 會信任這些網域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3700">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3701">如果停用或未設定此原則，則會將預設的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 防護套用到所有資源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3701">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3702">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3702">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3703">另請注意，如果組織已啟用 Microsoft Defender 進階威脅防護，則此原則不適用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3703">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3704">您必須改為在 Microsoft Defender 資訊安全中心設定允許和封鎖清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3704">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3705">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3705">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3706">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3706">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3707">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3707">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3708">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3708">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3709">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3709">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3710">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3710">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3711">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3711">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3712">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3712">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3713">GP 唯一名稱：SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3713">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3714">GP 名稱：設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 篩選工具將不會觸發警告的網域清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3714">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3715">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3715">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3716">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3716">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3717">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3717">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3718">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3718">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3719">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3719">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3720">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3720">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3721">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3721">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3722">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3722">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3723">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3723">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3724">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3724">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3725">喜好設定機碼名稱：SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3725">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3726">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3726">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3727">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3727">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3728">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3728">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3729">設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3729">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3730">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3730">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3731">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3731">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3732">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3732">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3733">此原則設定可讓您設定是否要開啟 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3733">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3734">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 提供警告訊息，以協助保護使用者免於遭受潛在網路釣魚詐騙和惡意軟體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3734">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3735">預設會開啟 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3735">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3736">如果啟用此設定，則會開啟 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3736">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3737">如果停用此設定，則會關閉 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3737">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3738">如果未設定此設定，則使用者可以選擇是否要使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3738">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3739">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3739">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3740">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3740">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3741">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3741">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3742">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3742">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3743">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3743">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3744">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3744">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3745">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3745">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3746">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3746">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3747">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3747">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3748">GP 唯一名稱：SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3748">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3749">GP 名稱：設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3749">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3750">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3750">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3751">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3751">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3752">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3752">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3753">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3753">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3754">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3754">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3755">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3755">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3756">數值名稱：SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3756">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3757">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3757">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3758">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3758">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3759">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3759">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3760">喜好設定機碼名稱：SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3760">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3761">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3761">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3762">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3762">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3763">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3763">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3764">強制 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 檢查來自信任來源的下載項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3764">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3765">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3765">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3766">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3766">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3767">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3767">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3768">此原則設定可讓您設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 是否檢查來自信任來源的下載信譽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3768">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3769">如果您啟用或未設定此設定，無論來源為何，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 都會檢查下載項目的信譽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3769">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3770">如果您停用此設定，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 不會檢查從信任來源下載項目的信譽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3770">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3771">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3771">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3772">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3772">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3773">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3773">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3774">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3774">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3775">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3775">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3776">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3776">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3777">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3777">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3778">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3778">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3779">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3779">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3780">GP 唯一名稱：SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3780">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3781">GP 名稱：強制 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 檢查來自信任來源的下載項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3781">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3782">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3782">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3783">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3783">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3784">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3784">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3785">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3785">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3786">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3786">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3787">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3787">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3788">數值名稱：SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3788">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3789">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3789">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3790">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3790">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3791">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3791">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3792">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3792">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3793">設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以封鎖潛在的垃圾應用程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3793">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3794">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3794">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3795">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3795">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3796">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3796">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3797">此原則設定可讓您設定是否要開啟封鎖潛在的垃圾應用程式以搭配 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3797">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3798">潛在的垃圾應用程式封鎖搭配 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 可提供警告訊息，以協助保護使用者不受廣告軟體、挖礦程式、置入軟體和其他由網站託管的低信譽應用程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3798">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3799">預設會關閉潛在的垃圾應用程式封鎖搭配 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3799">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3800">如果啟用此設定，則會開啟潛在的垃圾應用程式封鎖搭配 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3800">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3801">如果停用此設定，則會關閉潛在的垃圾應用程式封鎖搭配 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3801">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3802">如果未設定此設定，則使用者可以選擇是否要使用潛在的垃圾應用程式封鎖搭配 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3802">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3803">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3803">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3804">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3804">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3805">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3805">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3806">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3806">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3807">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3807">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3808">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3808">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3809">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3809">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3810">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3810">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3811">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3811">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3812">GP 唯一名稱：SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3812">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3813">GP 名稱：設定 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以封鎖潛在的垃圾應用程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3813">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3814">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3814">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3815">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/SmartScreen 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3815">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3816">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3816">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3817">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3817">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3818">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3818">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3819">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3819">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3820">數值名稱：SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3820">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3821">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3821">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3822">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3822">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3823">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3823">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3824">喜好設定機碼名稱：SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3824">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3825">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3825">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3826">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3826">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3827">啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3827">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3828">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3828">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3829">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3829">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3830">將新的索引標籤頁面設定為 [首頁]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3830">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3831">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3831">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3832">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3832">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3833">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3833">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3834">設定 Microsoft Edge 中的預設首頁。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3834">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3835">您可以將首頁設定為您指定的 URL 或新的索引標籤頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3835">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3836">如果啟用此原則，則一律對首頁使用新的索引標籤頁面，且會忽略首頁 URL 位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3836">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3837">如果停用此原則，除非 URL 設為 'edge://newtab'，否則使用者的首頁不會成為新的索引標籤頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3837">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3838">如果未設定，則使用者可以選擇新的索引標籤頁面是否為其首頁。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3838">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3839">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3839">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3840">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3840">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3841">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3841">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3842">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3842">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3843">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3843">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3844">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3844">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3845">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3845">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3846">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3846">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3847">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3847">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3848">GP 唯一名稱：HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3848">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3849">GP 名稱：將新的索引標籤頁面設定為 [首頁]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3849">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3850">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3850">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3851">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3851">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3852">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3852">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3853">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3853">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3854">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3854">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3855">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3855">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3856">數值名稱：HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3856">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3857">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3857">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3858">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3858">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3859">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3859">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3860">喜好設定機碼名稱：HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3860">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3861">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3861">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3862">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3862">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3863">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3863">HomepageLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3864">設定首頁 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3864">Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3865">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3865">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3866">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3866">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3867">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3867">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3868">設定 Microsoft Edge 中的預設首頁 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3868">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3869">首頁是由 [首頁] 按鈕所開啟的頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3869">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3870">啟動時開啟的頁面是由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 原則所控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3870">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3871">您可以在此設定 URL，或將首頁設定為開啟新的索引標籤頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3871">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3872">如果選擇開啟新的索引標籤頁面，則此原則不會有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3872">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3873">如果啟用此原則，則使用者無法變更其首頁 URL，但可以選擇使用新的索引標籤頁面做為首頁。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3873">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3874">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以自行選擇其首頁，只要 [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) 原則未啟用即可。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3874">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3875">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3875">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3876">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3876">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3877">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3878">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3878">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3879">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3880">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3880">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3881">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3881">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3882">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3882">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3883">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3884">GP 唯一名稱：HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3884">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3885">GP 名稱：設定首頁 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3885">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3886">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3887">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3887">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3888">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3889">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3890">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3891">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3891">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3892">數值名稱：HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3892">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3893">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3893">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3894">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3894">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3895">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3896">喜好設定機碼名稱：HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3896">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3897">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3898">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3899">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3899">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3900">設定新索引標籤頁面版面配置所允許的背景類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3900">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3901">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3901">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3902">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3902">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3903">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3903">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3904">您可以在 Microsoft Edge 中設定新索引標籤頁面版面配置所允許的背景影像類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3904">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3905">如果您未設定此原則，則會啟用新索引標籤頁面上的所有背景影像類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3905">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

    

     

   

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3906">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3906">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3907">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = 停用每日背景影像類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3907">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3908">DisableCustomImage (2) = 停用自訂背景影像類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3908">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3909">DisableAll (3) = 停用所有背景影像類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3909">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3910">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3910">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3911">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3911">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3912">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3912">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3913">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3913">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3914">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3914">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3915">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3915">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3916">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3916">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3917">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3917">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3918">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3918">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3919">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3919">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3920">GP 名稱：設定新索引標籤頁面配置所允許的背景類型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3920">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3921">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3921">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3922">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3922">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3923">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3923">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3924">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3924">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3925">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3925">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3926">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3926">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3927">值名稱：NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3927">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3928">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3928">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3929">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3929">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3930">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3930">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3931">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3931">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3932">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3932">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3933">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3933">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3934">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3934">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3935">設定新的索引標籤頁面公司標誌 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3935">Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
                                                                                                                 
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-3936">已過時：此原則已過時，且無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 及之後的版本中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3936">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3937">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3937">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3938">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 到 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3938">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3939">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3939">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3940">由於操作要求的變更，此原則無法按預期運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3940">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3941">囙此，它已過時，不應再使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3941">Therefore it's obsolete and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3942">指定要在 Microsoft Edge 中新的索引標籤頁面上使用的公司標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3942">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3943">原則應設定為字串，以 JSON 格式表示標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3943">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3944">例如：{ "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3944">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3945">您可以設定此原則，方法是指定 Microsoft Edge 可以從中下載標誌的 URL，以及其加密雜湊 (SHA-256)，用來驗證下載的完整性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3945">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3946">標誌必須是 PNG 或 SVG 格式，且其檔案大小不能超過 16 MB。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3946">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3947">標誌會下載並快取，每當 URL 或雜湊變更，就會重新下載標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3947">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3948">該 URL 必須未經任何驗證便可存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3948">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3949">需要 'default_logo'，且它將在沒有背景影像時使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3949">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3950">如果提供了 'light_logo'，則會在使用者新的索引標籤頁面有背景影像時使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3950">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3951">建議使用具有透明背景的水平標誌 (靠左對齊和垂直置中)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3951">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3952">標誌的最小高度應為 32 像素，而長寬比從 1:1 到4:1。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3952">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3953">'default_logo' 應對照白色/黑色背景使用適當的對比，而 'light_logo' 應對照背景影像有適當的對比。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3953">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3954">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會下載並在新的索引標籤頁面上顯示指定的標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3954">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3955">使用者無法覆寫或隱藏標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3955">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3956">如果停用或未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 不會在新的索引標籤頁面上顯示公司標誌或 Microsoft 標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3956">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3957">如需有關判定 SHA-256 雜湊的說明，請參閱 https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3957">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, see https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3958">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3958">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3959">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3959">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3960">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3960">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3961">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3961">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3962">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3962">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3963">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3963">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3964">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3964">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3965">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3965">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3966">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3966">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3967">GP 名稱：設定新的索引標籤頁面公司標誌 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3967">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3968">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3968">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3969">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3969">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3970">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3970">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3971">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3971">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3972">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3972">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3973">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3973">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3974">數值名稱：NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3974">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3975">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3975">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3976">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3976">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3977">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3977">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3978">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3978">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3979">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3979">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageCompanyLogo</key>
<dict>
  <key>default_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/logo.png</string>
  </dict>
  <key>light_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3980">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3980">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3981">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3981">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3982">從新的索引標籤頁面隱藏預設熱門網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3982">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3983">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3983">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3984">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3984">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3985">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3985">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3986">在 Microsoft Edge 中從新的索引標籤頁面隱藏預設熱門網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3986">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3987">如果您將此原則設定為 true，則會隱藏預設的熱門網站磚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3987">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-3988">如果將此原則設定為 false 或未設定，則預設的熱門網站磚會保持顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3988">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3989">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3989">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3990">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3990">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3991">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3991">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3992">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3992">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3993">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3993">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3994">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3994">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3995">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3995">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3996">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3996">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3997">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3997">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3998">GP 名稱：從新的索引標籤頁面隱藏預設熱門網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3998">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-3999">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-3999">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4000">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4000">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4001">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4001">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4002">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4002">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4003">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4003">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4004">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4004">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4005">數值名稱：NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4005">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4006">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4006">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4007">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4007">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4008">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4008">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4009">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4009">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4010">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4010">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4011">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4011">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4012">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4012">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4013">設定新的索引標籤頁面 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4013">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4014">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4014">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4015">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4015">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4016">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4016">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4017">設定新的索引標籤頁面的預設 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4017">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4018">此原則會決定建立新的索引標籤時開啟的頁面 (包括開啟新視窗時)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4018">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4019">如果啟動頁面已設為開啟新的索引標籤頁面，則也會影響它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4019">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4020">此原則不會判定在啟動時要開啟的頁面；這是由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 原則控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4020">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4021">如果啟動頁面已設為開啟至新的索引標籤，則不會對首頁造成任何影響。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4021">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4022">如果未設定此原則，則會使用預設的新的索引標籤頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4022">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4023">如果您設定此原則*以及* [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) 原則，則此原則優先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4023">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4024">如果提供的 URL 無效，新的索引標籤會開啟 about://blank。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4024">If an invalid URL is provided, new tabs will open about://blank.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4025">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4025">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4026">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4026">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4027">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4027">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4028">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4028">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4029">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4029">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4030">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4030">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4031">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4031">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4032">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4032">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4033">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4033">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4034">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4034">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4035">GP 名稱：設定新的索引標籤頁面 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4035">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4036">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4036">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4037">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4037">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4038">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4038">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4039">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4039">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4040">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4040">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4041">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4041">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4042">數值名稱：NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4042">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4043">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4043">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4044">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4044">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4045">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4045">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4046">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4046">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4047">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4047">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4048">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4048">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4049">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4049">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4050">設定新的索引標籤頁面快速連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4050">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4051">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4051">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4052">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4052">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4053">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4053">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4054">依預設，Microsoft Edge 會根據瀏覽歷程記錄，在新的索引標籤頁面上顯示來自使用者新增的捷徑和熱門網站的快速連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4054">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4055">使用此原則，您可以在新的索引標籤頁面上設定最多三個快速連結磚，並以 JSON 物件表示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4055">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4056">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4056">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4057">'url' 欄位為必要欄位。'title' 和 'pinned' 為選用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4057">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4058">如果未提供 'title'，則會將 URL 用作預設標題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4058">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4059">如果未提供 'pinned'，則預設值為 false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4059">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4060">Microsoft Edge 會以所列的順序呈現這些項目 (由左至右)，且所有釘選的磚都會顯示在未釘選的磚前方。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4060">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4061">如果原則設定為強制，則會忽略 'pinned' 欄位，並將所有磚釘選。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4061">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4062">使用者無法刪除磚，且一律會出現在快速連結清單的前面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4062">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4063">如果原則設定為建議，則釘選的磚會保留在清單中，但使用者可以編輯和刪除它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4063">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4064">未釘選的快速連結磚的行為就如同預設的熱門網站，如果其他網站的造訪頻率較高，則會將該連結推出清單之外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4064">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4065">透過此原則將未釘選的連結套用至現有的瀏覽器設定檔時，連結可能完全不會顯示，取決於它們相較於使用者的瀏覽歷程記錄的排名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4065">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4066">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4066">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4067">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4067">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4068">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4068">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4069">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4069">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>
