  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4070">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4070">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4071">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4071">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4072">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4072">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4073">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4073">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4074">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4074">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4075">GP 名稱：設定新的索引標籤頁面快速連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4075">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4076">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4076">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4077">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4077">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4078">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4078">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4079">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4079">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4080">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4080">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4081">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4081">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4082">數值名稱：NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4082">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4083">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4083">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4084">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4084">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4085">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4085">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4086">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4086">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4087">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4087">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4088">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4088">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4089">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4089">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4090">啟用預先載入的新索引標籤頁面，以加快頁面呈現速度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4090">Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4091">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4091">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4092">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4092">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4093">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4093">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4094">若您設定此原則，將會啟用 [預先載入新增索引標籤頁面] 功能，且使用者無法變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4094">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4095">若您未設定此原則，將會啟用預先載入功能，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4095">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4096">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4096">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4097">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4097">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4098">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4098">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4099">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4099">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4100">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4100">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4101">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4101">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4102">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4102">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4103">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4103">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4104">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4104">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4105">GP 名稱：啟用預先載入的新索引標籤頁面，以加快頁面呈現速度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4105">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4106">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4106">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4107">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4107">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4108">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4108">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4109">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4109">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4110">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4110">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4111">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4111">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4112">數值名稱：NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4112">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4113">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4113">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4114">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4114">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4115">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4115">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4116">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4116">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4117">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4117">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4118">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4118">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4119">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4119">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4120">設定 Microsoft Edge 新的索引標籤頁面體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4120">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4121">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4121">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4122">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4122">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4123">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4123">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4124">讓您為新的索引標籤頁面選擇 Microsoft News 或 Office 365 摘要體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4124">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4125">將此原則設定為 ‘新聞’ 時，使用者會在新的索引標籤頁面上看到 Microsoft 新聞摘要體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4125">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4126">將此原則設定為 ‘Office’ 時，以 Azure Active Directory 登入瀏覽器的使用者會在新的索引標籤頁面上看到 Office 365 摘要體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4126">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4127">如果停用或未設定此原則：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4127">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4128">具有 Azure Active Directory 瀏覽器登入的使用者，會獲得 Office 365 新的索引標籤頁面摘要體驗，以及標準的新的索引標籤頁面摘要體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4128">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4129">沒有 Azure Active Directory 瀏覽器登入的使用者將會看到標準的新的索引標籤頁面體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4129">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4130">如果您設定此原則*以及* [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 原則，則 [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 優先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4130">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4131">預設設定：已停用或未設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4131">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4132">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4132">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4133">新聞 (0) = Microsoft 新聞摘要體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4133">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4134">Office (1) = Office 365 摘要體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4134">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4135">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4135">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4136">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4136">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4137">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4137">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4138">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4138">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4139">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4139">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4140">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4140">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4141">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4141">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4142">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4142">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4143">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4143">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4144">GP 唯一名稱：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4144">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4145">GP 名稱：設定 Microsoft Edge 新的索引標籤頁面體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4145">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4146">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4146">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4147">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4147">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4148">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4148">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4149">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4149">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4150">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4150">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4151">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4151">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4152">數值名稱：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4152">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4153">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4153">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4154">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4154">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4155">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4155">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4156">喜好設定機碼名稱：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4156">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4157">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4157">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4158">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4158">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4159">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4159">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4160">啟動時所採取的動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4160">Action to take on startup</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4161">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4161">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4162">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4162">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4163">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4163">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4164">指定 Microsoft Edge 啟動時的行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4164">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4165">如果想要在啟動時一律開啟新索引標籤，請選擇 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4165">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4166">如果想要重新開啟上次 Microsoft Edge 關閉時所開啟的 URL，請選擇 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4166">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4167">瀏覽工作階段將會如實還原。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4167">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4168">請注意，此選項會停用某些依賴於工作階段或在結束時執行動作的設定 (例如，在結束時清除瀏覽資料或僅限工作階段的 Cookie)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4168">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4169">如果想要開啟一組特定的 URL，請選擇 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4169">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4170">停用此設定相當於將它保持未設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4170">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4171">使用者將能夠在 Microsoft Edge 中變更它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4171">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4172">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4172">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4173">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4173">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4174">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = 開啟新的索引標籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4174">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4175">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = 還原上一個工作階段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4175">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4176">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = 開啟 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4176">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4177">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4177">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4178">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4178">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4179">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4179">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4180">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4180">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4181">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4181">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4182">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4182">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4183">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4183">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4184">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4184">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4185">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4185">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4186">GP 唯一名稱：RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4186">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4187">GP 名稱：啟動時所採取的動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4187">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4188">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4188">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4189">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4189">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4190">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4190">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4191">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4191">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4192">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4192">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4193">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4193">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4194">數值名稱：RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4194">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4195">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4195">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4196">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4196">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000004
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4197">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4197">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4198">喜好設定機碼名稱：RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4198">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4199">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4199">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4200">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4200">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4201">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4201">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4202">瀏覽器啟動時開啟的網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4202">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4203">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4203">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4204">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4204">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4205">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4205">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4206">指定瀏覽器啟動時自動開啟的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4206">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4207">如果未設定此原則，則啟動時不會開啟任何網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4207">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4208">只有當您將 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 原則設定為 [開啟 URL 清單] (4)時，此原則才有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4208">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4209">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4209">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4210">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4210">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4211">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4211">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4212">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4212">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4213">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4213">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4214">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4214">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4215">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4215">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4216">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4216">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4217">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4217">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4218">GP 唯一名稱：RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4218">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4219">GP 名稱：瀏覽器啟動時開啟的網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4219">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4220">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4220">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4221">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4221">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4222">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4222">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4223">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4223">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4224">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4224">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4225">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4225">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4226">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4226">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4227">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4227">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4228">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4228">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4229">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4229">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4230">喜好設定機碼名稱：RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4230">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4231">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4231">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4232">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4232">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4233">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4233">ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4234">在工具列上顯示 [首頁] 按鈕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4234">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4235">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4235">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4236">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4236">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4237">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4237">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4238">在 Microsoft Edge 工具列上顯示 [首頁] 按鈕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4238">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4239">啟用此原則以一律顯示 [首頁] 按鈕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4239">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4240">停用它以一律不顯示該按鈕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4240">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4241">如果未設定原則，則使用者可以選擇是否要顯示首頁按鈕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4241">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4242">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4242">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4243">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4243">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4244">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4244">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4245">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4245">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4246">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4246">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4247">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4247">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4248">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4248">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4249">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4249">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4250">GP 唯一名稱：ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4250">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4251">GP 名稱：在工具列上顯示 [首頁] 按鈕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4251">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4252">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4252">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4253">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/啟動、首頁和新的索引標籤頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4253">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4254">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4254">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4255">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4255">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4256">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4256">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4257">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4257">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4258">數值名稱：ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4258">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4259">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4259">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4260">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4260">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4261">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4261">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4262">喜好設定機碼名稱：ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4262">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4263">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4263">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4265">其他原則</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4265">Additional policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4266">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4266">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4267">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4267">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4268">在網址列中啟用 Bing 專用 Microsoft Search 建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4268">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4269">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4269">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4270">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4270">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4271">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4271">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4272">讓您在使用者在網址列中輸入搜尋字串時，於網址列的建議清單中顯示相關的 Bing 專用 Microsoft Search 建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4272">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4273">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以在 Microsoft Edge 網址列建議清單中看到 Bing 專用 Microsoft Search 提供的內部結果。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4273">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4274">若要查看 Bing 專用 Microsoft Search 結果，使用者必須使用其用於該組織的 Azure AD 帳戶登入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4274">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4275">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法在 Microsoft Edge 網址列建議清單中查看內部結果。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4275">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4276">如果已啟用會強制使用預設搜尋提供者 ([DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled)、[DefaultSearchProviderName](#defaultsearchprovidername) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)) 的原則，且所指定的搜尋提供者不是 Bing，則不適用此原則，在網址列的建議清單中也不會有 Bing 專用 Microsoft Search 建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4276">If you have enabled the set of policies which forces a default search provider ([DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled), [DefaultSearchProviderName](#defaultsearchprovidername) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)), and the search provider specified is not Bing, then this policy is not applicable and there will be no Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4277">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4277">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4278">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4279">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4279">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4280">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4281">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4281">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4282">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4282">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4283">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4283">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4284">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4285">GP 唯一名稱：AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4285">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4286">GP 名稱：在網址列中啟用 Bing 專用 Microsoft Search 建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4286">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4287">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4288">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4288">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4289">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4290">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4291">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4292">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4292">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4293">數值名稱：AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4293">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4294">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4294">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4295">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4295">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4296">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4296">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4297">喜好設定機碼名稱：AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4297">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4298">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4298">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4300">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4300">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4301">含有干擾廣告網站的廣告設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4301">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4302">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4302">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4303">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4303">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4304">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4304">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4305">控制是否在含有干擾廣告的網站上封鎖廣告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4305">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4306">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4306">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4307">AllowAds (1) = 在所有網站上允許廣告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4307">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4308">BlockAds (2) = 在含有侵入式廣告的網站上封鎖廣告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4308">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4309">(預設值)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4309">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4310">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4310">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4311">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4311">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4312">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4312">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4313">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4313">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4314">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4314">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4315">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4315">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4316">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4316">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4317">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4317">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4318">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4318">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4319">GP 唯一名稱：AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4319">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4320">GP 名稱：含有干擾廣告網站的廣告設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4320">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4321">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4321">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4322">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4322">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4323">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4323">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4324">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4324">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4325">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4325">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4326">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4326">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4327">數值名稱：AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4327">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4328">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4328">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4329">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4329">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4330">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4330">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4331">喜好設定機碼名稱：AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4331">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4332">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4332">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4333">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4333">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4334">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4334">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4335">啟用刪除瀏覽器和下載歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4335">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4336">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4336">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4337">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4337">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4338">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4338">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4339">允許刪除瀏覽器歷程記錄和下載歷程記錄，並防止使用者變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4339">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4340">請注意，即使停用此原則，瀏覽和下載歷程記錄也不保證會保留：使用者可以直接編輯或刪除記錄資料庫檔案，而瀏覽器本身可以隨時移除 (根據到期期間) 或封存任何或所有歷程記錄項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4340">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4341">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以刪除瀏覽和下載歷程記錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4341">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4342">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法刪除瀏覽和下載歷程記錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4342">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4343">如果啟用此原則，則請勿啟用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 原則，因為它們全都涉及刪除資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4343">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4344">如果您同時啟用這兩項，則 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 原則優先，並且會在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時刪除所有資料，無論此原則的設定方式如何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4344">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4345">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4345">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4346">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4346">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4347">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4347">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4348">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4348">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4349">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4349">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4350">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4350">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4351">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4351">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4352">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4352">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4353">GP 唯一名稱：AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4353">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4354">GP 名稱：啟用刪除瀏覽器和下載歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4354">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4355">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4355">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4356">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4356">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4357">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4357">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4358">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4358">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4359">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4359">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4360">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4360">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4361">數值名稱：AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4361">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4362">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4362">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4363">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4363">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4364">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4364">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4365">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4365">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4366">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4366">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4367">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4367">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4368">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4368">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4369">允許檔案選取項目對話方塊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4369">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4370">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4370">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4371">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4371">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4372">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4372">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4373">讓 Microsoft Edge 顯示檔案選取對話方塊，允許存取本機檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4373">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4374">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以正常開啟檔案選取對話方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4374">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4375">如果停用此原則，每當使用者執行會觸發檔案選取對話方塊的動作 (例如匯入我的最愛、上傳檔案或儲存連結)，即會改為顯示訊息，並假設使用者已在 [檔案選取] 對話方塊中按一下 [取消]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4375">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4376">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4376">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4377">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4377">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4378">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4378">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4379">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4379">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4380">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4380">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4381">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4381">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4382">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4382">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4383">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4383">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4384">GP 唯一名稱：AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4384">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4385">GP 名稱：允許檔案選取項目對話方塊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4385">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4386">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4386">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4387">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4387">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4388">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4388">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4389">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4389">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4390">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4390">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4391">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4391">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4392">數值名稱：AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4392">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4393">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4393">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4394">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4394">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4395">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4395">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4396">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4396">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4397">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4397">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4398">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4398">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4399">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4399">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4400">允許在卸載網頁期間顯示快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4400">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4401">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4401">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4402">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4402">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4403">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4403">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4404">此原則可讓系統管理員指定網頁可在其卸載期間顯示快顯視窗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4404">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4405">原則設定為已啟用時，則允許在卸載網頁期間顯示快顯視窗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4405">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4406">原則設為已停用或未設定時，則不允許在卸載網頁期間顯示快顯視窗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4406">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4407">這是基於此處的規格：(https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4407">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4408">此原則未來會移除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4408">This policy will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4409">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4409">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4410">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4410">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4411">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4411">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4412">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4412">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4413">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4413">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4414">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4414">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4415">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4415">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4416">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4416">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4417">GP 唯一名稱：AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4417">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4418">GP 名稱：允許在卸載網頁期間顯示快顯視窗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4418">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4419">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4419">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4420">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4420">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4421">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4421">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4422">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4422">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4423">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4423">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4424">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4424">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4425">數值名稱：AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4425">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4426">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4426">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4427">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4427">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4428">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4428">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4429">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4429">Preference Key Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4430">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4430">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4431">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4431">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4432">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4432">AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4433">允許衝浪遊戲</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4433">Allow surf game</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4434">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4434">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4435">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4435">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4436">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4436">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4437">如果停用此原則，當裝置離線或使用者瀏覽至 edge://surf 時，使用者將無法玩衝浪遊戲。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4437">If you disable this policy, users won't be able to play the surf game when the device is offline or if the user navigates to edge://surf.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4438">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以玩衝浪遊戲。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4438">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can play the surf game.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4439">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4439">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4440">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4440">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4441">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4441">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4442">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4442">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4443">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4443">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4444">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4444">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4445">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4445">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4446">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4446">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4447">GP 唯一名稱：AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4447">GP unique name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4448">GP 名稱：允許衝浪遊戲</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4448">GP name: Allow surf game</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4449">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4449">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4450">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4450">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4451">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4451">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4452">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4452">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4453">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4453">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4454">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4454">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4455">數值名稱：AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4455">Value Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4456">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4456">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4457">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4457">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4458">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4458">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4459">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4459">Preference Key Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4460">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4460">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4461">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4461">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4462">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4462">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4463">允許頁面在頁面關閉期間傳送同步 XHR 要求 (已淘汰)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4463">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-4464">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4464">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4465">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4465">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4466">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4466">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4467">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4467">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4468">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4468">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4469">此原則已遭取代，因為此原則只是一個短期機制，用於讓企業在發現其 Web 內容與變更不一致，而使頁面關閉期間不允許同步 XHR 要求時，可以有更多時間來更新其 Web 內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4469">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4470">無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 88 中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4470">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 88.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4471">此原則可讓您指定頁面可以在頁面關閉期間傳送同步 XHR 要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4471">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4472">如果啟用此原則，則頁面可以在頁面關閉期間傳送同步 XHR 要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4472">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4473">如果停用或未設定此原則，則不允許頁面在頁面關閉期間傳送同步 XHR 要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4473">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4474">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4474">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4475">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4475">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4476">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4476">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4477">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4477">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4478">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4478">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4479">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4479">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4480">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4480">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4481">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4481">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4482">GP 唯一名稱：AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4482">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4483">GP 名稱：允許頁面在頁面關閉期間傳送同步 XHR 要求 (已淘汰)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4483">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4484">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4484">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4485">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4485">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4486">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4486">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4487">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4487">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4488">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4488">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4489">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4489">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4490">數值名稱：AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4490">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4491">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4491">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4492">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4492">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4493">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4493">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4494">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4494">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4495">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4495">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4496">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4496">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4497">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4497">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4498">設定 Microsoft Edge 將嘗試建立與 [權杖繫結] 連結的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4498">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4499">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4499">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4500">Windows 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4500">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4501">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4501">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4502">為瀏覽器將嘗試與其執行權杖繫結通訊協定之網站，設定 URL 模式清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4502">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4503">對於此清單上的網域，瀏覽器將會在 TLS 交握中傳送權杖繫結 ClientHello (請參閱 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4503">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4504">如果伺服器以有效的 ServerHello 回應回覆，瀏覽器將會在後續的 HTTPS 要求中建立並傳送權杖繫結訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4504">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4505">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4505">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>
