<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4506">如果此清單為空白，則會停用權杖繫結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4506">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4507">此原則僅在具備虛擬安全模式功能的 Windows 10 裝置上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4507">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4508">從 Microsoft Edge 版本 86 開始，此原則不再支援動態重新整理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4508">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4509">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4509">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4510">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4510">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4511">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4511">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4512">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4512">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4513">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4513">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4514">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4514">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4515">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4515">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4516">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4516">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4517">GP 唯一名稱：AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4517">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4518">GP 名稱：設定 Microsoft Edge 將嘗試建立權杖繫結的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4518">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4519">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4519">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4520">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4520">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4521">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4521">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4522">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4522">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4523">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4523">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4524">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4524">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4525">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4525">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4526">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4526">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4527">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4527">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4528">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4528">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4529">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4529">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4530">設定特定網站的防止追蹤例外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4530">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4531">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4531">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4532">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4532">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4533">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4533">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4534">設定要從防止追蹤中排除的 URL 模式清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4534">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4535">如果設定此原則，則會將已設定 URL 模式的清單從防止追蹤中排除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4535">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4536">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自「封鎖使用者的網頁瀏覽活動追蹤」原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4536">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4537">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4537">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4538">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4538">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4539">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4539">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4540">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4540">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4541">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4541">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4542">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4542">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4543">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4543">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4544">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4544">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4545">GP 唯一名稱：AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4545">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4546">GP 名稱：設定特定網站的防止追蹤例外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4546">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4547">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4547">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4548">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4548">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4549">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4549">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4550">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4550">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4551">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4551">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4552">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4552">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4553">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4553">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4554">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4554">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4555">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4555">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4556">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4556">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4557">喜好設定機碼名稱：AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4557">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4558">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4558">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4559">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4559">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4560">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4560">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4561">當找不到網頁時，推薦類似的頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4561">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4562">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4562">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4563">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4563">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4564">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4564">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4565">允許 Microsoft Edge 向 Web 服務發出連線，以針對連線問題 (例如 DNS 錯誤) 產生 URL 和搜尋建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4565">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4566">如果啟用此原則，則會使用 Web 服務來產生 URL 並搜尋網路錯誤的建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4566">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4567">如果停用此原則，則不會對 Web 服務進行呼叫，且會顯示標準錯誤頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4567">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4568">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會遵守 edge://settings/privacy 的 [服務] 底下所設定的使用者喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4568">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4569">具體來說，使用者可以將 **[找不到網頁時，推薦類似的頁面]** 切換為開啟或關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4569">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4570">請注意，如果您已啟用此原則 (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled)，則會開啟 [找不到網頁時，推薦類似的頁面] 設定，但使用者無法使用切換來變更設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4570">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4571">如果您停用此原則，則會關閉 [找不到網頁時，推薦類似的頁面] 設定，且使用者無法使用切換來變更設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4571">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4572">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4572">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4573">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4573">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4574">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4574">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4575">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4575">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4576">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4576">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4577">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4577">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4578">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4578">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4579">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4579">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4580">GP 唯一名稱：AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4580">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4581">GP 名稱：找不到網頁時，推薦類似的頁面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4581">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4582">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4582">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4583">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4583">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4584">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4584">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4585">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4585">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4586">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4586">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4587">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4587">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4588">數值名稱：AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4588">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4589">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4589">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4590">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4590">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4591">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4591">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4592">喜好設定機碼名稱：AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4592">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4593">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4593">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4594">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4594">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4595">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4595">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4596">一律在外部開啟 PDF 檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4596">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4597">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4597">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4598">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4598">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4599">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4599">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4600">停用 Microsoft Edge 中的內部 PDF 檢視器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4600">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4601">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會將 PDF 檔案視為下載項目，並讓使用者使用預設應用程式開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4601">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4602">如果未設定或停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會開啟 PDF 檔案 (除非使用者停用)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4602">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4603">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4603">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4604">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4604">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4605">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4605">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4606">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4606">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4607">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4607">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4608">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4608">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4609">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4609">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4610">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4610">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4611">GP 唯一名稱：AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4611">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4612">GP 名稱：一律在外部開啟 PDF 檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4612">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4613">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4613">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4614">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4614">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4615">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4615">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4616">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4616">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4617">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4617">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4618">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4618">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4619">數值名稱：AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4619">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4620">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4620">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4621">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4621">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4622">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4622">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4623">喜好設定機碼名稱：AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4623">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4624">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4624">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4625">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4625">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4626">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4626">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4627">針對 InPrivate 和來賓設定檔啟用環境驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4627">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4628">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4628">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4629">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4629">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4630">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4630">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4631">設定此原則以允許/禁止針對 Microsoft Edge 中的 InPrivate 和來賓設定檔執行環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4631">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4632">當未透過 NTLM/Kerberos/交涉挑戰/回應配置提供顯式認證時，環境驗證是使用預設認證的 HTTP 驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4632">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4633">如果將原則設定為 ‘RegularOnly’，則只會允許一般工作階段的環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4633">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4634">不允許 InPrivate 和來賓工作階段進行環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4634">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4635">如果將原則設定為 ‘InPrivateAndRegular’，則會允許 InPrivate 和一般工作階段的環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4635">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4636">不允許來賓工作階段進行環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4636">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4637">如果將原則設定為 ‘GuestAndRegular’，則會允許來賓和一般工作階段的環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4637">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4638">不允許 InPrivate 工作階段進行環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4638">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4639">如果將原則設定為 ‘All’，則會允許所有工作階段的環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4639">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4640">請注意，一般設定檔上一律會允許進行環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4640">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4641">在 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 及更新版本中，如果將原則保留未設定，則僅會在一般工作階段中啟用環境驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4641">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4642">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4642">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4643">RegularOnly (0) = 僅在一般工作階段中啟用環境驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4643">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4644">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = 在 InPrivate 和一般工作階段中啟用環境驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4644">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4645">GuestAndRegular (2) = 在來賓和一般工作階段中啟用環境驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4645">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4646">All (3) = 在一般、InPrivate 和來賓工作階段中啟用環境驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4646">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4647">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4647">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4648">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4648">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4649">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4649">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4650">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4650">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4651">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4651">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4652">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4652">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4653">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4653">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4654">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4654">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4655">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4655">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4656">GP 唯一名稱：AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4656">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4657">GP 名稱：針對 InPrivate 和來賓設定檔啟用環境驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4657">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4658">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4658">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4659">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4659">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4660">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4660">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4661">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4661">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4662">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4662">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4663">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4663">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4664">數值名稱：AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4664">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4665">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4665">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4666">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4666">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4667">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4667">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4668">喜好設定機碼名稱：AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4668">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4669">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4669">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4670">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4670">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4671">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4671">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4672">允許重新啟用 AppCache 功能 (即使此功能預設為關閉的狀態) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4672">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4673">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4673">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4674">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4674">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4675">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4675">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4676">如果您將此原則設定為 true，系統會啟用 AppCache，即使預設值為不提供 Microsoft Edge 中的 AppCache。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4676">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4677">如果您將此原則設為 false 或未設定，AppCache 將會依照 Microsoft Edge 的預設值決定是否啟用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4677">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4678">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4678">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4679">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4679">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4680">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4680">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4681">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4681">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4682">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4682">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4683">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4683">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4684">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4684">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4685">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4685">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4686">GP 唯一名稱：AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4686">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4687">GP 名稱：允許重新啟用 AppCache 功能 (即使此功能預設為關閉狀態) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4687">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4688">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4688">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4689">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4689">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4690">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4690">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4691">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4691">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4692">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4692">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4693">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4693">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4694">數值名稱：AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4694">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4695">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4695">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4696">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4696">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4697">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4697">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4698">喜好設定機碼名稱：AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4698">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4699">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4699">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4700">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4700">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4701">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4701">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4702">設定應用程式地區設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4702">Set application locale</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4703">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4703">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4704">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4704">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4705">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4705">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4706">設定 Microsoft Edge 中的應用程式地區設定，並防止使用者變更地區設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4706">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4707">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用指定的地區設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4707">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4708">如果不支援所設定的地區設定，則會改用 'en-US'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4708">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4709">如果停用或未設定此設定，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用使用者指定偏好地區設定 (如果已設定) 或後援地區設定 'en-US'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4709">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4710">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4710">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4711">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4711">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4712">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4712">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4713">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4713">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4714">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4714">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4715">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4715">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4716">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4716">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4717">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4717">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4718">GP 唯一名稱：ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4718">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4719">GP 名稱：設定應用程式地區設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4719">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4720">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4720">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4721">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4721">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4722">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4722">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4723">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4723">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4724">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4724">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4725">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4725">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4726">數值名稱：ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4726">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4727">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4727">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4728">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4728">Example value:</span></span>
```
"en"
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4729">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4729">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4730">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4730">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4731">允許或封鎖音訊擷取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4731">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4732">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4732">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4733">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4733">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4734">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4734">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4735">允許您設定是否提示使用者授與網站其音訊擷取裝置的存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4735">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4736">此原則適用於所有 URL，[AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 清單中設定的除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4736">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4737">如果啟用此原則或未設定 (預設值)，則會提示使用者輸入音訊擷取存取權 ([AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 清單中的 URL 除外)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4737">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4738">這些列出的 URL 會獲授與存取權，且不會提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4738">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4739">如果停用此原則，則不會提示使用者，且音訊擷取僅可供 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 中設定的 URL 存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4739">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4740">此原則會影響所有類型的音訊輸入，而不僅僅是內建的麥克風。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4740">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4741">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4741">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4742">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4742">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4743">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4743">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4744">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4744">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4745">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4745">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4746">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4746">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4747">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4747">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4748">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4748">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4749">GP 唯一名稱：AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4749">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4750">GP 名稱：允許或封鎖音訊擷取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4750">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4751">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4751">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4752">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4752">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4753">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4753">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4754">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4754">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4755">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4755">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4756">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4756">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4757">數值名稱：AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4757">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4758">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4758">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4759">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4759">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4760">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4760">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4761">喜好設定機碼名稱：AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4761">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4762">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4762">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4763">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4763">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4764">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4764">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4765">無需要求權限即可存取音訊擷取裝置的網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4765">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4766">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4766">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4767">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4767">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4768">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4768">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4769">根據 URL 模式指定可使用音訊擷取裝置的網站，而不詢問使用者提供權限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4769">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4770">此清單中的模式會對照要求端 URL 的安全性來源進行比對。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4770">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4771">如果符合，則網站會自動獲授與音訊擷取裝置的存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4771">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4772">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4772">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4773">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4773">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4774">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4774">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4775">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4775">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4776">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4776">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4777">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4777">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4778">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4778">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4779">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4779">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4780">GP 唯一名稱：AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4780">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4781">GP 名稱：無需要求權限即可存取音訊擷取裝置的網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4781">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4782">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4782">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4783">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4783">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4784">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4784">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4785">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4785">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4786">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4786">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4787">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4787">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4788">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4788">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4789">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4789">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4790">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4790">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4791">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4791">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4792">喜好設定機碼名稱：AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4792">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4793">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4793">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4794">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4794">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4795">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4795">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4796">允許音訊沙盒執行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4796">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4797">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4797">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4798">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4798">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4799">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4799">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4800">此原則會控制音訊處理程序沙盒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4800">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4801">如果啟用此原則，則音訊處理程序會在沙盒中執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4801">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4802">如果停用此原則，音訊處理程序將不在沙盒中執行，而 WebRTC 音訊處理模組將在轉譯器處理程序中執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4802">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4803">這會讓使用者處於與不在沙盒中執行音訊子系統相關的安全性風險。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4803">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4804">如果未設定此原則，則會使用音訊沙盒的預設設定，這可能會因平台而有所不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4804">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4805">此原則的目的是讓企業能夠在他們使用會干擾沙盒的安全性軟體設定時，有彈性可停用音訊沙盒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4805">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4806">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4806">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4807">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4807">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4808">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4808">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4809">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4809">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4810">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4810">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4811">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4811">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4812">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4812">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4813">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4813">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4814">GP 唯一名稱：AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4814">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4815">GP 名稱：允許音訊沙盒執行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4815">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4816">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4816">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4817">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4817">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4818">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4818">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4819">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4819">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4820">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4820">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4821">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4821">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4822">數值名稱：AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4822">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4823">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4823">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4824">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4824">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4825">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4825">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4826">喜好設定機碼名稱：AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4826">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4827">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4827">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4828">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4828">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4829">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4829">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4830">在首次執行時，自動匯入其他瀏覽器的資料和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4830">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4831">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4831">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4832">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4832">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4833">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4833">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4834">如果啟用此原則，則來自指定瀏覽器的所有支援資料類型和設定都會在初次執行時以無訊息方式自動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4834">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4835">在初次執行體驗期間，也會略過匯入區段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4835">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

 

   

  

   

  

    

    

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4836">來自舊版 Microsoft Edge 的瀏覽器資料，一律會在初次執行時以無訊息方式移轉，而無論此原則的值為何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4836">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4837">如果將此原則設為 'FromDefaultBrowser'，則會匯入與受管理裝置上的預設瀏覽器對應的資料類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4837">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4838">如果受管理的裝置中未出現指定為此原則的值的瀏覽器，Microsoft Edge 將直接略過匯入，而不會通知使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4838">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4839">如果將此原則設定為 'DisabledAutoImport'，則會完全略過初次執行體驗的匯入部分，且 Microsoft Edge 不會自動匯入瀏覽器資料和設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4839">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4840">如果將此原則設定為 'FromInternetExplorer'，則會從 Internet Explorer 匯入下列資料類型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4840">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4841">我的最愛或書籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4841">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4842">儲存的密碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4842">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4843">搜尋引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4843">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4844">瀏覽歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4844">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4845">首頁</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4845">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4846">如果將此原則設定為 'FromGoogleChrome'，則會從 Google Chrome 匯入下列資料類型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4846">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4847">我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4847">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4848">儲存的密碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4848">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4849">地址及其他資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4849">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4850">付款資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4850">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4851">瀏覽歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4851">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4852">設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4852">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4853">釘選和開啟的索引標籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4853">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4854">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4854">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4855">Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4855">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4856">注意：如需有關從 Google Chrome 匯入之內容的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4856">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4857">如果將此原則設定為 'FromSafari'，使用者資料就不再匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4857">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4858">這是因為在 Mac 上使用完整的磁片存取方式所致。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4858">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4859">在 macOS Mojave 及更新版本中，Safari 資料不可能再自動匯入到 Microsoft Edge 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4859">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
 

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4860">從 Microsoft Edge 版本 83 開始，如果此原則設定為 'FromMozillaFirefox'，則會從 Mozilla Firefox 匯入下列資料類型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4860">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4861">我的最愛或書籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4861">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4862">儲存的密碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4862">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4863">地址及其他資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4863">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4864">瀏覽歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4864">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4865">如果您想要限制特定資料類型無法在受管理的裝置上匯入，您可以將此原則與 [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata)、[ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings)、[ImportFavorites](#importfavorites) 等其他原則搭配使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4865">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4866">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4866">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4867">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = 從預設瀏覽器自動匯入所有支援的資料類型和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4867">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4868">FromInternetExplorer (1) = 從 Internet Explorer 自動匯入所有支援的資料類型和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4868">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4869">FromGoogleChrome (2) = 從 Google Chrome 自動匯入所有支援的資料類型和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4869">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4870">FromSafari (3) = 從 Safari 自動匯入所有支援的資料類型和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4870">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4871">DisabledAutoImport (4) = 停用自動匯入，並略過初次執行體驗的匯入區段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4871">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4872">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = 從 Mozilla Firefox 自動匯入所有支援的資料類型和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4872">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4873">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4873">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4874">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4874">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4875">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4875">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4876">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4876">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4877">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4877">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4878">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4878">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4879">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4879">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4880">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4880">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4881">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4881">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4882">GP 唯一名稱：AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4882">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4883">GP 名稱：在首次執行時，自動匯入其他瀏覽器的資料和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4883">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4884">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4884">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4885">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4885">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4886">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4886">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4887">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4887">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4888">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4888">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4889">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4889">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4890">數值名稱：AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4890">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4891">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4891">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4892">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4892">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4893">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4893">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4894">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4894">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4895">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4895">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4896">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4896">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4897">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4897">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4898">定義一份協定清單，可在不須提示使用者的情下，從列出的來源啟動外部應用程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4898">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4899">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4899">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4900">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4900">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4901">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4901">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4902">可讓您設定一份協定的清單，以及每個協定相關聯的 [允許的來源模式] 清單，以便在不提示使用者的情況下啟動外部應用程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4902">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4903">在列出清單時，不應包含尾端分隔符號。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4903">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4904">例如，列出「skype」，而不是「skype:」或「skype://」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4904">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4905">若您設定了此原則，則只有在下列情況下，才允許協定在不使用原則提示下啟動外部應用程式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4905">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4906">將協定列於</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4906">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4907">嘗試啟動協定的網站來源，符合此協定的 allowed_origins 清單中的其中一個原始模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4907">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4908">如果其中一個條件設為 false，原則將不會省略外部通訊提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4908">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4909">如果您未設定此原則，系統不會啟動任何協定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4909">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4910">使用者可以在每個協定/每個網站上退出提示，除非將 [ ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) 原則設為 [停用]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4910">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4911">此原則不會影響使用者設定的每個通訊協定/每個網站的提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4911">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4912">「來源比對」模式使用類似格式，適合 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 原則，文件儲存在 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4912">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4913">然而，此原則的「來源比對」模式不能包含 "/path" 或 "@query" 元素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4913">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4914">任何含有 "/path" 或 "@query" 元素的模式都會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4914">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4915">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4915">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4916">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4916">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4917">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4917">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4918">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4918">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4919">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4919">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4920">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4920">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4921">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4921">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4922">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4922">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4923">GP 唯一名稱：AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4923">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4924">GP 名稱：定義一份協定清單，可從列出的來源啟動外部應用程式，且不須提示使用者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4924">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4925">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4925">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4926">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4926">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4927">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4927">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4928">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4928">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4929">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4929">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4930">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4930">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4931">數值名稱：AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4931">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4932">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4932">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4933">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4933">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4934">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4934">Mac information and settings</span></span>
