  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4935">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4935">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4936">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4936">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4937">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4937">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4938">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4938">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4939">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes 可以套用 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4939">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4940">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4940">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4941">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4941">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4942">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4942">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4943">適用 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 的URLs 清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4943">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4944">此原則不會影響使用者透過下載區設定的自動開啟值... >「永遠開啟這種類型的檔案」功能表項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4944">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4945">若您將 URLs 設在此原則內，只要此 URL 屬於這個集合，且該檔案類型為 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)所列之一，系統會利用此原則自動開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4945">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4946">如果其中一個條件為 false，則下載不會根據原則自動開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4946">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4947">若您未設定此原則，所有文件類型在 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 的下載皆可自動打開。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4947">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4948">URL 模式的格式必須依照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4948">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4949">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4949">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4950">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4950">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4951">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4951">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4952">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4952">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4953">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4953">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4954">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4954">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4955">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4955">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4956">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4956">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4957">GP 唯一名稱：AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4957">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4958">GP 名稱：AutoOpenFileTypes 可以套用的 URLs </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4958">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4959">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4959">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4960">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4960">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4961">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4961">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4962">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4962">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4963">路徑 (強制)： SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4963">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4964">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4964">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4965">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4965">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4966">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4966">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4967">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4967">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4968">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4968">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4969">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4969">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4970">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4970">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4971">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4971">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4972">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4972">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4973">檔案類型清單應在下載時自動開啟</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4973">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4974">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4974">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4975">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4975">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4976">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4976">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4977">此原則設定的檔案類型清單應在下載時自動開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4977">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4978">注意：在列出檔案類型時，不應包含前置分隔符號，因此請列出 "txt"，而不是 ".txt"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4978">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4979">根據預設，系統會自動開啟所有 URLs 的檔案類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4979">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4980">您可以使用 [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) 原則限制可自動開啟這些檔案類型的 URLs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4980">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4981">應自動開啟的檔案類型，仍會受到已啟用的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 檢查，若未能通過檢查，系統即不會開啟這些檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4981">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4982">使用者已指定要自動開啟的檔案類型，將會在下載時持續自動開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4982">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4983">使用者仍可繼續指定其他要自動開啟的檔案類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4983">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4984">若您未設定此原則，只有經使用者指定要自動開啟的檔案類型，才會在下載時持續自動開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4984">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>

              

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-4985">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4985">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4986">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4986">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4987">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4987">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4988">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4988">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4989">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4989">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4990">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4990">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4991">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4991">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4992">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4992">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4993">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4993">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4994">GP 唯一名稱：AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4994">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4995">GP 名稱：檔案類型清單應在下載時自動開啟</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4995">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4996">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4996">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4997">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4997">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4998">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4998">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-4999">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-4999">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5000">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5000">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5001">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5001">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5002">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5002">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5003">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5003">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5004">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5004">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5005">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5005">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5006">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5006">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5007">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5007">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5008">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5008">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5009">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5009">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5010">啟用地址自動填寫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5010">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5011">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5011">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5012">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5012">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5013">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5013">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5014">啟用自動填寫功能，並允許使用者使用先前儲存的資訊自動完成網頁表單中的地址資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5014">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5015">如果停用此原則，則自動填寫不會建議或填入地址資訊，也不會儲存使用者在瀏覽網頁時可能提交的其他地址資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5015">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5016">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以在使用者介面中控制地址的自動填寫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5016">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5017">請注意，如果停用此原則，則也會停止所有網頁表單的所有活動，付款和密碼表單除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5017">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5018">不會儲存更多項目，且 Microsoft Edge 將不會建議或自動填寫任何先前的項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5018">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5019">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5019">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5020">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5020">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5021">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5021">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5022">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5022">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5023">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5023">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5024">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5024">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5025">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5025">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5026">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5026">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5027">GP 唯一名稱：AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5027">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5028">GP 名稱：啟用地址自動填寫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5028">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5029">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5029">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5030">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5030">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5031">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5031">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5032">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5032">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5033">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5033">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5034">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5034">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5035">數值名稱：AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5035">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5036">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5036">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5037">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5037">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5038">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5038">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5039">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5039">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5040">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5040">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5041">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5041">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5042">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5042">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5043">啟用信用卡自動填寫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5043">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5044">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5044">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5045">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5045">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5046">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5046">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5047">啟用 Microsoft Edge 的自動填寫功能，並讓使用者使用先前儲存的資訊自動完成網頁表單中的信用卡資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5047">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5048">如果停用此原則，則自動填寫不會建議或填入信用卡資訊，也不會儲存使用者在瀏覽網頁時可能提交的其他信用卡資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5048">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5049">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以控制信用卡的自動填寫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5049">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5050">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5050">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5051">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5051">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5052">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5052">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5053">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5053">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5054">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5054">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5055">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5055">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5056">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5056">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5057">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5057">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5058">GP 唯一名稱：AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5058">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5059">GP 名稱：啟用信用卡自動填寫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5059">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5060">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5060">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5061">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5061">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5062">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5062">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5063">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5063">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5064">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5064">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5065">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5065">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5066">數值名稱：AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5066">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5067">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5067">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5068">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5068">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5069">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5069">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5070">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5070">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5071">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5071">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5072">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5072">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5073">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5073">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5074">允許網站自動播放媒體</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5074">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5075">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5075">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5076">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5076">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5077">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5077">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5078">此原則會設定網站的媒體自動播放原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5078">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5079">預設設定 [尚未設定] 會遵守目前的媒體自動播放設定，並可讓使用者設定其自動播放設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5079">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5080">設定為 [已啟用] 會將媒體自動播放設定為「允許」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5080">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5081">允許所有網站自動播放媒體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5081">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5082">使用者無法覆寫此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5082">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5083">設定設為 [已停用] 會將媒體自動播放設定為「封鎖」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5083">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5084">不允許任何網站自動播放媒體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5084">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5085">使用者無法覆寫此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5085">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5086">需要關閉索引標籤並重新開啟，此原則才能生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5086">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5087">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5087">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5088">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5088">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5089">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5089">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5090">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5090">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5091">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5091">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5092">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5092">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5093">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5093">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5094">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5094">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5095">GP 唯一名稱：AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5095">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5096">GP 名稱：允許網站自動播放媒體</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5096">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5097">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5097">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5098">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5098">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5099">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5099">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5100">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5100">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5101">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5101">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5102">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5102">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5103">數值名稱：AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5103">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5104">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5104">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5105">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5105">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5106">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5106">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5107">喜好設定機碼名稱：AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5107">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5108">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5108">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5109">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5109">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5110">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5110">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5111">在 Microsoft Edge 關閉後繼續執行背景應用程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5111">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5112">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5112">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5113">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5113">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5114">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5114">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5115">允許 Microsoft Edge 處理程序在 OS 登入時啟動，並持續執行直到最後一個瀏覽器視窗關閉為止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5115">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5116">在此案例中，背景應用程式和目前瀏覽工作階段會保持作用中，包括任何工作階段 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5116">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5117">開啟中的背景處理程序會在系統匣中顯示圖示，且一律能從該位置關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5117">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5118">如果啟用此原則，則會開啟背景模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5118">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5119">如果停用此原則，則背景模式會關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5119">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5120">如果未設定此原則，則最初會關閉背景模式，而使用者可以在 edge://settings/system 中設定其行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5120">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5121">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5121">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5122">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5122">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5123">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5123">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5124">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5124">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5125">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5125">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5126">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5126">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5127">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5127">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5128">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5128">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5129">GP 唯一名稱：BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5129">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5130">GP 名稱：在 Microsoft Edge 關閉後繼續執行背景應用程式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5130">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5131">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5131">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5132">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5132">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5133">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5133">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5134">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5134">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5135">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5135">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5136">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5136">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5137">數值名稱：BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5137">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5138">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5138">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5139">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5139">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5140">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5140">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5141">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5141">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5142">啟用對集錦的可用範本和使用範本的其他功能的清單進行背景更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5142">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5143">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5143">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5144">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5144">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5145">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5145">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5146">讓您啟用或停用對集錦的可用範本和使用範本的其他功能的清單進行背景更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5146">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5147">範本用來在您將頁面儲存到集錦時，從網頁中擷取豐富的中繼資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5147">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5148">如果啟用此設定或未設定此設定，則會每隔 24 小時在背景中透過 Microsoft 服務下載可用的範本清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5148">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5149">如果停用此設定，則會在需要時下載可用範本清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5149">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5150">這類型的下載可能會導致集錦及其他功能的效能些微降低。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5150">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5151">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5151">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5152">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5152">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5153">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5153">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5154">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5154">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5155">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5155">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5156">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5156">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5157">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5157">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5158">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5158">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5159">GP 唯一名稱：BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5159">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5160">GP 名稱：啟用對集錦的可用範本和使用範本的其他功能的清單進行背景更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5160">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5161">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5161">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5162">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5162">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5163">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5163">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5164">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5164">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5165">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5165">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5166">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5166">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5167">數值名稱：BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5167">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5168">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5168">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5169">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5169">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5170">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5170">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5171">喜好設定機碼名稱：BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5171">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5172">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5172">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5173">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5173">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5174">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5174">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5175">封鎖 Bing 搜尋結果中的所有廣告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5175">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5176">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5176">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5177">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5177">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5178">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5178">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5179">在 Bing.com 上啟用無廣告的搜尋體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5179">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5180">如果啟用此原則，則使用者可以在 bing.com 上搜尋，並提供無廣告的搜尋體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5180">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5181">同時，安全搜尋設定會設定為「嚴格」，而且無法由使用者變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5181">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5182">如果未設定此原則，則預設體驗會在 bing.com 的搜尋結果中出現廣告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5182">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5183">安全搜尋會預設設為「中等」，並且可由使用者變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5183">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5184">此原則僅適用由 Microsoft 識別為 EDU 租用戶的 K-12 SKU。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5184">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5185">請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711)，以深入了解此原則或下列案例是否適合您：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5185">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5186">您有 EDU 租用戶，但原則沒有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5186">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5187">您將您的 IP 加入白名單，以獲得無廣告的搜尋體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5187">You had your IP whitelisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5188">您在 Microsoft Edge 舊版中擁有無廣告的搜尋體驗，並想要升級至新版 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5188">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5189">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5189">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5190">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5190">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5191">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5191">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5192">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5192">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5193">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5193">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5194">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5194">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5195">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5195">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5196">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5196">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5197">GP 唯一名稱：BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5197">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5198">GP 名稱：封鎖 Bing 搜尋結果中的所有廣告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5198">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5199">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5199">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5200">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5200">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5201">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5201">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5202">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5202">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5203">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5203">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5204">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5204">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5205">數值名稱：BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5205">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5206">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5206">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5207">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5207">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5208">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5208">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5209">喜好設定機碼名稱：BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5209">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5210">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5210">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5211">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5211">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5212">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5212">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5213">封鎖第三方 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5213">Block third party cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5214">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5214">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5215">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5215">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5216">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5216">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5217">封鎖不是來自網址列中網域的網頁元素，使其無法設定 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5217">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5218">如果啟用此原則，則網址列中不是來自網域的網頁元素就無法設定 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5218">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5219">如果停用此原則，來自網址列以外網域的網頁元素可以設定 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5219">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5220">如果未設定此原則，則會啟用協力廠商 Cookie，但使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5220">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5221">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5221">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5222">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5222">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5223">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5223">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5224">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5224">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5225">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5225">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5226">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5226">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5227">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5227">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5228">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5228">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5229">GP 唯一名稱：BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5229">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5230">GP 名稱：封鎖第三方 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5230">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5231">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5231">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5232">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5232">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5233">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5233">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5234">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5234">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5235">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5235">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5236">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5236">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5237">數值名稱：BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5237">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5238">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5238">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5239">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5239">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5240">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5240">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5241">喜好設定機碼名稱：BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5241">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5242">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5242">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5243">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5243">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5244">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5244">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5245">啟用從 [身分識別] 飛出視窗功能表或 [設定] 頁面建立設定檔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5245">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5246">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5246">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5247">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5247">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5248">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5248">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5249">允許使用者使用 [新增個人檔案]\*\*\*\* 選項建立新的設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5249">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5250">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則 Microsoft Edge 會允許使用者使用 [身分識別] 飛出視窗功能表或 [設定] 頁面上的 [新增個人檔案]\*\*\*\* 來建立新的個人檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5250">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5251">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法從 [身分識別] 飛出視窗功能表或 [設定] 頁面新增設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5251">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5252">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5252">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5253">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5253">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5254">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5254">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5255">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5255">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5256">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5256">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5257">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5257">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5258">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5258">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5259">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5259">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5260">GP 唯一名稱：BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5260">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5261">GP 名稱：啟用從 [身分識別] 飛出視窗功能表或 [設定] 頁面建立設定檔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5261">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5262">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5262">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5263">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5263">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5264">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5264">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5265">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5265">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5266">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5266">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5267">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5267">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5268">數值名稱：BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5268">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5269">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5269">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5270">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5270">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5271">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5271">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5272">喜好設定機碼名稱：BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5272">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5273">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5273">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5274">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5274">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5275">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5275">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5276">啟用來賓模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5276">Enable guest mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5277">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5277">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5278">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5278">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5279">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5279">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5280">啟用可允許在 Microsoft Edge 中使用來賓設定檔的選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5280">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5281">在來賓設定檔中，瀏覽器不會從現有設定檔匯入瀏覽資料，而且會在所有來賓設定檔關閉時刪除瀏覽資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5281">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5282">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則 Microsoft Edge 會讓使用者在來賓設定檔中瀏覽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5282">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5283">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 不會讓使用者使用來賓設定檔瀏覽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5283">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5284">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5284">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5285">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5285">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5286">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5286">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5287">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5287">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5288">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5288">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5289">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5289">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5290">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5290">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5291">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5291">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5292">GP 唯一名稱：BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5292">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5293">GP 名稱：啟用來賓模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5293">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5294">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5294">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5295">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5295">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5296">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5296">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5297">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5297">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5298">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5298">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5299">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5299">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5300">數值名稱：BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5300">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5301">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5301">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5302">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5302">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5303">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5303">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5304">喜好設定機碼名稱：BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5304">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5305">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5305">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5306">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5306">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5307">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5307">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5308">允許查詢瀏覽器網路時間服務</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5308">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5309">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5309">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5310">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5310">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5311">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5311">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5312">防止 Microsoft Edge 偶爾傳送查詢至瀏覽器網路時間服務，以擷取準確的時間戳記。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5312">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5313">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將會停止將查詢傳送至瀏覽器網路時間服務。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5313">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5314">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則 Microsoft Edge 會偶爾將查詢傳送至瀏覽器網路時間服務。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5314">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5315">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5315">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5316">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5316">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5317">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5317">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5318">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5318">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5319">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5319">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5320">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5320">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5321">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5321">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5322">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5322">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5323">GP 唯一名稱：BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5323">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5324">GP 名稱：允許查詢瀏覽器網路時間服務</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5324">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5325">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5325">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5326">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5326">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5327">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5327">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5328">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5328">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5329">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5329">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5330">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5330">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5331">數值名稱：BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5331">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5332">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5332">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5333">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5333">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5334">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5334">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5335">喜好設定機碼名稱：BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5335">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5336">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5336">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5337">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5337">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5338">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5338">BrowserSignin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5339">瀏覽器登入設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5339">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5340">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5340">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5341">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5341">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5342">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5342">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5343">指定使用者是否可以使用其帳戶登入 Microsoft Edge，並使用與帳戶相關的服務，例如同步和單一登入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5343">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5344">若要控制同步的可用性，請改用 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5344">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5345">如果將此原則設定為 ‘停用’，請確定也將 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 原則設定為已停用，因為 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 會停用自動登入瀏覽器設定檔的建立。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5345">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5346">如果這兩個原則都已設定，則 Microsoft Edge 將會使用 [停用瀏覽器登入] 原則，並如同 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 設為已停用般執行動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5346">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5347">如果將此原則設定為 ‘啟用’，則使用者可以登入瀏覽器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5347">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5348">登入瀏覽器並不代表同步會預設開啟；而使用者必須另行選擇加入，才能使用此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5348">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5349">如果將此原則設定為 ‘強制’，則使用者必須登入設定檔才能使用瀏覽器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5349">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5350">依預設，這會允許使用者選擇是否要同步到自己的帳戶，除非由網域系統管理員或使用 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 原則停用同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5350">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5351">[BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) 原則的預設值設定為 false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5351">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5352">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以決定是否要啟用瀏覽器登入選項，並在適合時使用該選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5352">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5353">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5353">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5354">停用 (0) = 停用瀏覽器登入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5354">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5355">啟用 (1) = 啟用瀏覽器登入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5355">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5356">強制 (2) = 強制使用者登入才能使用瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5356">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5357">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5357">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5358">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5358">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5359">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5359">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5360">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5360">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5361">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5361">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5362">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5362">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5363">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5363">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5364">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5364">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5365">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5365">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5366">GP 唯一名稱：BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5366">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5367">GP 名稱：瀏覽器登入設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5367">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
