  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5368">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5368">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5369">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5369">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5370">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5370">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5371">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5371">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5372">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5372">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5373">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5373">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5374">數值名稱：BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5374">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5375">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5375">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5376">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5376">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5377">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5377">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5378">喜好設定機碼名稱：BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5378">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5379">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5379">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5380">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5380">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5381">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5381">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5382">使用內建的 DNS 用戶端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5382">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5383">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5383">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5384">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5384">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5385">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5385">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5386">控制是否使用內建的 DNS 用戶端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5386">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5387">這不會影響所使用的 DNS 伺服器；只有用來與它們通訊的軟體堆疊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5387">This does not affect which DNS servers are used; just the software stack which is used to communicate with them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5388">例如，如果作業系統設定為使用企業 DNS 伺服器，則內建 DNS 用戶端將會使用相同的伺服器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5388">For example if the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5389">不過，內建的 DNS 用戶端可能會使用更現代的 DNS 相關通訊協定 (例如 DNS-over-TLS)，以不同的方式來為伺服器定址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5389">It is however possible that the built-in DNS client will address servers in different ways by using more modern DNS-related protocols such as DNS-over-TLS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5390">如果啟用此原則，則會使用內建的 DNS 用戶端 (如果可用)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5390">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5391">如果停用此原則，則永遠不會使用用戶端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5391">If you disable this policy, the client is never used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5392">如果未設定此原則，則內建的 DNS 用戶端預設會在 MacOS 上啟用，且使用者可以透過編輯 edge://flags 或指定命令列旗標來變更是否使用內建的 DNS 用戶端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5392">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default on MacOS, and users can change whether to use the built-in DNS client by editing edge://flags or by specifying a command-line flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5393">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5393">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5394">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5394">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5395">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5395">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5396">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5396">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5397">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5397">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5398">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5398">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5399">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5399">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5400">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5400">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5401">GP 唯一名稱：BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5401">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5402">GP 名稱：使用內建的 DNS 用戶端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5402">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5403">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5403">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5404">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5404">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5405">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5405">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5406">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5406">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5407">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5407">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5408">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5408">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5409">數值名稱：BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5409">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5410">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5410">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5411">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5411">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5412">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5412">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5413">喜好設定機碼名稱：BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5413">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5414">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5414">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5415">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5415">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5416">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5416">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5417">決定是否使用內建的憑證驗證程式來驗證伺服器憑證 (已淘汰)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5417">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-5418">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5418">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5419">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5419">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5420">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5420">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5421">macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5421">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5422">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5422">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5423">此原則已過時，因為其目的只是為了提供做為短期的機制，給予企業更多時間來更新其環境，並在發現它們與內建的認證驗證程式不相容時報告問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5423">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>
 
  

  

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5424">當 Mac OS X 上的舊版憑證驗證程式支援已計畫移除時，此原則無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 87 上運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5424">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 87, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5425">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5425">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5426">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5426">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5427">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5427">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5428">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5428">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5429">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5429">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5430">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5430">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5431">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5431">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5432">喜好設定機碼名稱：BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5432">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5433">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5433">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5434">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5434">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5435">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5435">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5436">針對 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊的清單，停用憑證透明度強化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5436">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5437">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5437">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5438">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5438">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5439">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5439">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5440">針對 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊的清單，停用憑證透明度需求的強制執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5440">Disables enforcement of Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5441">此原則可讓您針對包含其中一個指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊憑證的憑證鏈結，停用憑證透明度揭露需求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5441">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5442">這會允許可能以其他方式不受信任的憑證，因為它們並未公開揭露，而仍用於企業主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5442">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed to still be used for Enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5443">若要在設定此原則時停用認證透明度強化，則必須符合下列其中一組條件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5443">To disable Certificate Transparency enforcement when this policy is set, one of the following sets of conditions must be met:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5444">雜湊是伺服器憑證的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5444">The hash is of the server certificate's subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5445">雜湊屬於 subjectPublicKeyInfo，會顯示在憑證鏈結的 CA 憑證中，該 CA 憑證是透過 X.509v3 nameConstraints 擴充功能來限制，permittedSubtrees 中會出現一或多個 directoryName nameConstraints，且 directoryName 會包含 organizationName 屬性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5445">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, that CA certificate is constrained via the X.509v3 nameConstraints extension, one or more directoryName nameConstraints are present in the permittedSubtrees, and the directoryName contains an organizationName attribute.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5446">雜湊屬於 subjectPublicKeyInfo，會顯示在 CA 憑證中憑證鏈結中，該 CA 憑證在憑證主體中有一或多個 organizationName 屬性，而伺服器的憑證包含相同數量的 organizationName 屬性、順序相同，並具有完全相同的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5446">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, the CA certificate has one or more organizationName attributes in the certificate Subject, and the server's certificate contains the same number of organizationName attributes, in the same order, and with byte-for-byte identical values.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5447">subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊的指定方式是將雜湊演算法名稱、"/" 字元，以及套用至指定憑證的 DER 編碼的 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊演算法的 Base64 編碼串連。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5447">A subjectPublicKeyInfo hash is specified by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5448">此 Base64 編碼與 SPKI 指紋的格式相同，如 RFC 7469 2.4 節中所定義。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5448">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5449">將忽略無法辨識的雜湊演算法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5449">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5450">目前唯一支援的雜湊演算法是 "sha256"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5450">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5451">如果停用或未設定此原則，則需要透過憑證透明度揭露的任何憑證都將被視為不受信任 (如果未根據憑證透明度原則揭露的話)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5451">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5452">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5452">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5453">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5453">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5454">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5454">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5455">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5455">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5456">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5456">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5457">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5457">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5458">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5458">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5459">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5459">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5460">GP 唯一名稱：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5460">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5461">GP 名稱：停用 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊清單的憑證透明度強化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5461">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5462">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5462">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5463">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5463">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5464">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5464">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5465">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5465">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5466">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5466">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5467">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5467">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5468">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5468">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5469">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5469">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5470">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5470">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5471">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5471">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5472">喜好設定機碼名稱：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5472">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5473">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5473">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5474">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5474">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5475">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5475">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5476">停用舊版憑證授權單位清單的憑證透明度強化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5476">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5477">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5477">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5478">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5478">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5479">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5479">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5480">針對舊版憑證授權單位 (CA) 的清單，停用憑證透明度需求的強制執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5480">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of legacy certificate authorities (Cas).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5481">此原則可讓您針對包含其中一個指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊憑證的憑證鏈結，停用憑證透明度揭露需求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5481">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5482">這會允許可能以其他方式不受信任的憑證，因為它們並未公開揭露，而仍繼續用於企業主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5482">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed, continue to be used for enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5483">若要停用憑證透明度強制執行，您必須將雜湊設定為會顯示在識別為舊版憑證授權單位 (CA) 的 CA 憑證中的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5483">In order for Certificate Transparency enforcement to be disabled, you must set the hash to a subjectPublicKeyInfo appearing in a CA certificate that is recognized as a legacy certificate authority (CA).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5484">舊版 CA 是由 Microsoft Edge 所支援的一或多個作業系統所公開信任的 CA。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5484">A legacy CA is a CA that has been publicly trusted by default by one or more operating systems supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5485">您可以指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊，方法是將雜湊演算法名稱、"/" 字元，以及套用至指定憑證的 DER 編碼的 subjectPublicKeyInfo 雜湊演算法的 Base64 編碼串連。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5485">You specify a subjectPublicKeyInfo hash by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5486">此 Base64 編碼與 SPKI 指紋的格式相同，如 RFC 7469 2.4 節中所定義。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5486">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5487">將忽略無法辨識的雜湊演算法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5487">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5488">目前唯一支援的雜湊演算法是 "sha256"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5488">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5489">如果未設定此原則，則需要透過憑證透明度揭露的任何憑證都將被視為不受信任 (如果未根據憑證透明度原則揭露的話)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5489">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it isn't disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5490">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5490">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5491">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5491">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5492">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5492">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5493">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5493">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5494">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5494">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5495">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5495">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5496">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5496">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5497">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5497">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5498">GP 唯一名稱：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5498">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5499">GP 名稱：停用舊版憑證授權單位清單的憑證透明度強化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5499">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5500">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5500">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5501">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5501">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5502">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5502">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5503">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5503">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5504">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5504">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5505">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5505">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5506">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5506">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5507">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5507">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5508">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5508">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5509">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5509">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5510">喜好設定機碼名稱：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5510">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5511">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5511">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5512">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5512">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5513">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5513">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5514">停用針對特定 URL 的憑證透明度強化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5514">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5515">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5515">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5516">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5516">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5517">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5517">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5518">針對所列的 URL，停用憑證透明度需求的強制執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5518">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for the listed URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5519">此原則可讓您不透過憑證透明度，揭露指定 URL 中主機名稱的憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5519">This policy lets you not disclose certificates for the hostnames in the specified URLs via Certificate Transparency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5520">這可讓您使用可能以其他方式不受信任的憑證，因為它們並正確未公開揭露，但會使得較難以偵測為這些主機錯誤核發的憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5520">This lets you use certificates that would otherwise be untrusted, because they weren't properly publicly disclosed, but it makes it harder to detect mis-issued certificates for those hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5521">根據 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 來設定 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5521">Form your URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5522">因為憑證僅對指定的主機名稱有效，與配置、連接埠或路徑無關，因此只會考慮 URL 的主機名稱部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5522">Because certificates are valid for a given hostname, independent of the scheme, port, or path, only the hostname part of the URL is considered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5523">不支援萬用字元主機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5523">Wildcard hosts are not supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5524">如果未設定此原則，則應該透過憑證透明度揭露的任何憑證都將被視為不受信任 (如果未揭露的話)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5524">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that should be disclosed via Certificate Transparency is treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5525">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5525">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5526">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5526">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5527">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5527">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5528">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5528">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5529">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5529">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5530">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5530">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5531">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5531">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5532">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5532">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5533">GP 唯一名稱：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5533">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5534">GP 名稱：停用針對特定 URL 的憑證透明度強化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5534">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5535">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5535">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5536">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5536">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5537">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5537">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5538">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5538">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5539">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5539">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5540">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5540">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5541">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5541">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5542">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5542">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5543">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5543">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = ".contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5544">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5544">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5545">喜好設定機碼名稱：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5545">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5546">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5546">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5547">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5547">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5548">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5548">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5549">在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時清除瀏覽資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5549">Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5550">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5550">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5551">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5551">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5552">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5552">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5553">Microsoft Edge 預設不會在關閉時清除瀏覽資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5553">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear the browsing data by default when it closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5554">瀏覽資料包括在表單中輸入的資訊、密碼，甚至是造訪的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5554">Browsing data includes information entered in forms, passwords, and even the websites visited.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5555">如果啟用此原則，則每次關閉 Microsoft Edge 時，會刪除所有瀏覽資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5555">If you enable this policy, all browsing data is deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5556">請注意，如果啟用此原則，則它會優先於您設定的 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5556">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5557">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以在 [設定] 中設定 [清除瀏覽資料] 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5557">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can configure the Clear browsing data option in Settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5558">如果啟用此原則，則請勿設定 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 原則，因為它們全都涉及刪除瀏覽資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5558">If you enable this policy, don't configure the [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or the [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) policy, because they all deal with deleting browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5559">如果設定了前述原則和此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 關閉時會刪除所有瀏覽資料，無論您如何設定 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5559">If you configure the preceding policies and this policy, all browsing data is deleted when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5560">若要避免在結束時刪除 Cookie，請設定 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5560">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5561">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5561">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5562">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5562">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5563">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5563">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5564">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5564">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5565">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5565">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5566">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5566">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5567">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5567">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5568">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5568">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5569">GP 唯一名稱：ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5569">GP unique name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5570">GP 名稱：在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時清除瀏覽資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5570">GP name: Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5571">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5571">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5572">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5572">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5573">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5573">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5574">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5574">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5575">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5575">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5576">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5576">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5577">數值名稱：ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5577">Value Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5578">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5578">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5579">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5579">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5580">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5580">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5581">喜好設定機碼名稱：ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5581">Preference Key Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5582">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5582">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5583">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5583">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5584">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5584">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5585">在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時清除快取的影像和檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5585">Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5586">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5586">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5587">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5587">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5588">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5588">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5589">Microsoft Edge 預設不會在關閉時清除快取的影像和檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5589">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear cached images and files by default when it closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5590">如果啟用此原則，則每次關閉 Microsoft Edge 時，會刪除快取的影像和檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5590">If you enable this policy, cached images and files will be deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5591">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法在 edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose 中設定快取影像和檔案選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5591">If you disable this policy, users cannot configure the cached images and files option in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5592">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以選擇是否要在結束時清除快取的影像和檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5592">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether cached images and files are cleared on exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5593">如果停用此原則，則請勿啟用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 原則，因為它們全都涉及刪除資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5593">If you disable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5594">如果您同時設定這兩項，則 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 原則優先，並且會在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時刪除所有資料，無論 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 的設定方式如何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5594">If you configure both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5595">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5595">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5596">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5596">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5597">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5597">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5598">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5598">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5599">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5599">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5600">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5600">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5601">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5601">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5602">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5602">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5603">GP 唯一名稱：ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5603">GP unique name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5604">GP 名稱：在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時清除快取的影像和檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5604">GP name: Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5605">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5605">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5606">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5606">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5607">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5607">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5608">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5608">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5609">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5609">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5610">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5610">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5611">數值名稱：ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5611">Value Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5612">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5612">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5613">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5613">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5614">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5614">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5615">喜好設定機碼名稱：ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5615">Preference Key Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5616">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5616">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5617">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5617">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5618">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5618">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5619">允許使用者使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定開啟檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5619">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5620">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5620">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5621">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5621">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5622">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5622">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5623">允許使用者使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5623">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5624">ClickOnce 通訊協定會允許網站要求瀏覽器利用使用者電腦或裝置上的 ClickOnce 檔案處理常式從特定 URL 開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5624">The ClickOnce protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using the ClickOnce file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5625">如果啟用此原則，則使用者可以使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定來開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5625">If you enable this policy, users can open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5626">此原則會覆寫 edge://flags/ 頁面中使用者的 ClickOnce 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5626">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5627">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定來開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5627">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5628">而是會改為使用瀏覽器將檔案儲存到檔案系統。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5628">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system using the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5629">此原則會覆寫 edge://flags/ 頁面中使用者的 ClickOnce 設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5629">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5630">如果您未設定此原則，Microsoft Edge 87 之前的使用者將無法使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5630">If you don't configure this policy, users with Microsoft Edge versions before Microsoft Edge 87 can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5631">不過，他們可以利用 edge://flags/ 頁面選擇是否要啟用 ClickOnce 通訊協定的使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5631">However, they have the option to enable the use of the ClickOnce protocol with the edge://flags/ page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5632">Microsoft Edge 版 本87 及更新版本的使用者可以預設使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定來開啟檔案，但可以利用 edge://flags/頁面選擇停用 ClickOnce 通訊協定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5632">Users with Microsoft Edge versions 87 and later can open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default but have the option to disable the ClickOnce protocol with edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5633">停用 ClickOnce 可能會防止 ClickOnce 應用程式 (.application 檔案) 正常啟動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5633">Disabling ClickOnce may prevent ClickOnce applications (.application files) from launching properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5634">如需 ClickOnce 的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5634">For more information about ClickOnce, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5635">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5635">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5636">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5636">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5637">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5637">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5638">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5638">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5639">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5639">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5640">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5640">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5641">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5641">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5642">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5642">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5643">GP 唯一名稱：ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5643">GP unique name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5644">GP 名稱：允許使用者使用 ClickOnce 通訊協定開啟檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5644">GP name: Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5645">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5645">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5646">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5646">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5647">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5647">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5648">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5648">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5649">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5649">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5650">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5650">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5651">數值名稱：ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5651">Value Name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5652">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5652">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5653">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5653">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5654">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5654">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5655">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5655">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5656">封鎖集錦中服務和匯出目標特定清單的存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5656">Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5657">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5657">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5658">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5658">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5659">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5659">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5660">列出使用者無法在 Microsoft Edge 的集錦功能中存取的特定服務和匯出目標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5660">List specific services and export targets that users can't access in the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5661">這包括顯示來自 Bing 的其他資料，並將集錦匯出至 Microsoft 產品或外部合作夥伴。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5661">This includes displaying additional data from Bing and exporting collections to Microsoft products or external partners.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5662">如果啟用此原則，系統會封鎖與指定清單相符的服務和匯出目標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5662">If you enable this policy, services and export targets that match the given list are blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5663">如果未設定此原則，則對強制執行的可接受服務和匯出目標沒有限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5663">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable services and export targets are enforced.</span></span>

     

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5664">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5664">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5665">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest 建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5665">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest suggestions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5666">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5666">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5667">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5667">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5668">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5668">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5669">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5669">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5670">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5670">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5671">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5671">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5672">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5672">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5673">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5673">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5674">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5674">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5675">GP 唯一名稱：CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5675">GP unique name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5676">GP 名稱：封鎖集錦中服務和匯出目標特定清單的存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5676">GP name: Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5677">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5677">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5678">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5678">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5679">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5679">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5680">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5680">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5681">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5681">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5682">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5682">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5683">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5683">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5684">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5684">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5685">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5685">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = "pinterest_suggestions"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5686">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5686">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5687">喜好設定機碼名稱： CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5687">Preference Key Name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5688">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5688">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5689">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5689">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5690">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5690">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5691">啟用命令列旗標的安全性警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5691">Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5692">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5692">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5693">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5693">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5694">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5694">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5695">如果停用，則此原則會在 Microsoft Edge 使用可能有危險的命令列旗標啟動時防止安全性警告顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5695">If disabled, this policy prevents security warnings from appearing when Microsoft Edge is launched with potentially dangerous command-line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5696">如果啟用或未設定，則使用這些命令列旗標來啟動 Microsoft Edge 時，會顯示安全性警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5696">If enabled or unset, security warnings are displayed when these command-line flags are used to launch Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5697">例如，--disable-gpu-sandbox 旗標會產生此警告：您使用不支援的命令列旗標：--disable-gpu-sandbox。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5697">For example, the --disable-gpu-sandbox flag generates this warning:  You're using an unsupported command-line flag: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5698">這會造成穩定性及安全性風險。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5698">This poses stability and security risks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5699">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5699">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5700">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5700">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5701">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5701">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5702">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5702">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5703">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5703">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5704">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5704">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5705">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5705">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5706">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5706">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5707">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5707">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5708">GP 唯一名稱：CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5708">GP unique name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5709">GP 名稱：啟用命令列旗標的安全性警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5709">GP name: Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5710">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5710">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5711">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5711">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5712">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5712">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5713">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5713">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5714">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5714">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5715">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5715">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5716">數值名稱：CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5716">Value Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5717">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5717">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5718">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5718">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5719">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5719">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5720">喜好設定機碼名稱：CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5720">Preference Key Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5721">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5721">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5722">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5722">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5723">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5723">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5724">啟用 Microsoft Edge 中的元件更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5724">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5725">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5725">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5726">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5726">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5727">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5727">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5728">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則會在 Microsoft Edge 中啟用元件更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5728">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5729">如果停用此原則或將它設定為 false，則會停用 Microsoft Edge 中所有元件的元件更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5729">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5730">不過，有些元件會從此原則免除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5730">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5731">這包括不包含可執行程式碼、不會著變更瀏覽器行為，或對安全性非常重要的何元件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5731">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5732">也就是說，即使您停用此原則，也會套用「對安全性非常重要」的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5732">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5733">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5733">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5734">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5734">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5735">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5735">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5736">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5736">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5737">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5737">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5738">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5738">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5739">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5739">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5740">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5740">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5741">GP 唯一名稱：ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5741">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5742">GP 名稱：啟用 Microsoft Edge 中的元件更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5742">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5743">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5743">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5744">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5744">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5745">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5745">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5746">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5746">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5747">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5747">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5748">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5748">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5749">數值名稱：ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5749">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5750">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5750">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5751">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5751">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5752">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5752">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5753">喜好設定機碼名稱：ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5753">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5754">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5754">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5755">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5755">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5756">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5756">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5757">設定不要追蹤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5757">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5758">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5758">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5759">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5759">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5760">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5760">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5761">指定是否要將「不要追蹤」要求傳送到要求追蹤資訊的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5761">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5762">「不要追蹤」要求可讓您瀏覽的網站知道您不希望您的瀏覽活動遭到追蹤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5762">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5763">依預設，Microsoft Edge 不會傳送「不要追蹤」要求，但是使用者可以開啟此功能以傳送要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5763">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5764">如果啟用此原則，則一律會傳送「不要追蹤」要求到要求追蹤資訊的網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5764">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5765">如果停用此原則，則永遠不會傳送要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5765">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5766">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以選擇是否要傳送這些要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5766">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5767">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5767">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5768">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5768">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5769">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5769">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5770">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5770">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5771">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5771">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5772">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5772">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5773">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5773">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5774">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5774">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5775">GP 唯一名稱：ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5775">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5776">GP 名稱：設定不要追蹤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5776">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
