  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5777">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5777">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5778">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5778">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5779">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5779">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5780">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5780">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5781">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5781">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5782">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5782">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5783">數值名稱：ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5783">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5784">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5784">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5785">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5785">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5786">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5786">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5787">喜好設定機碼名稱：ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5787">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5788">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5788">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5789">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5789">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5790">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5790">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5791">設定當沒有 Azure AD 網域帳戶時，使用 Active Directory 網域帳戶自動登入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5791">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5792">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5792">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5793">Windows 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5793">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5794">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5794">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5795">如果使用者的電腦已加入網域且您的環境未混合加入，則可啟用使用 Active Directory 帳戶自動登入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5795">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5796">如果您想要改為讓使用者以其 Azure Active Directory 帳戶自動登入，請對您的環境套用 Azure AD 加入 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197)) 或混合式加入 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5796">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5797">如果 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 原則設為已停用，則此原則沒有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5797">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5798">如果啟用此原則，並將其設定為 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable'，則 Microsoft Edge 會自動將已加入網域電腦的使用者以其 Active Directory 帳戶登入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5798">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5799">如果將此原則設定為 ‘已停用’ 或未設定，則 Microsoft Edge 不會自動將已加入網域電腦的使用者以 Active Directory 帳戶登入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5799">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5800">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5800">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5801">已停用 (0) = 已停用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5801">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5802">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = 登入並將網域帳戶設為不可移除</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5802">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5803">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5803">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5804">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5804">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5805">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5805">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5806">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5806">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5807">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5807">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5808">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5808">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5809">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5809">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5810">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5810">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5811">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5811">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5812">GP 唯一名稱：ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5812">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5813">GP 名稱：設定當沒有 Azure AD 網域帳戶時，使用 Active Directory 網域帳戶自動登入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5813">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5814">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5814">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5815">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5815">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5816">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5816">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5817">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5817">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5818">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5818">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5819">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5819">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5820">數值名稱：ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5820">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5821">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5821">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5822">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5822">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5823">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5823">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5824">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5824">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5825">設定線上文字轉語音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5825">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5826">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5826">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5827">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5827">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5828">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5828">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5829">設定瀏覽器是否可以利用「線上文字轉語音」語音字型，它是 Azure 認知服務的一部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5829">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5830">這些語音字型的品質高於預先安裝的系統語音字型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5830">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5831">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用 SpeechSynthesis API 的 Web 型應用程式可以使用「線上文字轉語音」語音字型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5831">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5832">如果停用此原則，則語音字型將無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5832">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5833">若要深入了解此功能，請參閱這裡：SpeechSynthesis API：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) 認知服務：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5833">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5834">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5834">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5835">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5835">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5836">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5836">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5837">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5837">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5838">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5838">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5839">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5839">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5840">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5840">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5841">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5841">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5842">GP 唯一名稱：ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5842">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5843">GP 名稱：設定線上文字轉語音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5843">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5844">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5844">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5845">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5845">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5846">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5846">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5847">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5847">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5848">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5848">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5849">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5849">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5850">數值名稱：ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5850">Value Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5851">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5851">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5852">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5852">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5853">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5853">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5854">喜好設定機碼名稱：ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5854">Preference Key Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5855">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5855">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5856">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5856">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5857">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5857">ConfigureShare</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5858">設定共用體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5858">Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5859">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5859">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5860">Windows 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5860">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5861">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5861">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5862">如果將此原則設定為 'ShareAllowed' (預設值)，則使用者可以從 Microsoft Edge 的 [設定及其他] 功能表存取 Windows 10 的共用體驗，以便與系統上的其他應用程式共用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5862">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5863">如果將此原則設定為 'ShareDisallowed'，則使用者無法存取 Windows 10 的共用體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5863">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5864">如果 [共用] 按鈕在工具列上，則也會隱藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5864">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5865">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5865">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5866">ShareAllowed (0) = 允許使用共用體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5866">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5867">ShareDisallowed (1) = 不允許使用共用體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5867">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5868">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5868">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5869">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5869">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5870">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5870">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5871">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5871">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5872">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5872">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5873">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5873">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5874">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5874">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5875">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5875">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5876">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5876">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5877">GP 唯一名稱：ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5877">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5878">GP 名稱：設定共用體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5878">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5879">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5879">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5880">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5880">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5881">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5881">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5882">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5882">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5883">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5883">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5884">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5884">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5885">數值名稱：ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5885">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5886">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5886">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5887">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5887">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5888">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5888">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5889">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5889">CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5890">指定自訂說明連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5890">Specify custom help link</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5891">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5891">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5892">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5892">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5893">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5893">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5894">為 [說明] 功能表或 F1 鍵指定連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5894">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5895">如果啟用此原則，則系統管理員可以為 [說明] 功能表或 F1 鍵指定連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5895">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5896">如果停用或未設定此原則，則會使用 [說明] 功能表或 F1 鍵的預設連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5896">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5897">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5897">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5898">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5898">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5899">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5899">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5900">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5900">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5901">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5901">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5902">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5902">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5903">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5903">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5904">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5904">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5905">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5905">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5906">GP 唯一名稱：CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5906">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5907">GP 名稱：指定自訂說明連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5907">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5908">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5908">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5909">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5909">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5910">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5910">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5911">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5911">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5912">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5912">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5913">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5913">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5914">數值名稱：CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5914">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5915">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5915">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5916">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5916">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5917">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5917">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5918">喜好設定機碼名稱：CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5918">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5919">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5919">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5920">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5920">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5921">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5921">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5922">DNS 攔截檢查已啟用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5922">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5923">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5923">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5924">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5924">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5925">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5925">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5926">此原則會設定可用於停用 DNS 攔截檢查的本機交換器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5926">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5927">這些檢查會嘗試探索瀏覽器是否位於會將未知主機名稱重新導向的 Proxy 後面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5927">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5928">在網路設定已知的企業環境中，可能不需要此偵測。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5928">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5929">可以將它停用，以避免啟動時以及每個 DNS 設定變更時的額外 DNS 和 HTTP 流量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5929">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5930">若您啟用或未設定此原則，系統便會執行 DNS 攔截檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5930">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5931">若您停用此原則，系統便不會執行 DNS 攔截檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5931">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5932">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5932">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5933">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5933">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5934">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5934">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5935">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5935">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5936">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5936">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5937">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5937">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5938">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5938">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5939">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5939">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5940">GP 唯一名稱：DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5940">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5941">GP 名稱：DNS 攔截檢查已啟用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5941">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5942">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5942">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5943">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5943">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5944">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5944">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5945">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5945">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5946">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5946">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5947">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5947">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5948">數值名稱：DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5948">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5949">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5949">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5950">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5950">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5951">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5951">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5952">喜好設定機碼名稱：DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5952">Preference Key Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5953">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5953">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5954">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5954">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5955">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5955">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5956">將 Microsoft Edge 設定為預設瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5956">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5957">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5957">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5958">Windows 7 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5958">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5959">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5959">Description</span></span>
   

  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5960">若您將此原則設為 True，Microsoft Edge 就會在啟動時永遠檢查是否為預設瀏覽器，如果可能，則會自動註冊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5960">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5961">若您將此原則設為 False，Microsoft Edge 就會停止檢查是否為預設瀏覽器，並開啟此選項的使用者控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5961">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5962">如果您未設定此原則，Microsoft Edge 可讓使用者控制是否將其設為預設值，如果不是，是否顯示使用者通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5962">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5963">Windows 系統管理員的注意事項：此原則只適用執行 Windows 7 的電腦。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5963">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5964">針對較新版本的 Windows，您必須部署一個「預設應用程式關聯」檔案，讓 Microsoft Edge 成為 HTTPS 和 HTTP 通訊協定 (以及選用的 FTP 通訊協定和檔案格式，例如 .html、.htm、.pdf、.svg、.webp) 的處理常式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5964">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5965">如需相關資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5965">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5966">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5966">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5967">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5967">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5968">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5968">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5969">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5969">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5970">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5970">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5971">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5971">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5972">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5972">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5973">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5973">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5974">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5974">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5975">GP 名稱：將 Microsoft Edge 設定為預設瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5975">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5976">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5976">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5977">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5977">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5978">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5978">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5979">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5979">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5980">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5980">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5981">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5981">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5982">數值名稱：DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5982">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5983">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5983">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5984">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5984">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5985">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5985">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5986">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5986">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5987">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5987">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5988">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5988">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5989">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5989">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5990">允許預設搜尋提供者操作功能表搜尋存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5990">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5991">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5991">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5992">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5992">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5993">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5993">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5994">可在操作功能表上使用預設搜尋提供者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5994">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5995">如果您將此原則設為停用，則依賴於預設搜尋提供者的搜尋操作功能表將無法使用，而且側邊欄搜尋也無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5995">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5996">如果將此原則設定為啟用或未設定，則可使用預設搜尋提供者和側邊欄搜尋的操作功能表項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5996">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-5997">只有啟用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 原則時，才會套用該原則值，否則不適用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5997">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5998">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5998">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-5999">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-5999">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6000">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6000">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6001">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6001">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6002">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6002">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6003">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6003">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6004">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6004">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6005">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6005">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6006">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6006">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6007">GP 名稱：允許預設搜尋提供者操作功能表搜尋存取權</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6007">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6008">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6008">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6009">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6009">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6010">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6010">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6011">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6011">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6012">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6012">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6013">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6013">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6014">值名稱：DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6014">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6015">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6015">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6016">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6016">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6017">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6017">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6018">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6018">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6019">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6019">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6020">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6020">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6021">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6021">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6022">預設的感應器設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6022">Default sensors setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6023">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6023">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6024">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6024">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6025">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6025">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6026">設定網站是否可以存取及使用感應器（例如動作和光線感應器）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6026">Set whether websites can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6027">您可完全封鎖或允許網站存取感應器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6027">You can completely block or allow websites to get access to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6028">將原則設定為 1 可讓網站存取及使用感應器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6028">Setting the policy to 1 lets websites access and use sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6029">將原則設定為 2 可讓網站拒絕存取感應器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6029">Setting the policy to 2 denies acess to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6030">您可以使用 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [ SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 原則來針對特定 URL 模式覆寫此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6030">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6031">如果您未設定此原則，則網站可以存取及使用感應器，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6031">If you don't configure this policy, websites can access and use sensors, and users can change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6032">這是針對 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 的全域預設。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6032">This is the global default for [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6033">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6033">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6034">AllowSensors (1) = 允許網站存取感應器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6034">AllowSensors (1) = Allow sites to access sensors</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6035">BlockSensors (2) = 不允許任何網站存取感應器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6035">BlockSensors (2) = Do not allow any site to access sensors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6036">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6036">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6037">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6037">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6038">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6038">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6039">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6039">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6040">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6040">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6041">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6041">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6042">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6042">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6043">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6043">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6044">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6044">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6045">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6045">GP unique name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6046">GP 唯一名稱：預設感應器設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6046">GP name: Default sensors setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6047">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6047">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6048">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6048">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6049">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6049">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6050">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6050">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6051">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6051">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6052">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6052">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6053">數值名稱：DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6053">Value Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6054">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6054">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6055">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6055">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6056">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6056">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6057">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6057">Preference Key Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6058">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6058">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6059">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6059">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6060">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6060">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6061">控制 Serial API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6061">Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6062">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6062">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6063">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6063">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6064">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6064">Description</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6065">設定網站是否能夠存取序列通訊埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6065">Set whether websites can access serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6066">您可以完全封鎖存取，或在每次網站想要存取序列通訊埠時詢問使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6066">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6067">將原則設定為3，可讓網站要求序列通訊埠的存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6067">Setting the policy to 3 lets websites ask for access to serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6068">將原則設定為 2，可拒絕存取序列通訊埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6068">Setting the policy to 2 denies access to serial ports.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6069">您可以使用 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 和 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 原則來針對特定 URL 模式覆寫此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6069">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6070">如果未設定此原則，則預設為網站可以詢問使用者是否可以存取序列通訊埠，且使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6070">If you don't configure this policy, by default, websites can ask users whether they can access a serial port, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6071">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6071">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6072">BlockSerial (2) = 不允許任何網站透過 Serial API 要求存取序列通訊埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6072">BlockSerial (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to serial ports via the Serial API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6073">AskSerial (3) = 允許網站要求使用者同意存取序列埠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6073">AskSerial (3) = Allow sites to ask for user permission to access a serial port</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6074">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6074">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6075">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6075">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6076">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6076">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6077">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6077">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6078">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6078">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6079">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6079">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6080">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6080">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6081">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6081">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6082">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6082">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6083">GP 唯一名稱：DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6083">GP unique name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6084">GP 唯一名稱：控制 Serial API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6084">GP name: Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6085">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6085">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6086">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6086">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6087">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6087">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6088">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6088">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6089">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6089">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6090">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6090">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6091">數值名稱：DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6091">Value Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6092">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6092">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6093">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6093">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6094">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6094">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6095">喜好設定機碼名稱：DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6095">Preference Key Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6096">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6096">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6097">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6097">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6098">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6098">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6099">要求在索引標籤導覽前， [企業模式網站清單] 即已可使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6099">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6100">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6100">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6101">Windows 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6101">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6102">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6102">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6103">可讓您指定是否要讓 Microsoft Edge 索引標籤等待導覽，直到連覽器已下載初始的 [企業模式網站清單]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6103">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6104">這項設定適用於瀏覽器首頁應在 Internet Explorer 模式中載入的情況，在啟用 IE 模式之後，首次執行瀏覽器時，這是很重要的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6104">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6105">如果此情況不存在，我們建議您不要啟用這項設定，因為這可能會對載入首頁的效能造成負面影響。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6105">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6106">只有在 Microsoft Edge 沒有 [快取的] 企業模式網站清單 (例如，在啟用 IE 模式後首次執行瀏覽器時才會使用) ，才會套用此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6106">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6107">此設定會與下列內容一併執行：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 設定為 'IEMode'，並設定 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 原則，其中該清單至少擁有一個項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6107">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6108">此原則的超時行為可以設定為 [ NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6108">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6109">如果您將此原則設定為 'All'，當 Microsoft Edge 沒有 [企業模式網站清單] 的快取版本時，索引標籤會延遲瀏覽直到瀏覽器完成下載網站清單為止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6109">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6110">在 Internet Explorer 模式中，由網站清單設定為開啟的網站將會在 Internet Explorer 模式中載入，即使在瀏覽器的首次瀏覽期間也是如此。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6110">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6111">無法在 Internet Explorer 中設定開啟的網站，像是具有 [http:]、[https:]、[file:] 或 [ftp:] 的任何網站，都不會在 Microsoft Edge 中延遲導覽和立即載入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6111">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6112">如果您將此原則設定為 'None' 或未設定此原則，當 Microsoft Edge 沒有 [企業模式網站清單] 的快取版本時，索引標籤會立即導覽，而不會等候瀏覽器完成下載 [企業模式網站清單]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6112">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6113">由網站清單設定以 Internet Explorer 模式開啟的網站，將會以 Microsoft Edge 模式開啟直到瀏覽器完成下載 [企業模式網站清單] 為止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6113">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6114">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6114">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6115">None (0) = 無</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6115">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6116">All (1) = 所有符合條件的瀏覽</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6116">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6117">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6117">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6118">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6118">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6119">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6119">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6120">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6120">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6121">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6121">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6122">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6122">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6123">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6123">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6124">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6124">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6125">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6125">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6126">GP 唯一名稱：DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6126">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6127">GP 名稱：要求在索引標籤導覽前， [企業模式網站清單] 即已可使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6127">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6128">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6128">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6129">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6129">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6130">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6130">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6131">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6131">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6132">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6132">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6133">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6133">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6134">數值名稱：DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6134">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6135">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6135">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6136">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6136">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6137">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6137">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6138">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6138">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6139">移轉時刪除舊版瀏覽器資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6139">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6140">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6140">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6141">Windows 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6141">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6142">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6142">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6143">此原則會決定在移轉到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更新版本之後，是否會刪除來自 Microsoft Edge 舊版的使用者瀏覽資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6143">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6144">如果將此原則設定為 [已啟用]，則在移轉到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更新版本之後，所有來自 Microsoft Edge 舊版的瀏覽資料都會被刪除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6144">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6145">在移轉到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更新版本之前，必須先設定此原則，才能對現有的瀏覽資料有任何作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6145">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6146">如果將此原則設定為 [已停用] 或未設定原則，則在移轉到 Microsoft Edge 版本 83 或更新版本之後，將不會刪除使用者瀏覽資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6146">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6147">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6147">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6148">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6148">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6149">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6149">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6150">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6150">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6151">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6151">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6152">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6152">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6153">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6153">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6154">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6154">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6155">GP 唯一名稱：DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6155">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6156">GP 名稱：移轉時刪除舊版瀏覽器資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6156">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6157">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6157">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6158">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6158">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6159">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6159">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6160">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6160">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6161">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6161">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6162">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6162">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6163">數值名稱：DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6163">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6164">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6164">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6165">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6165">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6166">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6166">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6167">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6167">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6168">控制可使用開發人員工具的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6168">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6169">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6169">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6170">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6170">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6171">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6171">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6172">控制可使用開發人員工具的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6172">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6173">如果將此原則設定為 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (預設值)，則使用者一般可以存取開發人員工具和 JavaScript 主控台，但無法存取透過企業原則安裝的擴充功能之內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6173">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6174">如果將此原則設定為 'DeveloperToolsAllowed'，則使用者可以存取所有內容中的開發人員工具和 JavaScript 主控台，包括透過企業原則安裝的擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6174">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6175">如果將此原則設定為 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed'，則使用者無法存取開發人員工具或檢查網站元素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6175">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6176">開啟開發人員工具或 JavaScript 主控台的鍵盤快速鍵和功能表或內容功能表項目會停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6176">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6177">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6177">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6178">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = 在企業原則安裝的擴充功能上封鎖開發人員工具，並在其他內容中允許</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6178">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6179">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = 允許使用開發人員工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6179">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6180">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = 不允許使用開發人員工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6180">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6181">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6181">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6182">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6182">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6183">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6183">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6184">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6184">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6185">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6185">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6186">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6186">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6187">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6187">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6188">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6188">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6189">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6189">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6190">GP 唯一名稱：DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6190">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6191">GP 名稱：控制可使用開發人員工具的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6191">GP name: Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6192">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6192">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6193">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6193">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6194">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6194">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6195">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6195">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6196">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6196">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6197">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6197">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6198">數值名稱：DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6198">Value Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6199">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6199">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6200">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6200">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6201">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6201">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6202">喜好設定機碼名稱：DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6202">Preference Key Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6203">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6203">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
