  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6204">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6204">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6205">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6205">DiagnosticData</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6206">傳送關於瀏覽器使用狀況的必要和選擇性診斷資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6206">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6207">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6207">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6208">Windows 7 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6208">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6209">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6209">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6210">此原則控制傳送有關瀏覽器使用狀況的必要和選擇性診斷資料給 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6210">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6211">收集必要診斷資料，確保 Microsoft Edge 安全、保持最新狀態並按期望執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6211">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6212">選擇性診斷資料包含有關如何使用瀏覽器的資料、您瀏覽的網站，以及針對產品和服務改善而向 Microsoft 發送當機報告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6212">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6213">Windows 10 裝置不支援此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6213">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6214">若要在 Windows 10 上控制這個資料收集，IT 系統管理員必須使用 Windows 診斷資料群組原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6214">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6215">這項原則會是 '允許遙測' 或 '允許診斷資料'，視 Windows 版本而定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6215">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6216">深入了解 Windows 10 診斷資料收集：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6216">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6217">使用下列其中一個設定來設定此原則：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6217">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6218">'Off' 關閉必要和選擇性診斷資料收集。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6218">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6219">不建議使用此選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6219">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6220">'RequiredData' 傳送必要診斷資料，但關閉選擇性診斷資料收集。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6220">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6221">Microsoft Edge 將傳送必要診斷資料，以確保 Microsoft Edge 安全、保持最新狀態並按期望執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6221">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6222">'OptionalData' 傳送選擇性診斷資料，包含瀏覽器使用狀況、造訪的網站、針對產品和服務改善而向 Microsoft 發送當機報告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6222">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6223">在 Windows 7 和 macOS 上，此原則控制傳送必要和選擇性診斷資料給 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6223">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6224">如果未設定或停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將預設為使用者的喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6224">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6225">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6225">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6226">Off (0) = 關閉 (不建議使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6226">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6227">RequiredData (1) = 必要資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6227">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6228">OptionalData (2) = 選擇性資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6228">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6229">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6229">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6230">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6230">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6231">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6231">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6232">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6232">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6233">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6233">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6234">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6234">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6235">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6235">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6236">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6236">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6237">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6237">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6238">GP 唯一名稱：DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6238">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6239">GP名稱：傳送關於瀏覽器使用狀況的必要和選擇性診斷資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6239">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6240">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6240">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6241">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6241">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6242">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6242">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6243">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6243">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6244">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6244">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6245">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6245">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6246">值名稱：DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6246">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6247">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6247">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6248">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6248">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6249">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6249">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6250">喜好設定機碼名稱：DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6250">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6251">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6251">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6252">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6252">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6253">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6253">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6254">允許使用者使用 DirectInvoke 通訊協定開啟檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6254">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6255">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6255">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6256">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6256">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6257">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6257">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6258">允許使用者使用 DirectInvoke 通訊協定來開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6258">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6259">DirectInvoke 通訊協定會允許網站要求瀏覽器利用使用者電腦或裝置上的特定檔案處理常式從特定 URL 開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6259">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6260">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以使用 DirectInvoke 通訊協定來開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6260">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6261">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法使用 DirectInvoke 通訊協定來開啟檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6261">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6262">檔案會改為儲存到檔案系統。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6262">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6263">注意：停用 DirectInvoke 可能會使得某些 Microsoft SharePoint Online 功能無法如預期般運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6263">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6264">如需 DirectInvoke 的詳細資訊，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6264">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6265">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6265">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6266">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6266">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6267">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6267">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6268">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6268">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6269">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6269">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6270">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6270">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6271">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6271">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6272">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6272">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6273">GP 唯一名稱：DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6273">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6274">GP 名稱：允許使用者使用 DirectInvoke 通訊協定開啟檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6274">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6275">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6275">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6276">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6276">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6277">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6277">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6278">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6278">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6279">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6279">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6280">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6280">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6281">數值名稱：DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6281">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6282">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6282">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6283">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6283">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6284">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6284">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6285">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6285">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6286">停用 3D 圖形 API 支援</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6286">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6287">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6287">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6288">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6288">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6289">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6289">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6290">防止網頁存取圖形處理器 (GPU)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6290">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6291">具體來說，網頁無法存取 WebGL API，且外掛程式無法使用 Pepper 3D API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6291">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6292">如果未設定或停用此原則，則可能會允許網頁使用 WebGL API 和外掛程式使用 Pepper 3D API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6292">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6293">Microsoft Edge 預設可能仍需要傳遞命令列參數，才能使用這些 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6293">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6294">如果 [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) 原則設定為 false，則會忽略 'Disable3DAPIs' 原則的設定，這相當於將 'Disable3DAPIs' 原則設定為 true。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6294">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6295">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6295">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6296">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6296">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6297">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6297">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6298">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6298">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6299">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6299">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6300">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6300">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6301">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6301">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6302">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6302">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6303">GP 唯一名稱：Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6303">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6304">GP 名稱：停用 3D 圖形 API 支援</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6304">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6305">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6305">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6306">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6306">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6307">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6307">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6308">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6308">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6309">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6309">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6310">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6310">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6311">數值名稱：Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6311">Value Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6312">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6312">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6313">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6313">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6314">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6314">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6315">喜好設定機碼名稱：Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6315">Preference Key Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6316">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6316">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6317">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6317">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6318">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6318">DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6319">停用取得螢幕擷取畫面功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6319">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6320">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6320">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6321">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6321">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6322">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6322">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6323">控制使用者是否可以取得瀏覽器頁面的螢幕擷取畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6323">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6324">如果已啟用，則使用者無法使用鍵盤快速鍵或擴充功能 API 來取得螢幕擷取畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6324">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6325">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以取得螢幕擷取畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6325">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6326">請注意，此原則會控制在瀏覽器本身內取得的螢幕擷取畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6326">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6327">即使您啟用此原則，使用者仍然可以使用瀏覽器以外的一些方法 (例如使用作業系統功能或其他應用程式) 來取得螢幕擷取畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6327">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6328">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6328">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6329">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6329">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6330">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6330">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6331">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6331">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6332">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6332">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6333">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6333">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6334">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6334">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6335">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6335">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6336">GP 唯一名稱：DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6336">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6337">GP 名稱：停用取得螢幕擷取畫面功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6337">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6338">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6338">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6339">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6339">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6340">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6340">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6341">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6341">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6342">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6342">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6343">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6343">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6344">數值名稱：DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6344">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6345">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6345">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6346">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6346">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6347">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6347">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6348">喜好設定機碼名稱：DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6348">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6349">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6349">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6350">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6350">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6351">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6351">DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6352">設定磁碟快取目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6352">Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6353">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6353">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6354">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6354">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6355">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6355">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6356">設定用來儲存快取檔案的目錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6356">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6357">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用提供的目錄，而無論使用者是否已指定 '--disk-cache-dir' 旗標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6357">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6358">若要避免資料遺失或其他非預期的錯誤，請勿將此原則設定為磁碟區的根目錄或用於其他用途的目錄，因為 Microsoft Edge 會管理其內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6358">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6359">如需可在指定目錄和路徑時使用的變數清單，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6359">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6360">如果未設定此原則，則會使用預設的快取目錄，且使用者可以使用 '--disk-cache-dir' 命令列旗標來覆寫該預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6360">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6361">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6361">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6362">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6362">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6363">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6363">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6364">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6364">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6365">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6365">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6366">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6366">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6367">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6367">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6368">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6368">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6369">GP 唯一名稱：DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6369">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6370">GP 名稱：設定磁碟快取目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6370">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6371">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6371">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6372">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6372">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6373">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6373">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6374">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6374">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6375">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6375">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6376">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6376">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6377">數值名稱：DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6377">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6378">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6378">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6379">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6379">Example value:</span></span>
```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6380">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6380">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6381">喜好設定機碼名稱：DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6381">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6382">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6382">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6383">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6383">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6384">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6384">DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6385">設定磁碟快取大小，以位元組為單位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6385">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6386">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6386">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6387">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6387">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6388">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6388">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6389">設定用來在磁碟上儲存檔案的快取大小 (以位元組為單位)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6389">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6390">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用提供的快取大小，而無論使用者是否已指定 '--disk-cache-size' 旗標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6390">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6391">此原則中指定的值不是硬性界限，而是對快取系統的建議；低於一些 MB 的任何值都太小，並將會進位為合理的最小值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6391">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6392">如果將此原則的值設為 0，則會使用預設的快取大小，且使用者無法變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6392">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6393">如果未設定此原則，則會使用預設大小，但使用者可以使用 '--disk-cache-size' 旗標來覆寫它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6393">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6394">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6394">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6395">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6395">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6396">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6396">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6397">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6397">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6398">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6398">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6399">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6399">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6400">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6400">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6401">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6401">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6402">GP 唯一名稱：DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6402">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6403">GP 名稱：設定磁碟快取大小，以位元組為單位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6403">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6404">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6404">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6405">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6405">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6406">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6406">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6407">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6407">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6408">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6408">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6409">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6409">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6410">數值名稱：DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6410">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6411">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6411">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6412">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6412">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x06400000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6413">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6413">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6414">喜好設定機碼名稱：DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6414">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6415">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6415">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6416">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6416">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6417">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6417">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6418">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6418">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6419">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6419">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6420">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6420">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6421">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6421">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6422">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程式的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6422">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6423">請注意，此原則只會設定每個查詢的預設模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6423">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6424">可以針對特殊類型的查詢 (例如解析 DNS-over-HTTPS 伺服器主機名稱的要求) 覆寫此模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6424">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6425">"off" 模式將會停用 DNS-over-HTTPS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6425">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6426">如果有可用的 DNS-over-HTTPS 伺服器，且可能會在發生錯誤時後援至傳送不安全的查詢，則 "automatic" 模式會優先傳送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查詢。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6426">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6427">"secure" 模式將只會傳送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查詢，且發生錯誤時無法解析。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6427">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6428">如果未設定此原則，則瀏覽器可能會將 DNS-over-HTTPS 要求傳送到與使用者設定的系統解析程式關聯的解析程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6428">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6429">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6429">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6430">關閉 (off) = 停用 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6430">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6431">自動 (automatic) = 啟用具有不安全遞補的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6431">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6432">安全 (secure) = 啟用沒有不安全遞補的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6432">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6433">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6433">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6434">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6434">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6435">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6435">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6436">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6436">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6437">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6437">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6438">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6438">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6439">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6439">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6440">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6440">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6441">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6441">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6442">GP 唯一名稱：DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6442">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6443">GP 名稱：控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6443">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6444">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6444">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6445">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6445">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6446">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6446">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6447">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6447">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6448">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6448">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6449">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6449">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6450">數值名稱：DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6450">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6451">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6451">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6452">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6452">Example value:</span></span>
```
"off"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6453">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6453">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6454">喜好設定機碼名稱：DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6454">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6455">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6455">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6456">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6456">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6457">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6457">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6458">指定所需的 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程式的 URI 範本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6458">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6459">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6459">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6460">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6460">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6461">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6461">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6462">所需的 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程式的 URI 範本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6462">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6463">若要指定多個 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程式，請以空格分隔對應的 URI 範本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6463">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6464">如果將 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 設定為 "secure"，則必須設定此原則，且不能為空白。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6464">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6465">如果將 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 設定為 "automatic"，並設定此原則，則會使用指定的 URI 範本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6465">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6466">如果未設定此原則，則會使用硬式編碼對應，嘗試將使用者目前的 DNS 解析程式升級至由相同提供者所運作的 DoH 解析程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6466">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6467">如果 URI 範本包含 dns 變數，對解析程式的要求將會使用 GET；否則要求會使用 POST。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6467">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6468">將忽略格式不正確的範本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6468">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6469">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6469">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6470">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6470">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6471">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6471">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6472">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6472">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6473">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6473">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6474">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6474">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6475">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6475">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6476">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6476">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6477">GP 唯一名稱：DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6477">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6478">GP 名稱：指定所需的 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程式的 URI 範本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6478">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6479">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6479">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6480">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6480">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6481">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6481">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6482">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6482">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6483">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6483">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6484">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6484">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6485">數值名稱：DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6485">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6486">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6486">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6487">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6487">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6488">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6488">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6489">喜好設定機碼名稱：DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6489">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6490">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6490">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6491">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6491">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6492">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6492">DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6493">設定下載目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6493">Set download directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6494">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6494">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6495">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6495">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6496">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6496">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6497">設定下載檔案時要使用的目錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6497">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6498">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用提供的目錄，而無論使用者是否已指定一個目錄或選擇要每次收到下載位置的提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6498">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6499">如需可使用的變數清單，請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6499">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6500">如果停用或未設定此原則，則會使用預設的下載目錄，且使用者可以變更它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6500">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6501">如果設定了無效路徑，Microsoft Edge 會預設為使用者的預設下載目錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6501">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6502">如果路徑指定的資料夾不存在，則下載會觸發提示，詢問使用者想要儲存其下載項目的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6502">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6503">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6503">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6504">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6504">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6505">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6505">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6506">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6506">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6507">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6507">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6508">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6508">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6509">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6509">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6510">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6510">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6511">GP 唯一名稱：DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6511">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6512">GP 名稱：設定下載目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6512">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6513">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6513">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6514">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6514">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6515">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6515">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6516">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6516">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6517">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6517">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6518">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6518">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6519">數值名稱：DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6519">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6520">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6520">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6521">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6521">Example value:</span></span>
```

"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
             
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6522">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6522">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6523">喜好設定機碼名稱：DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6523">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6524">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6524">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6525">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6525">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6526">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6526">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6527">允許下載限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6527">Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6528">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6528">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6529">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6529">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6530">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6530">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6531">設定 Microsoft Edge 完全封鎖的下載項目類型，而不讓使用者覆寫安全性決策。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6531">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6532">設定 'BlockDangerousDownloads' 以允許所有下載項目，但帶有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告的下載項目除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6532">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6533">設定 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' 以允許所有下載項目，但帶有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告的潛在危險或有害下載項目除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6533">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6534">設定 'BlockAllDownloads' 以封鎖所有下載項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6534">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6535">如果未設定此原則或設定 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' 選項，則下載會根據 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 分析結果，進行一般安全性限制檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6535">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6536">請注意，這些限制適用於來自網頁內容的下載項目，以及 [下載連結] 內容功能表選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6536">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6537">這些限制不適用於儲存或下載目前顯示的頁面，也不適用來自列印選項的 [另存為 PDF] 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6537">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6538">如需 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的詳細資訊，請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6538">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6539">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6539">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6540">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = 無特殊限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6540">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6541">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = 封鎖危險的下載項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6541">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6542">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = 封鎖有潛在危險或有害的下載項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6542">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6543">BlockAllDownloads (3) = 封鎖所有下載項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6543">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6544">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6544">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6545">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6545">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6546">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6546">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6547">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6547">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6548">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6548">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6549">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6549">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6550">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6550">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6551">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6551">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6552">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6552">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6553">GP 唯一名稱：DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6553">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6554">GP 名稱：允許下載限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6554">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6555">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6555">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6556">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6556">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6557">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6557">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6558">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6558">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6559">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6559">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6560">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6560">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6561">數值名稱：DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6561">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6562">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6562">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6563">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6563">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6564">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6564">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6565">喜好設定機碼名稱：DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6565">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6566">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6566">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6567">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6567">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6568">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6568">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6569">啟用集錦功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6569">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6570">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6570">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6571">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6571">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6572">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6572">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6573">讓您允許使用者存取集錦功能，在其中，他們可以以更有效率的方式收集、整理、共用及匯出內容，並具有 Office 整合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6573">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6574">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以在 Microsoft Edge 中存取並使用集錦功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6574">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6575">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法在 Microsoft Edge 中存取及使用集錦。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6575">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6576">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6576">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6577">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6577">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6578">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6578">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6579">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6579">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6580">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6580">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6581">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6581">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6582">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6582">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6583">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6583">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6584">GP 唯一名稱：EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6584">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6585">GP 名稱：啟用集錦功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6585">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6586">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6586">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6587">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6587">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6588">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6588">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6589">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6589">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6590">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6590">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6591">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6591">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6592">數值名稱：EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6592">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6593">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6593">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6594">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6594">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6595">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6595">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6596">喜好設定機碼名稱：EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6596">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6597">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6597">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6598">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6598">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6599">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6599">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6600">允許使用者編輯我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6600">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6601">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6601">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6602">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6602">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6603">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6603">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6604">啟用此原則可讓使用者新增、移除及修改我的最愛。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6604">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6605">如果未設定此原則，則這是預設行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6605">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6606">停用此原則可讓使用者無法新增、移除或修改我的最愛。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6606">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6607">他們仍可以使用現有的我的最愛。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6607">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6608">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6608">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6609">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6609">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6610">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6610">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6611">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6611">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6612">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6612">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6613">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6613">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6614">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6614">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6615">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6615">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6616">GP 唯一名稱：EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6616">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6617">GP 名稱：允許使用者編輯我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6617">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6618">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6618">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6619">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6619">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6620">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6620">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6621">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6621">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6622">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6622">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6623">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6623">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6624">數值名稱：EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6624">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6625">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6625">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6626">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6626">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6627">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6627">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6628">喜好設定機碼名稱：EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6628">Preference Key Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6629">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6629">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6630">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6630">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6631">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6631">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6632">在限定時間內重新啟用已過時的網頁平台功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6632">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6633">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6633">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6634">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6634">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6635">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6635">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6636">指定要暫時重新啟用的已過時網頁平台功能清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6636">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6637">此原則可讓您在限定時間內重新啟用已過時的網頁平台功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6637">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6638">功能會依字串標籤來識別。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6638">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6639">如果未設定此原則，如果清單為空白，或如果功能不符合支援的其中一個字串標籤，則所有過時的網頁平台功能會保持停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6639">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>
