<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6640">雖然上述平台上支援原則本身，它要啟用的功能可能無法在這所有平台上使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6640">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6641">並非所有過時的網頁平台功能都可以重新啟用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6641">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6642">只有下列明確列出的項目才可以重新啟用，且僅限於有限的一段時間，這會因每個功能而不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6642">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6643">您可以在 https://bit.ly/blinkintents 檢閱網頁平台功能變更的背後意圖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6643">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6644">字串標籤的一般格式為 [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6644">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6645">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6645">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6646">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = 啟用 ExampleDeprecatedFeature API 到 2008 年 9 月 2 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6646">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6647">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6647">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6648">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6648">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6649">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6649">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6650">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6650">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6651">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6651">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6652">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6652">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6653">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6653">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6654">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6654">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6655">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6655">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6656">GP 唯一名稱：EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6656">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6657">GP 名稱：在限定時間內重新啟用已過時的網頁平台功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6657">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6658">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6658">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6659">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6659">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6660">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6660">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6661">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6661">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6662">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6662">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6663">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6663">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6664">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6664">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6665">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6665">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6666">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6666">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6667">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6667">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6668">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6668">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6669">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6669">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6670">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6670">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6671">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6671">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6672">啟用從 Microsoft 進行網域動作下載 (已過時) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6672">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  
  
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-6673">已過時：此原則已過時，且無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 84 及之後的版本中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6673">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6674">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6674">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6675">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 到 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6675">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6676">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6676">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6677">這個原則無法使用，應避免衝突的狀態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6677">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6678">此原則原是用以啟用/停用網域動作清單的下載，但它並不一定能達到所需的狀態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6678">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6679">處理下載的實驗和設定服務擁有自己的群組原則，可設定從服務下載的內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6679">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6680">請改為使用 [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6680">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6681">在 Microsoft Edge 中，網域動作代表可協助瀏覽器在網路上正常運作的一系列相容性功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6681">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6682">Microsoft 會基於相容性原因，保留對特定網域採取的動作清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6682">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6683">例如，如果網站因為 Microsoft Edge 上的新使用者代理字串而損毀，則瀏覽器可能會覆寫網站上的使用者代理程式字串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6683">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6684">這些動作都是 Microsoft 嘗試解決網站擁有者的問題時的暫時性動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6684">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6685">當瀏覽器啟動，然後之後定期啟動時，瀏覽器將會與包含要執行的最新相容性動作清單的實驗和設定服務連絡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6685">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6686">此清單會在初次擷取之後儲存在本機，以便後續的要求只會在伺服器的複本變更之後才更新該清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6686">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6687">如果啟用此原則，則會繼續透過實驗和設定服務下載網域動作的清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6687">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6688">如果停用此原則，則不再會透過實驗和設定服務下載網域動作的清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6688">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6689">如果未設定此原則，則會繼續透過實驗和設定服務下載網域動作的清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6689">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6690">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6690">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6691">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6691">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6692">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6692">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6693">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6693">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6694">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6694">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6695">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6695">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6696">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6696">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6697">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6697">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6698">GP 唯一名稱：EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6698">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6699">GP 名稱：啟用從 Microsoft 進行網域動作下載 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6699">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6700">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6700">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6701">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6701">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6702">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6702">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6703">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6703">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6704">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6704">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6705">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6705">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6706">數值名稱：EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6706">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6707">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6707">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6708">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6708">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6709">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6709">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6710">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6710">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6711">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6711">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6712">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6712">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6713">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6713">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6714">啟用線上 OCSP/CRL 檢查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6714">Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6715">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6715">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6716">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6716">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6717">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6717">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6718">線上撤銷檢查不會提供顯著的安全性優點，而且預設為停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6718">Online revocation checks don't provide a significant security benefit and are disabled by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6719">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將會執行非封鎖性失敗的線上 OCSP/CRL 檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6719">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will perform soft-fail, online OCSP/CRL checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6720">「非封鎖性失敗」表示如果無法連接撤銷伺服器，則會將憑證視為有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6720">"Soft fail" means that if the revocation server can't be reached, the certificate will be considered valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6721">如果停用或未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 不會執行線上撤銷檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6721">If you disable the policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge won't perform online revocation checks.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6722">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6722">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6723">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6723">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6724">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6724">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6725">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6725">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6726">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6726">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6727">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6727">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6728">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6728">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6729">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6729">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6730">GP 唯一名稱：EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6730">GP unique name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6731">GP 名稱：啟用線上 OCSP/CRL 檢查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6731">GP name: Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6732">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6732">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6733">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6733">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6734">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6734">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6735">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6735">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6736">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6736">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6737">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6737">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6738">數值名稱：EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6738">Value Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6739">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6739">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6740">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6740">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6741">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6741">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6742">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6742">Preference Key Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6743">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6743">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6744">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6744">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6745">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6745">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6746">允許由本機信賴起點頒發的 SHA-1 簽章憑證 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6746">Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-6747">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6747">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6748">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6748">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6749">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6749">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6750">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6750">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6751">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6751">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6752">啟用此設定時，只要憑證連結接到本機安裝的根憑證，Microsoft Edge 就能以 SHA-1 簽署的憑證來保護您的連線，而這是有效的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6752">When this setting is enabled, Microsoft Edge allows connections secured by SHA-1 signed certificates so long as the the certificate chains to a locally-installed root certificate and is otherwise valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6753">請注意，此原則視允許 SHA-1 簽名的作業系統 (OS) 憑證驗證堆疊而定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6753">Note that this policy depends on the operating system (OS) certificate verification stack allowing SHA-1 signatures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6754">如果 OS 更新變更了 SHA-1 憑證的 OS 處理，可能會導致這個原則沒有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6754">If an OS update changes the OS handling of SHA-1 certificates, this policy might no longer have effect.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6755">此外，此原則旨在為企業提供更多時間來擺脫 SHA-1，以做為暫時的因應措施。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6755">Further, this policy is intended as a temporary workaround to give enterprises more time to move away from SHA-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6756">這項原則將會在 2021 年中旬的 Microsoft Edge 92 中被移除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6756">This policy will be removed in Microsoft Edge 92 releasing in mid 2021.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6757">如果您未設定此原則或將其設為 False，或將 SHA-1 憑證連結到公開信任的憑證根，Microsoft Edge 將不允許 SHA-1 簽署的憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6757">If you don't set this policy or set it to false, or the SHA-1 certificate chains to a publicly trusted certificate root, then Microsoft Edge won't allow certificates signed by SHA-1.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6758">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6758">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6759">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6759">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6760">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6760">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6761">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6761">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6762">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6762">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6763">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6763">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6764">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6764">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6765">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6765">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6766">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6766">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6767">GP 唯一名稱：EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6767">GP unique name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6768">GP 名稱：允許由本機信賴起點頒發的 SHA-1 簽章憑證 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6768">GP name: Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6769">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6769">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6770">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6770">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6771">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6771">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6772">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6772">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6773">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6773">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6774">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6774">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6775">值名稱：EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6775">Value Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6776">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6776">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6777">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6777">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6778">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6778">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6779">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6779">Preference Key Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6780">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6780">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6781">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6781">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6782">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6782">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6783">允許受管擴充功能使用企業硬體平台 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6783">Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6784">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6784">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6785">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6785">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6786">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6786">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6787">當此原則設定為已啟用時，即會允許由企業原則安裝的擴充功能，以使用企業硬體平台 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6787">When this policy is set to enabled, extensions installed by enterprise policy are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6788">當此原則設定為已停用或未設定時，則不會允許任何擴充功能使用企業硬體平台 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6788">When this policy is set to disabled or isn't set, no extensions are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6789">此原則也適用於元件擴充功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6789">This policy also applies to component extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6790">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6790">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6791">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6791">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6792">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6792">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6793">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6793">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6794">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6794">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6795">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6795">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6796">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6796">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6797">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6797">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6798">GP 唯一名稱：EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6798">GP unique name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6799">GP 名稱：允許受管擴充功能使用企業硬體平台 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6799">GP name: Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6800">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6800">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6801">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6801">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6802">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6802">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6803">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6803">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6804">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6804">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6805">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6805">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6806">數值名稱：EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6806">Value Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6807">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6807">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6808">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6808">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6809">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6809">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6810">喜好設定機碼名稱：EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6810">Preference Key Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6811">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6811">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6812">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6812">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6813">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6813">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6814">允許存取 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6814">Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6815">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6815">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6816">Windows 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6816">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6817">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6817">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6818">可讓您設定 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 是否可供使用者使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6818">Allows you to set whether Enterprise Mode Site List Manager is available to users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6819">如果啟用這項原則，使用者會在 edge://compat 頁面上看到 [Enterprise Mode Site List Manager] 瀏覽按鈕，瀏覽至該工具並加以使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6819">If you enable this policy, users can see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button on edge://compat page, navigate to the tool and use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6820">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者不會看到 [Enterprise Mode Site List Manager] 瀏覽按鈕，也無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6820">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users won't see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button and won't be able to use it.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6821">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6821">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6822">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6822">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6823">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6823">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6824">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6824">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6825">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6825">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6826">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6826">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6827">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6827">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6828">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6828">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6829">GP 唯一名稱：EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6829">GP unique name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6830">GP 名稱：允許存取 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6830">GP name: Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6831">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6831">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6832">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6832">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6833">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6833">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6834">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6834">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6835">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6835">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6836">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6836">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6837">值名稱：EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6837">Value Name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6838">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6838">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6839">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6839">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6840">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6840">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6841">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6841">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6842">針對網域中的指定檔案類型，停用下載檔案類型副檔名-警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6842">Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6843">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6843">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6844">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6844">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6845">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6845">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6846">您可以啟用此原則以建立一份檔案類型副檔名字典，及相對應的網域清單，可使這些檔案不受使用檔案類型副檔名的下載警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6846">You can enable this policy to create a dictionary of file type extensions with a corresponding list of domains that will be exempted from file type extension-based download warnings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6847">這可讓企業系統管理員封鎖與所列網域相關聯之檔案的檔案類型副檔名下載警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6847">This lets enterprise administrators block file type extension-based download warnings for files that are associated with a listed domain.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6848">例如，如果「jnlp」副檔名與「website1.com」相關聯，使用者在從「website1.com」下載「jnlp」檔案時就不會看到警示訊息，但在從　「website2.com」下載「jnlp」檔案時就會看到下載警示訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6848">For example, if  the "jnlp" extension is associated with "website1.com", users would not see a warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website1.com", but see a download warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website2.com".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6849">凡是檔案具有以此原則指定網域的檔案類型副檔名，仍受限於非檔案類型副檔名的安全性警告，例如混合式內容下載警示和 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的警示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6849">Files with file type extensions specified for domains identified by this policy will still be subject to non-file type extension-based security warnings such as mixed-content download warnings and Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6850">若您停用或未設定此原則，凡具有觸發以副檔名為依據的下載警示的檔案會向使用者顯示警示訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6850">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, file types that trigger extension-based download warnings will show warnings to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6851">如果您啟用這個原則：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6851">If you enable this policy:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6852">URL 模式的格式應依照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6852">The URL pattern should be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6853">輸入的檔案類型副檔名必須是小寫的 ASCII。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6853">The file type extension entered must be in lower-cased ASCII.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6854">在列出檔案類型副檔名時，不應包含前置分隔符號，因此請列出「jnlp」，而不是「.jnlp」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6854">The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type extension, so list "jnlp" should be used instead of ".jnlp".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6855">範例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6855">Example:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6856">下列範例數值可以防止 [contoso.com] 網域的 [swf]、[exe] 和 [jnlp 副檔名] 的檔案類型副檔名下載警示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6856">The following example value would prevent file type extension-based download warnings on swf, exe, and jnlp extensions for \*.contoso.com domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6857">它會在任何適於 exe 和 jnlp 檔案的其他網域中顯示使用者的檔案類型副檔名下載警示，但不適用於 swf 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6857">It will show the user a file type extension-based download warning on any other domain for exe and jnlp files, but not for swf files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6858">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6858">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6859">請注意，在以上範例中，雖然所有網域中的 [swf] 檔案禁止顯示檔案類型副檔名式下載警告，但由於安全性方面的問題考量，不建議您在任何危險的檔案類型副檔名上顯示這些警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6859">Note that while the preceding example shows the suppression of file type extension-based download warnings for "swf" files for all domains, applying suppression of such warnings for all domains for any dangerous file type extension is not recommended due to security concerns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6860">此範例僅顯示了執行此動作的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6860">It is shown in the example merely to demonstrate the ability to do so.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6861">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6861">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6862">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6862">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6863">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6863">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6864">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6864">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6865">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6865">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6866">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6866">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6867">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6867">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6868">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6868">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6869">GP 唯一名稱：ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6869">GP unique name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6870">GP 名稱：針對網域中的指定檔案類型，停用下載檔案類型副檔名-警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6870">GP name: Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6871">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6871">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6872">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6872">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6873">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6873">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6874">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6874">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6875">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6875">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6876">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6876">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6877">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6877">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6878">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6878">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6879">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6879">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {"domains": ["https://contoso.com", "contoso2.com"], "file_extension": "jnlp"}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {"domains": ["*"], "file_extension": "swf"}

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6880">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6880">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6881">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6881">Preference Key Name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6882">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6882">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}</string>
  <string>{'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6883">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6883">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6884">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6884">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6885">控制與實驗和設定服務的通訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6885">Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6886">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6886">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6887">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6887">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6888">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6888">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6889">在 Microsoft Edge 中，會使用實驗和設定服務來部署實驗和設定承載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6889">In Microsoft Edge, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy Experimentation and Configuration payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6890">實驗承載是由 Microsoft 為測試和意見反應所啟用的開發功能的早期清單所組成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6890">Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6891">設定承載包含 Microsoft 要部署到 Microsoft Edge 以最佳化使用者體驗的設定清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6891">Configuration payload consists of a list of settings that Microsoft wants to deploy to Microsoft Edge to optimize user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6892">例如，設定承載可指定 Microsoft Edge 傳送要求到實驗和設定服務以取得最新承載的頻率。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6892">For example, configuration payload may specify how often Microsoft Edge sends requests to the Experimentation and Configuration Service to retrieve the newest payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6893">此外，設定承載可能也包含基於相容性原因，要在特定網域上採取之動作的清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6893">Additionaly, configuration payload may also contain a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6894">例如，如果網站因為 Microsoft Edge 上的新使用者代理字串而損毀，則瀏覽器可能會覆寫網站上的使用者代理程式字串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6894">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6895">這些動作都是 Microsoft 嘗試解決網站擁有者的問題時的暫時性動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6895">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6896">如果將此原則設定為 'FullMode'，則會透過實驗和設定服務下載完整承載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6896">If you set this policy to 'FullMode', the full payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6897">這同時包括實驗和設定承載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6897">This includes both the experimentation and configuration payloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6898">如果將此原則設定為 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'，則只會傳遞設定承載。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6898">If you set this policy to 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode', only the configuration payload is delivered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6899">如果將此原則設定為 'RestrictedMode’，就會完全停止與實驗和設定服務的通訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6899">If you set this policy to 'RestrictedMode', the communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6900">如果未設定此原則，則在穩定和 Beta 版通道的受管理裝置上，其行為與 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode' 相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6900">If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device on Stable and Beta channels the behavior is the same as the 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6901">如果未設定此原則，則在未受管理的裝置上，其行為與 'FullMode' 相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6901">If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is the same as the 'FullMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6902">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6902">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6903">FullMode (2) = 擷取設定和實驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6903">FullMode (2) = Retrieve configurations and experiments</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6904">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = 僅擷取設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6904">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = Retrieve configurations only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6905">RestrictedMode (0) = 停用與實驗和設定服務的通訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6905">RestrictedMode (0) = Disable communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6906">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6906">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6907">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6907">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6908">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6908">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6909">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6909">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6910">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6910">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6911">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6911">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6912">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6912">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6913">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6913">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6914">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6914">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6915">GP 唯一名稱：ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6915">GP unique name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6916">GP 名稱：控制與實驗和設定服務的通訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6916">GP name: Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6917">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6917">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6918">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6918">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6919">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6919">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6920">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6920">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6921">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6921">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6922">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6922">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6923">數值名稱：ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6923">Value Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6924">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6924">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6925">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6925">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6926">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6926">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6927">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6927">Preference Key Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6928">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6928">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6929">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6929">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6930">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6930">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6931">在外部通訊協定對話方塊中顯示「一律開啟」核取方塊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6931">Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6932">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6932">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6933">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6933">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6934">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6934">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6935">此原則會控制是否要在外部通訊協定啟動確認提示中顯示 [一律允許此網站開啟這類連結] 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6935">This policy controls whether the "Always allow this site to open links of this type" checkbox is shown on external protocol launch confirmation prompts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6936">這個原則只適用於 https:// 連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6936">This policy only applies to https:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6937">如果啟用此原則，當外部通訊協定提示顯示時，使用者可以選取 [一律允許]，以在此網站上略過該通訊協定的所有未來確認提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6937">If you enable this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6938">如果停用此原則，則不會顯示 [一律允許] 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6938">If you disable this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6939">每次呼叫外部通訊協定時，都會提示使用者進行確認。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6939">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6940">在 Microsoft Edge 83 之前，如果您未設定此原則，則不會顯示 [永遠允許] 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6940">Prior to Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6941">每次呼叫外部通訊協定時，都會提示使用者進行確認。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6941">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6942">在 Microsoft Edge 83 上，如果未設定此原則，則核取方塊可見度會由 edge://flags 中的 [啟用記憶通訊協定啟動提示喜好設定] 旗標控制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6942">On Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the checkbox visibility is controlled by the "Enable remembering protocol launch prompting preferences" flag in edge://flags</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6943">截至 Microsoft Edge 84，如果不啟用此原則，當外部通訊協定確認提示顯示時，使用者可以選取 [一律允許]，以在此網站上略過該通訊協定的所有未來確認提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6943">As of Microsoft Edge 84, if you don't configure this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6944">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6944">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6945">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6945">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6946">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6946">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6947">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6947">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6948">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6948">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6949">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6949">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6950">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6950">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6951">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6951">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6952">GP 唯一名稱：ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6952">GP unique name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6953">GP 名稱：在外部通訊協定對話方塊中顯示 [一律開啟] 核取方塊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6953">GP name: Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6954">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6954">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6955">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6955">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6956">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6956">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6957">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6957">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6958">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6958">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6959">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6959">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6960">數值名稱：ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6960">Value Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6961">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6961">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6962">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6962">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6963">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6963">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6964">喜好設定機碼名稱：ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6964">Preference Key Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6965">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6965">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6966">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6966">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6967">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6967">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6968">允許使用者設定家長監護服務</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6968">Allow users to configure Family safety</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6969">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6969">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6970">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6970">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6971">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6971">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6972">此原則會停用並在 [設定] 中完全隱藏 [家長監護服務] 頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6972">This policy disables and completely hides the Family safety page in Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6973">瀏覽至 edge://settings/familysafety 也會遭到封鎖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6973">Navigation to edge://settings/familysafety will also be blocked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6974">[家長監護服務] 頁面會說明哪些功能可供家庭群組使用，以及如何加入家庭群組。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6974">The Family safety page describes what features are available for family groups and how to join a family group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6975">在這裡深入了解家長監護服務：([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6975">Learn more about family safety here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6976">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則會顯示「家長監護服務」頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6976">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Family safety page will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-6977">如果停用此原則，則不會顯示家長監護服務頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6977">If you disable this policy, the Family safety page will not be shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6978">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6978">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6979">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6979">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6980">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6980">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6981">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6981">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6982">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6982">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6983">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6983">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6984">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6984">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6985">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6985">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6986">GP 唯一名稱：FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6986">GP unique name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6987">GP 名稱：允許使用者設定家長監護服務</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6987">GP name: Allow users to configure Family safety</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6988">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6988">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6989">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6989">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6990">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6990">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6991">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6991">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6992">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6992">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6993">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6993">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6994">數值名稱：FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6994">Value Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6995">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6995">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6996">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6996">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6997">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6997">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6998">喜好設定機碼名稱：FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6998">Preference Key Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-6999">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-6999">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7000">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7000">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7001">FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7001">FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7002">啟用我的最愛列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7002">Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7003">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7003">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7004">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7004">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7005">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7005">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7006">啟用或停用我的最愛列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7006">Enables or disables the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7007">如果啟用此原則，則使用者會看到我的最愛列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7007">If you enable this policy, users will see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7008">如果停用此原則，則使用者不會看到我的最愛列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7008">If you disable this policy, users won't see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7009">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以決定是否使用我的最愛列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7009">If this policy is not configured, then the user can decide to use the favorites bar or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7010">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7010">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7011">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7011">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7012">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7012">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7013">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7013">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7014">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7014">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7015">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7015">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7016">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7016">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7017">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7017">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7018">GP 唯一名稱：FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7018">GP unique name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7019">GP 名稱：啟用我的最愛列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7019">GP name: Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7020">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7020">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7021">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7021">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7022">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7022">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7023">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7023">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7024">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7024">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7025">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7025">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7026">數值名稱：FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7026">Value Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7027">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7027">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7028">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7028">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7029">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7029">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7030">喜好設定機碼名稱：FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7030">Preference Key Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7031">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7031">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7032">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7032">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7033">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7033">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7034">強制執行 Bing 安全搜尋</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7034">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7035">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7035">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7036">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7036">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7037">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7037">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7038">確認 Bing Web 搜尋中的查詢是在將安全搜尋設定為指定值的情況下完成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7038">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7039">使用者無法變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7039">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7040">如果將此原則設定為 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode'，則「Bing 搜尋中的安全搜尋」會後援至 bing.com 值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7040">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7041">如果將此原則設定為 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode'，則會在安全搜尋中使用中等設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7041">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7042">中等設定會篩選成人影片和影像，但不會篩選搜尋結果中的文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7042">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7043">如果將此原則設定為 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode'，則會在安全搜尋中使用嚴格設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7043">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7044">嚴格設定會篩選成人文字、影像和影片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7044">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7045">如果停用或不設定此原則，則「Bing 搜尋中的安全搜尋」不會強制執行，而使用者可以在 bing.com 上設定他們需要的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7045">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7046">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7046">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7047">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = 不要在 Bing 中設定搜尋限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7047">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7048">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = 在 Bing 中設定中等搜尋限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7048">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7049">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = 在 Bing 中設定嚴格搜尋限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7049">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7050">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7050">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7051">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7051">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7052">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7052">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7053">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7053">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7054">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7054">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7055">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7055">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7056">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7056">Integer</span></span>
