  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7057">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7057">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7058">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7058">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7059">GP 唯一名稱：ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7059">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7060">GP 名稱：強制執行 Bing 安全搜尋</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7060">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7061">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7061">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7062">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7062">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7063">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7063">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7064">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7064">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7065">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7065">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7066">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7066">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7067">數值名稱：ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7067">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7068">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7068">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7069">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7069">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7070">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7070">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7071">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7071">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7072">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7072">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7073">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7073">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7074">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7074">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7075">設定使用 "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls" 設定的網站有多個憑證相符時，Microsoft Edge 是否應自動選取憑證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7075">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7076">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7076">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7077">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7077">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7078">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7078">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7079">切換有多個憑證可用且使用 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 設定網站時，是否提示使用者選取憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7079">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7080">如果未針對網站設定 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls)，則一律會提示使用者選取憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7080">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7081">如果將此原則設定為 True，則在有多個憑證時 (且僅在此情況下)，Microsoft Edge 會提示使用者針對 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 定義的清單上的網站選取憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7081">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7082">如果將此原則設定為 False 或未設定，即使有憑證的多個相符項目，Microsoft Edge 也會自動選取憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7082">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7083">針對在 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 所定義清單中的網站，系統不會提示使用者選取憑證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7083">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7084">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7084">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7085">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7085">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7086">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7086">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7087">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7087">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7088">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7088">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7089">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7089">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7090">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7090">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7091">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7091">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7092">GP 唯一名稱：ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7092">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7093">GP 名稱：設定以 "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls" 設定的網站有多個憑證相符時，是否應自動選取憑證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7093">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7094">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7094">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7095">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7095">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7096">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7096">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7097">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7097">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7098">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7098">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7099">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7099">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7100">數值名稱：ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7100">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7101">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7101">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7102">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7102">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7103">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7103">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7104">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7104">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7105">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7105">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7106">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7106">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7107">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7107">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7108">啟用使用暫時設定檔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7108">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7109">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7109">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7110">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7110">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7111">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7111">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7112">控制使用者設定檔是否切換為暫時模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7112">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7113">暫時設定檔會在工作階段開始時建立，並在工作階段結束時刪除，且與使用者的原始設定檔相關聯。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7113">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7114">如果啟用此原則，則設定檔會在暫時模式中執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7114">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7115">這可讓使用者透過自己的裝置工作，而不需要將瀏覽資料儲存到這些裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7115">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7116">如果將此原則啟用為 OS 原則 (例如，在 Windows 上使用 GPO)，則它會套用至系統上的每個設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7116">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7117">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者會在登入瀏覽器時取得一般的設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7117">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7118">在暫時模式中，設定檔資料只會在該使用者工作階段期間儲存在磁碟上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7118">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7119">瀏覽器歷程記錄、擴充功能及其資料、Web 資料 (如 Cookie)，以及 Web 資料庫等功能，不會於瀏覽器關閉之後儲存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7119">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7120">這不會防止使用者手動將任何資料下載到磁碟，或是儲存頁面或列印頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7120">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7121">如果使用者已啟用同步，則會如同一般設定檔的方式，將所有資料保留在其同步帳戶中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7121">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7122">使用者也可以在暫時模式中使用 InPrivate 瀏覽，除非您明確地將它停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7122">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7123">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7123">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7124">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7124">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7125">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7125">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7126">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7126">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7127">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7127">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7128">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7128">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7129">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7129">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7130">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7130">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7131">GP 唯一名稱：ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7131">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7132">GP 名稱：啟用使用暫時設定檔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7132">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7133">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7133">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7134">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7134">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7135">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7135">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7136">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7136">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7137">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7137">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7138">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7138">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7139">數值名稱：ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7139">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7140">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7140">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7141">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7141">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7142">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7142">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7143">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7143">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7144">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7144">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7145">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7145">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7146">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7146">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7147">強制執行 Google 安全搜尋</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7147">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7148">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7148">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7149">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7149">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7150">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7150">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7151">強制在 Google Web Search 中的查詢執行時將安全搜尋設為作用中，並防止使用者變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7151">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7152">如果啟用此原則，則 Google 搜尋中的安全搜尋一律會是作用中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7152">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7153">如果停用或未設定此原則，則不會在 Google 搜尋中強制執行安全搜尋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7153">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7154">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7154">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7155">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7155">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7156">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7156">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7157">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7157">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7158">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7158">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7159">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7159">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7160">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7160">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7161">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7161">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7162">GP 唯一名稱：ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7162">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7163">GP 名稱：強制執行 Google 安全搜尋</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7163">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7164">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7164">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7165">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7165">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7166">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7166">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7167">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7167">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7168">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7168">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7169">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7169">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7170">數值名稱：ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7170">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7171">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7171">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7172">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7172">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7173">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7173">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7174">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7174">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7175">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7175">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7176">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7176">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7177">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7177">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7178">使用預設的查閱者原則－當降級且無查閱者時 (已被取代)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7178">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-7179">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7179">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7180">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7180">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7181">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7181">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7182">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7182">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7183">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7183">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7184">此原則已遭取代，因為此原則只是一個短期機制，用於讓企業在發現其 Web 內容與目前預設的查閱者原則不一致時，可以有更多時間來更新其 Web 內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7184">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the current default referrer policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7185">無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 86 中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7185">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 86.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7186">Microsoft Edge 的預設查閱者原則正在強化，透過逐步推出，從其目前的 no-referrer-when-downgrade 值到更安全的 strict-origin-when-cross-origin。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7186">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy is being strengthened from its current value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin through a gradual rollout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7187">推出之前，此企業原則將不會有任何影響。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7187">Before the rollout, this enterprise policy will have no effect.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7188">在推出之後，啟用此企業原則時，會將 Microsoft Edge 的預設查閱者原則設定為其舊值 no-referrer-when-downgrade。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7188">After the rollout, when this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7189">此企業原則預設會停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7189">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7190">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7190">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7191">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7191">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7192">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7192">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7193">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7193">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7194">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7194">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7195">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7195">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7196">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7196">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7197">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7197">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7198">GP 唯一名稱：ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7198">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7199">GP 名稱：使用預設的查閱者原則－當降級且無查閱者時 (已被取代)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7199">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7200">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7200">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7201">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7201">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7202">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7202">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7203">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7203">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7204">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7204">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7205">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7205">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7206">數值名稱：ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7206">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7207">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7207">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7208">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7208">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7209">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7209">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7210">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7210">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7211">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7211">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7212">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7212">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7213">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7213">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7214">強制網路程式碼在瀏覽器處理程序中執行 (已過時) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7214">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  
  
  
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-7215">已過時：此原則已過時，且無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 83 及之後版本中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7215">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7216">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7216">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7217">Windows 上，版本 78 至 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7217">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7218">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7218">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7219">此原則已遭取代，因為其只是一種短期機制，目的是要讓企業有更多時間可遷移到不依賴於使用網路 API 的第 3 方軟體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7219">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7220">建議透過 LSP 和 WIN32 API 修補來使用 Proxy 伺服器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7220">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7221">此原則會強制在瀏覽器處理程序中執行網路程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7221">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7222">此原則預設為停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7222">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7223">如果啟用，當網路處理程序在沙盒中執行時，使用者會面臨安全性問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7223">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>


 

  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7224">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7224">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7225">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7225">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7226">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7226">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7227">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7227">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7228">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7228">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7229">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7229">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7230">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7230">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7231">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7231">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7232">GP 唯一名稱：ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7232">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7233">GP 名稱：GP 名稱：強制網路程式碼在瀏覽器處理程序中執行 (已淘汰) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7233">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7234">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7234">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7235">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7235">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7236">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7236">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7237">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7237">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7238">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7238">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7239">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7239">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7240">數值名稱：ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7240">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7241">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7241">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7242">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7242">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7243">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7243">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7244">ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7244">ForceSync</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7245">強制同步處理瀏覽器資料，且不顯示同步同意提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7245">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7246">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7246">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7247">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7247">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7248">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7248">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7249">Microsoft Edge 中的強制執行資料同步處理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7249">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7250">這個原則也可以防止使用者關閉同步處理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7250">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7251">如果您未設定此原則，使用者將可以開啟或關閉同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7251">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7252">如果您啟用此原則，使用者將無法關閉同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7252">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7253">若要讓此原則能夠正常運作，不可設定 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 原則，或必須設定為啟用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7253">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7254">如果將 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 設為停用，則 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 將不會生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7254">If [ForceSync](#forcesync) is set to disabled, then [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7255">不可設定 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)，或必須設定為 False。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7255">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7256">如果將此原則設為 True，則 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 將不會生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7256">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7257">0 = 不會自動開始同步處理及顯示同步同意（預設值） 1 = 針對 Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded 的使用者設定檔開啟強制同步處理，且不會顯示同步同意提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7257">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7258">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7258">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7259">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7259">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7260">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7260">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7261">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7261">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7262">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7262">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7263">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7263">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7264">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7264">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7265">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7265">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7266">GP 唯一名稱：ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7266">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7267">GP 唯一名稱：強制同步處理瀏覽器資料，且不顯示同步同意提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7267">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7268">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7268">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7269">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7269">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7270">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7270">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7271">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7271">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7272">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7272">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7273">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7273">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7274">數值名稱：ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7274">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7275">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7275">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7276">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7276">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7277">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7277">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7278">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7278">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7279">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7279">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7280">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7280">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7281">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7281">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7282">強制最小 YouTube 限制模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7282">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7283">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7283">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7284">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7284">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7285">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7285">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7286">在 YouTube 上強制執行最小限制模式，並防止使用者選取較不受限制的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7286">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7287">設定為 '嚴格' ，強制在 YouTube 上使用嚴格限制模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7287">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7288">設定為 '中等'，強制使用者只能在 YouTube 上使用中等限制模式和嚴格限制模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7288">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7289">他們無法停用限制模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7289">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7290">設定為 '關閉' 或不設定此原則，以不要在 YouTube 上強制執行限制模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7290">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7291">YouTube 原則等外部原則可能仍會強制執行限制模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7291">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7292">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7292">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7293">關閉 (0) = 不要在 YouTube 上強制執行限制模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7293">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7294">中等 (1) = 強制在 YouTube 上至少使用中等限制模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7294">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7295">嚴格 (2) = 針對 YouTube 強制使用嚴格限制模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7295">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7296">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7296">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7297">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7297">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7298">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7298">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7299">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7299">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7300">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7300">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7301">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7301">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7302">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7302">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7303">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7303">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7304">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7304">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7305">GP 唯一名稱：ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7305">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7306">GP 名稱：強制最小 YouTube 限制模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7306">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7307">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7307">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7308">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7308">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7309">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7309">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7310">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7310">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7311">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7311">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7312">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7312">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7313">數值名稱：ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7313">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7314">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7314">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7315">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7315">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7316">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7316">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7317">喜好設定機碼名稱：ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7317">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7318">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7318">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7319">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7319">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7320">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7320">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7321">允許全螢幕模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7321">Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7322">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7322">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7323">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7323">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7324">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7324">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7325">設定全螢幕模式的可用性 - 所有 Microsoft Edge UI 都會隱藏，且只會顯示網頁內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7325">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7326">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則擁有適當權限的使用者、應用程式和擴充功能即可以進入全螢幕模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7326">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7327">如果停用此原則，則使用者、應用程式和擴充功能無法進入全螢幕模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7327">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7328">停用全螢幕模式時，無法使用命令列在 kiosk 模式中開啟 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7328">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7329">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7329">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7330">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7330">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7331">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7331">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7332">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7332">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7333">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7333">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7334">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7334">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7335">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7335">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7336">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7336">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7337">GP 唯一名稱：FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7337">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7338">GP 名稱：允許全螢幕模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7338">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7339">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7339">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7340">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7340">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7341">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7341">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7342">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7342">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7343">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7343">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7344">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7344">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7345">數值名稱：FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7345">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7346">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7346">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7347">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7347">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7348">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7348">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7349">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7349">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7350">啟用全域範圍的 HTTP 驗證快取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7350">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7351">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7351">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7352">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7352">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7353">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7353">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7354">此原則會使用 HTTP 伺服器驗證認證來根據每個設定檔快取設定單一全域範圍。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7354">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7355">如果停用或未設定此原則，則瀏覽器將會使用跨網站驗證的預設行為，於版本 80 開始時，將由熱門網站限定在 HTTP 伺服器驗證認證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7355">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7356">因此，如果兩個網站使用來自相同驗證網域的資源，就必須在這兩個網站的環境中個別提供認證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7356">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7357">快取的 Proxy 認證會跨網站重複使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7357">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7358">如果啟用此原則，則在一個網站內容中輸入的 HTTP 驗證認證，將會自動用於另一個網站內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7358">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7359">啟用此原則會使得網站遭受某種類型的跨網站攻擊，並允許跨網站追蹤使用者 (甚至是在沒有 Cookie 的情況下)，方法是使用內嵌在 URL 中的身分認證將項目新增至 HTTP 驗證快取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7359">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7360">此原則目的在讓基於舊版行為的企業有機會更新其登入程序，並將在未來移除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7360">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7361">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7361">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7362">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7362">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7363">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7363">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7364">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7364">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7365">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7365">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7366">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7366">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7367">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7367">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7368">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7368">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7369">GP 唯一名稱：GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7369">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7370">GP 名稱：啟用全域範圍的 HTTP 驗證快取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7370">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7371">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7371">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7372">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7372">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7373">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7373">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7374">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7374">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7375">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7375">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7376">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7376">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7377">數值名稱：GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7377">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7378">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7378">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7379">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7379">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7380">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7380">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7381">喜好設定機碼名稱：GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7381">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7382">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7382">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7383">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7383">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7384">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7384">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7385">強制直接進行內部網路網站導覽，而非在網址列中搜尋單字項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7385">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7386">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7386">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7387">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7387">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7388">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7388">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7389">如果啟用此原則，如果在網址列中輸入的文字是不帶標點符號的單一字詞，則網址列建議清單中最上方的自動建議結果會導覽至內部網路網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7389">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7390">輸入不帶標點符號的文字時，預設的導覽會是導覽至符合所輸入文字的內部網路網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7390">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7391">如果啟用此原則，網址列建議清單中的第二個自動建議結果會完全按照所輸入的單字來執行網頁搜尋，前提是此文字為不帶標點符號的單一字詞。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7391">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7392">將使用預設的搜尋提供者，除非也啟用防止網頁搜尋的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7392">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7393">啟用此原則的兩個影響如下：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7393">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7394">瀏覽至網站以回應一般會解析為歷程記錄項目的單一文字查詢功能將不再發生。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7394">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7395">相反地，瀏覽器會嘗試巡覽至可能不存在組織內部網路中的內部網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7395">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7396">這會導致 404 錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7396">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7397">熱門、單一文字搜尋字詞將需要手動選取搜尋建議，才能正確執行搜尋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7397">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7398">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7398">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7399">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7399">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7400">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7400">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7401">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7401">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7402">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7402">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7403">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7403">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7404">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7404">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7405">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7405">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7406">GP 唯一名稱：GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7406">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7407">GP 名稱：強制直接進行內部網路網站導覽，而非在網址列中搜尋單字項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7407">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7408">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7408">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7409">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7409">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7410">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7410">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7411">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7411">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7412">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7412">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7413">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7413">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7414">數值名稱：GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7414">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7415">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7415">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7416">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7416">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7417">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7417">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7418">喜好設定機碼名稱：GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7418">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7419">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7419">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7420">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7420">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7421">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7421">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7422">設定會略過 HSTS 原則檢查的名稱清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7422">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7423">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7423">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7424">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7424">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7425">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7425">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7426">在此清單中指定的主機名稱將從可能會將要求從 "http://" 升級為 "https://" 的 HSTS 原則檢查中免除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7426">Hostnames specified in this list will be exempt from the HSTS policy check that could potentially upgrade requests from "http://" to "https://".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7427">此原則中僅允許單一標籤的主機名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7427">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7428">主機名稱必須是正式的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7428">Hostnames must be canonicalized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7429">任何 IDN 都必須轉換成其 A 標籤格式，且所有 ASCII 字母都必須是小寫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7429">Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7430">此原則僅適用指定的特定主機名稱；不會套用到清單中名稱的子網域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7430">This policy only applies to the specific hostnames specified; it doesn't apply to subdomains of the names in the list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7431">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7431">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7432">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7432">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7433">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7433">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7434">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7434">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7435">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7435">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7436">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7436">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7437">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7437">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7438">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7438">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7439">GP 唯一名稱：HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7439">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7440">GP 名稱：設定會略過 HSTS 原則檢查的名稱清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7440">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7441">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7441">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7442">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7442">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7443">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7443">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7444">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7444">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7445">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7445">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7446">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7446">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7447">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7447">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7448">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7448">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7449">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7449">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7450">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7450">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7451">喜好設定機碼名稱：HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7451">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7452">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7452">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7453">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7453">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7454">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7454">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7455">可用時便使用硬體加速</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7455">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7456">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7456">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7457">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7457">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7458">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7458">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7459">指定使用硬體加速 (如果有的話)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7459">Specify to use hardware acceleration, if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7460">如果啟用此原則或未設定，除非明確封鎖 GPU 功能，否則會啟用硬體加速。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7460">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7461">如果停用此原則，則會停用硬體加速。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7461">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7462">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7462">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7463">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7463">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7464">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7464">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7465">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7465">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7466">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7466">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7467">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7467">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7468">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7468">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7469">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7469">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7470">GP 唯一名稱：HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7470">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7471">GP 名稱：可用時便使用硬體加速</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7471">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7472">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7472">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7473">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7473">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7474">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7474">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7475">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7475">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7476">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7476">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7477">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7477">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7478">數值名稱：HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7478">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7479">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7479">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7480">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7480">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7481">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7481">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7482">喜好設定機碼名稱：HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7482">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7483">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7483">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7484">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7484">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7485">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7485">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7486">隱藏初次執行體驗與啟動顯示畫面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7486">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7487">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7487">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7488">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7488">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7489">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7489">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7490">如果啟用此原則，則當使用者初次執行 Microsoft Edge 時，不會向使用者顯示初次執行體驗與啟動顯示畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7490">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7491">針對初次執行體驗中顯示的設定選項，瀏覽器將會預設為下列項目：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7491">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7492">- 在 [新索引標籤] 頁面上，摘要類型將設定為 MSN 新聞，而版面配置為 [佈景]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7492">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7493">- 如果 Windows 帳戶屬於 Azure AD 或 MSA 類型，則使用者仍會自動登入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7493">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7494">- 預設不會啟用同步，且使用者將可以從同步設定開啟同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7494">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be able to turn on sync from the sync settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7495">如果停用或未設定此原則，則會顯示初次執行體驗和啟動顯示畫面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7495">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>
