<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7496">注意：在初次執行體驗中向使用者顯示的特定設定選項，也可以使用其他特定原則來管理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7496">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7497">您可以使用 HideFirstRunExperience 原則結合這些原則，以在受管理的裝置上設定特定的瀏覽器體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7497">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7498">其他原則中的一部分為：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7498">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7499">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7499">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7500">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7500">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7501">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7501">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7502">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7502">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7503">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7503">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7504">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7504">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7505">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7505">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7506">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7506">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7507">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7507">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7508">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7508">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7509">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7509">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7510">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7510">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7511">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7511">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7512">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7512">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7513">GP 唯一名稱：HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7513">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7514">GP 名稱：隱藏初次執行體驗與啟動顯示畫面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7514">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7515">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7515">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7516">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7516">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7517">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7517">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7518">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7518">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7519">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7519">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7520">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7520">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7521">數值名稱：HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7521">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7522">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7522">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7523">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7523">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7524">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7524">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7525">喜好設定機碼名稱：HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7525">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7526">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7526">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7527">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7527">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7528">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7528">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7529">允許匯入自動填寫表單資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7529">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7530">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7530">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7531">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7531">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7532">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7532">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7533">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將自動填寫表單資料匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7533">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7534">如果啟用此原則，則會自動選取手動匯入自動填寫資料的選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7534">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7535">如果停用此原則，則自動填寫表單資料不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7535">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7536">如果未設定此原則，則會在初次執行時匯入自動填寫資料，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入此資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7536">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7537">您可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7537">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7538">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入自動填寫資料，但是使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [自動填寫資料]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7538">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7539">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 和 Mozilla Firefox (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 瀏覽器的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7539">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7540">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7540">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7541">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7541">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7542">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7542">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7543">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7543">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7544">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7544">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7545">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7545">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7546">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7546">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7547">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7547">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7548">GP 唯一名稱：ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7548">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7549">GP 名稱：允許匯入自動填寫表單資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7549">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7550">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7550">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7551">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7551">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7552">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7552">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7553">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7553">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7554">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7554">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7555">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7555">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7556">數值名稱：ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7556">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7557">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7557">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7558">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7558">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7559">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7559">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7560">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7560">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7561">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7561">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7562">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7562">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7563">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7563">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7564">允許匯入瀏覽器設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7564">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7565">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7565">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7566">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7566">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7567">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7567">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7568">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將瀏覽器設定匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7568">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7569">如果啟用此原則，[匯入瀏覽器資料]\*\*\*\* 對話方塊中會自動選取 [瀏覽器設定]\*\*\*\* 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7569">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7570">如果停用此原則，則瀏覽器設定不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7570">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7571">如果未設定此原則，則會在初次執行時匯入瀏覽器設定，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7571">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7572">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7572">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7573">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入設定，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [瀏覽器設定]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7573">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7574">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及 macOS 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7574">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7575">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7575">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7576">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7576">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7577">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7577">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7578">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7578">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7579">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7579">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7580">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7580">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7581">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7581">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7582">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7582">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7583">GP 唯一名稱：ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7583">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7584">GP 名稱：允許匯入瀏覽器設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7584">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7585">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7585">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7586">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7586">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7587">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7587">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7588">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7588">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7589">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7589">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7590">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7590">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7591">數值名稱：ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7591">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7592">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7592">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7593">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7593">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7594">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7594">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7595">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7595">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7596">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7596">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7597">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7597">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7598">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7598">ImportCookies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7599">允許匯入 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7599">Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7600">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7600">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7601">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7601">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7602">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7602">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7603">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將 Cookie 匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7603">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7604">如果停用此原則，則 Cookie 不會在初次執行時匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7604">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7605">如果未設定此原則，則 Cookie 會在初次執行時匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7605">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7606">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7606">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7607">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7607">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7608">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及 macOS 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7608">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7609">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7609">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7610">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7610">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7611">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7611">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7612">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7612">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7613">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7613">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7614">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7614">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7615">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7615">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7616">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7616">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7617">GP 唯一名稱：ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7617">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7618">GP 名稱：允許匯入 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7618">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7619">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7619">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7620">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7620">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7621">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7621">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7622">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7622">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7623">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7623">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7624">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7624">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7625">數值名稱：ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7625">Value Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7626">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7626">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7627">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7627">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7628">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7628">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7629">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7629">Preference Key Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7630">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7630">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7631">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7631">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7632">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7632">ImportExtensions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7633">允許匯入擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7633">Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7634">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7634">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7635">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7635">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7636">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7636">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7637">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將擴充功能匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7637">Allows users to import extensions from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7638">如果啟用此原則，[匯入瀏覽器資料]\*\*\*\* 對話方塊中會自動選取 [擴充功能]\*\*\*\* 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7638">If you enable this policy, the **Extensions** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7639">如果停用此原則，則擴充功能不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7639">If you disable this policy, extensions aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7640">如果未設定此原則，則會在初次執行時匯入擴充功能，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7640">If you don't configure this policy, extensions are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7641">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7641">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7642">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入擴充功能，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [我的最愛]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7642">This means that Microsoft Edge imports extensions on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7643">**注意**：此原則目前只支援來自 Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7643">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7644">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7644">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7645">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7645">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7646">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7646">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7647">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7647">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7648">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7648">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7649">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7649">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7650">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7650">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7651">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7651">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7652">GP 唯一名稱：ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7652">GP unique name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7653">GP 名稱：允許匯入擴充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7653">GP name: Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7654">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7654">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7655">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7655">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7656">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7656">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7657">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7657">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7658">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7658">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7659">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7659">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7660">數值名稱：ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7660">Value Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7661">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7661">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7662">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7662">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7663">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7663">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7664">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7664">Preference Key Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7665">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7665">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7666">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7666">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7667">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7667">ImportFavorites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7668">允許匯入我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7668">Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7669">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7669">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7670">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7670">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7671">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7671">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7672">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將我的最愛匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7672">Allows users to import favorites from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7673">如果啟用此原則，[匯入瀏覽器資料]\*\*\*\* 對話方塊中會自動選取 [我的最愛]\*\*\*\* 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7673">If you enable this policy, the **Favorites** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7674">如果停用此原則，則 [我的最愛] 不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7674">If you disable this policy, favorites aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7675">如果未設定此原則，則在初次執行時匯入我的最愛，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7675">If you don't configure this policy, favorites are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7676">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7676">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7677">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入我的最愛，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [我的最愛]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7677">This means that Microsoft Edge imports favorites on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7678">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Internet Explorer (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上)、Mozilla Firefox (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上)，以及 Apple Safari (在 macOS 上) 瀏覽器的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7678">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7679">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7679">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7680">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7680">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7681">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7681">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7682">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7682">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7683">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7683">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7684">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7684">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7685">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7685">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7686">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7686">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7687">GP 唯一名稱：ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7687">GP unique name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7688">GP 名稱：允許匯入我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7688">GP name: Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7689">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7689">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7690">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7690">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7691">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7691">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7692">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7692">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7693">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7693">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7694">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7694">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7695">數值名稱：ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7695">Value Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7696">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7696">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7697">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7697">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7698">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7698">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7699">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7699">Preference Key Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7700">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7700">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7701">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7701">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7702">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7702">ImportHistory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7703">允許匯入瀏覽歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7703">Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7704">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7704">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7705">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7705">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7706">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7706">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7707">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將瀏覽歷程記錄匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7707">Allows users to import their browsing history from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7708">如果啟用此原則，[匯入瀏覽器資料]\*\*\*\* 對話方塊中會自動選取 [瀏覽歷程記錄]\*\*\*\* 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7708">If you enable this policy, the **Browsing history** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7709">如果停用此原則，則瀏覽歷程記錄資料不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入此資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7709">If you disable this policy, browsing history data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import this data manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7710">如果未設定此原則，瀏覽歷程記錄資料會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7710">If you don't configure this policy, browsing history data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7711">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7711">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7712">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入瀏覽歷程記錄，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [歷程記錄]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7712">This means that Microsoft Edge imports browsing history on first run, but users can select or clear the **history** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7713">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Internet Explorer (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及 macOS 上)、Mozilla Firefox (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 以及 Apple Safari (macOS) 瀏覽器的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7713">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7714">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7714">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7715">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7715">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7716">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7716">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7717">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7717">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7718">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7718">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7719">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7719">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7720">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7720">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7721">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7721">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7722">GP 唯一名稱：ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7722">GP unique name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7723">GP 名稱：允許匯入瀏覽歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7723">GP name: Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7724">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7724">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7725">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7725">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7726">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7726">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7727">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7727">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7728">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7728">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7729">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7729">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7730">數值名稱：ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7730">Value Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7731">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7731">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7732">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7732">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7733">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7733">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7734">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7734">Preference Key Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7735">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7735">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7736">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7736">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7737">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7737">ImportHomepage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7738">允許匯入首頁設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7738">Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7739">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7739">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7740">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7740">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7741">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7741">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7742">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將首頁設定匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7742">Allows users to import their home page setting from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7743">如果啟用此原則，則會自動選取手動匯入首頁設定的選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7743">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import the home page setting is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7744">如果停用此原則，則首頁設定不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7744">If you disable this policy, the home page setting isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7745">如果未設定此原則，首頁設定會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入此資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7745">If you don't configure this policy, the home page setting is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7746">您可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7746">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7747">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入首頁設定，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [首頁]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7747">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the home page setting on first run, but users can select or clear the **home page** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7748">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Internet Explorer (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7748">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7749">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7749">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7750">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7750">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7751">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7751">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7752">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7752">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7753">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7753">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7754">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7754">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7755">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7755">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7756">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7756">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7757">GP 唯一名稱：ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7757">GP unique name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7758">GP 名稱：允許匯入首頁設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7758">GP name: Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7759">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7759">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7760">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7760">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7761">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7761">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7762">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7762">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7763">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7763">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7764">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7764">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7765">數值名稱：ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7765">Value Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7766">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7766">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7767">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7767">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7768">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7768">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7769">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7769">Preference Key Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7770">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7770">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7771">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7771">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7772">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7772">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7773">允許匯入開啟的索引標籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7773">Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7774">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7774">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7775">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7775">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7776">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7776">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7777">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將開啟和釘選的索引標籤匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7777">Allows users to import open and pinned tabs from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7778">如果啟用此原則，[匯入瀏覽器資料]\*\*\*\* 對話方塊中會自動選取 [開啟的索引標籤]\*\*\*\* 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7778">If you enable this policy, the **Open tabs** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7779">如果停用此原則，則開啟的索引標籤不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7779">If you disable this policy, open tabs aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7780">如果未設定此原則，則會在初次執行時匯入開啟的索引標籤，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7780">If you don't configure this policy, open tabs are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7781">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7781">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7782">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入開啟的索引標籤，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [開啟的索引標籤]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7782">This means that Microsoft Edge imports open tabs on first run, but users can select or clear the **Open tabs** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7783">**注意**：此原則目前只支援來自 Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7783">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7784">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7784">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7785">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7785">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7786">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7786">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7787">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7787">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7788">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7788">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7789">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7789">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7790">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7790">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7791">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7791">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7792">GP 唯一名稱：ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7792">GP unique name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7793">GP 名稱：允許匯入開啟的索引標籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7793">GP name: Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7794">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7794">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7795">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7795">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7796">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7796">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7797">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7797">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7798">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7798">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7799">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7799">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7800">數值名稱：ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7800">Value Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7801">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7801">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7802">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7802">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7803">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7803">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7804">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7804">Preference Key Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7805">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7805">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7806">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7806">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7807">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7807">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7808">允許匯入付款資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7808">Allow importing of payment info</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7809">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7809">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7810">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7810">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7811">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7811">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7812">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將付款資訊匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7812">Allows users to import payment info from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7813">如果啟用此原則，[匯入瀏覽器資料]\*\*\*\* 對話方塊中會自動選取 [付款資訊]\*\*\*\* 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7813">If you enable this policy, the **payment info** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7814">如果停用此原則，則付款資訊不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7814">If you disable this policy, payment info isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7815">如果未設定此原則，付款資訊在初次執行時匯入，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7815">If you don't configure this policy, payment info is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7816">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7816">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7817">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入付款資訊，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [付款資訊]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7817">This means that Microsoft Edge imports payment info on first run, but users can select or clear the **payment info** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7818">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7818">**Note:** This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7819">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7819">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7820">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7820">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7821">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7821">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7822">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7822">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7823">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7823">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7824">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7824">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7825">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7825">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7826">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7826">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7827">GP 唯一名稱：ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7827">GP unique name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7828">GP 名稱：允許匯入付款資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7828">GP name: Allow importing of payment info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7829">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7829">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7830">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7830">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7831">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7831">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7832">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7832">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7833">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7833">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7834">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7834">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7835">數值名稱：ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7835">Value Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7836">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7836">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7837">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7837">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7838">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7838">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7839">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7839">Preference Key Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7840">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7840">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7841">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7841">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7842">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7842">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7843">允許匯入儲存的密碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7843">Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7844">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7844">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7845">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7845">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7846">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7846">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7847">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將儲存的密碼匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7847">Allows users to import saved passwords from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7848">如果啟用此原則，則會自動選取手動匯入儲存的密碼的選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7848">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import saved passwords is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7849">如果停用此原則，則儲存的密碼不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7849">If you disable this policy, saved passwords aren't imported on first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7850">如果未設定此原則，則會在初次執行時匯入密碼，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入它們。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7850">If you don't configure this policy, passwords are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7851">您可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7851">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7852">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入密碼，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [密碼]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7852">This means that Microsoft Edge imports passwords on first run, but users can select or clear the **passwords** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7853">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Internet Explorer (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及 macOS 上) 以及 Mozilla Firefox (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 瀏覽器的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7853">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7854">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7854">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7855">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7855">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7856">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7856">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7857">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7857">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7858">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7858">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7859">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7859">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7860">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7860">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7861">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7861">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7862">GP 唯一名稱：ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7862">GP unique name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7863">GP 名稱：允許匯入儲存的密碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7863">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7864">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7864">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7865">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7865">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7866">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7866">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7867">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7867">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7868">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7868">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7869">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7869">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7870">數值名稱：ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7870">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7871">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7871">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7872">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7872">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7873">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7873">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7874">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7874">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7875">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7875">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7876">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7876">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7877">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7877">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7878">允許匯入搜尋引擎設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7878">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7879">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7879">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7880">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7880">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7881">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7881">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7882">允許使用者從其他瀏覽器將搜尋引擎設定匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7882">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7883">如果啟用此原則，則會自動選取匯入搜尋引擎設定的選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7883">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7884">如果停用此原則，則搜尋引擎設定不會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者無法手動匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7884">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7885">如果未設定此原則，搜尋引擎設定會在初次執行時匯入，且使用者可以選擇是否要在之後的瀏覽工作階段期間手動匯入此資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7885">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7886">您可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7886">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7887">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入搜尋引擎設定，但使用者可以在手動匯入期間選取或清除 [搜尋引擎]\*\*\*\* 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7887">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7888">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Internet Explorer (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7888">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7889">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7889">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7890">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7890">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7891">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7891">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7892">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7892">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7893">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7893">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7894">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7894">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7895">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7895">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7896">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7896">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7897">GP 唯一名稱：ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7897">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7898">GP 名稱：允許匯入搜尋引擎設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7898">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7899">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7899">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7900">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7900">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7901">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7901">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7902">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7902">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7903">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7903">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7904">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7904">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7905">數值名稱：ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7905">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7906">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7906">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7907">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7907">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7908">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7908">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7909">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7909">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7910">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7910">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7911">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7911">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7912">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7912">ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7913">允許匯入捷徑</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7913">Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7914">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7914">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7915">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7915">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7916">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7916">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7917">允許使用者將捷徑從其他瀏覽器匯入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7917">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7918">如果停用此原則，則捷徑不會在初次執行時匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7918">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7919">如果未設定此原則，則捷徑會在初次執行時匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7919">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7920">您也可以將此原則設定為建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7920">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7921">這表示 Microsoft Edge 會在初次執行時匯入捷徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7921">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7922">**注意**：此原則目前會管理來自 Google Chrome (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上，以及在 macOS 上) 的匯入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7922">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7923">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7923">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7924">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7924">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7925">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7925">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7926">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7926">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7927">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7927">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7928">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7928">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7929">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7929">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7930">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7930">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
