  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7931">GP 唯一名稱：ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7931">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7932">GP 名稱：允許匯入捷徑</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7932">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7933">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7933">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7934">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7934">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7935">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7935">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7936">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7936">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7937">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7937">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7938">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7938">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7939">數值名稱：ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7939">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7940">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7940">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7941">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7941">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7942">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7942">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7943">喜好設定機碼名稱：ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7943">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7944">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7944">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7945">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7945">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7946">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7946">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7947">設定 InPrivate 模式可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7947">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7948">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7948">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7949">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7949">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7950">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7950">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7951">指定使用者是否可以在 Microsoft Edge 的 InPrivate 模式中開啟頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7951">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7952">如果未設定此原則，或將其設定為 '已啟用'，則使用者可以在 InPrivate 模式中開啟頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7952">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7953">將此原則設定為 '已停用'，以防止使用者使用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7953">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7954">將此原則設定為 '已強制'，以一律使用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7954">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7955">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7955">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7956">已啟用 (0) = InPrivate 模式可用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7956">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7957">已停用 (1) = InPrivate 模式已停用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7957">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7958">已強制 (2) = InPrivate 模式已強制執行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7958">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7959">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7959">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7960">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7960">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7961">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7961">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7962">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7962">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7963">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7963">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7964">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7964">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7965">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7965">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7966">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7966">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7967">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7967">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7968">GP 唯一名稱：InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7968">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7969">GP 名稱：設定 InPrivate 模式可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7969">GP name: Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7970">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7970">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7971">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7971">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7972">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7972">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7973">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7973">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7974">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7974">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7975">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7975">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7976">數值名稱：InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7976">Value Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7977">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7977">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7978">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7978">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7979">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7979">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7980">喜好設定機碼名稱：InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7980">Preference Key Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7981">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7981">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7982">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7982">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7983">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7983">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7984">啟用不安全表單的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7984">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7985">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7985">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7986">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7986">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7987">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7987">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7988">此原則控制了嵌入瀏覽器中安全網站（HTTPS）的不安全表單（透過 HTTP 提交的表單）處置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7988">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7989">如果您啟用或未設定此原則，則系統會在提交不安全表單時，顯示全頁式警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7989">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7990">此外，當聚焦在表單欄位時，旁邊會出現警告泡泡，且這些表單的自動填滿功能將被停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7990">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-7991">如果您停用此原則，針對不安全表單的警告便不會顯示，自動填滿功能將會正常運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7991">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7992">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7992">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7993">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7993">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7994">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7994">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7995">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7995">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7996">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7996">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7997">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7997">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7998">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7998">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-7999">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-7999">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8000">GP 唯一名稱：InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8000">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8001">GP 唯一名稱：啟用不安全表單的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8001">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8002">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8002">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8003">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8003">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8004">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8004">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8005">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8005">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8006">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8006">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8007">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8007">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8008">數值名稱：InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8008">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8009">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8009">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8010">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8010">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8011">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8011">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8012">喜好設定機碼名稱： InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8012">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8013">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8013">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8014">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8014">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8015">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8015">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8016">管理 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8016">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8017">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8017">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8018">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8018">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8019">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8019">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8020">啟用 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能時，會導致背景索引標籤中的 Javascript 計時器受到積極地節流和合併，在背景化達 5 分鐘或更久的單一頁面中運行每分鐘一次 (至多)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8020">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8021">這是一個符合網站標準的功能，但可能會造成某些網站的功能中斷，因為這會造成某些動作推遲多達一分鐘的時間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8021">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8022">不過，啟用時可造成顯著的節省 CPU 和電池損耗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8022">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8023">如需詳細資訊，請參閱https://bit.ly/30b1XR4。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8023">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8024">如果啟用此原則，系統將會強制啟用此功能，而且使用者將無法覆寫這個設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8024">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8025">如果停用此原則，系統將會強制停用此功能，而且使用者將無法覆寫這個設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8025">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8026">若您未設定此原則，此功能將由其本身的內部邏輯所管理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8026">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8027">使用者可以手動設置此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8027">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8028">請注意，此原則會套用在每個轉譯過程，當轉譯過程啟動時，系統會強制執行此原則的最新值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8028">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8029">若要確保所有已載入的索引標籤都能收到一致的原則設定，則需完全重新開機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8029">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8030">使用此原則的不同值執行程式會造成危害。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8030">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8031">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8031">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8032">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8032">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8033">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8033">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8034">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8034">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8035">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8035">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8036">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8036">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8037">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8037">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8038">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8038">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8039">GP 唯一名稱：IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8039">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8040">GP 名稱：管理 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8040">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8041">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8041">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8042">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8042">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8043">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8043">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8044">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8044">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8045">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8045">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8046">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8046">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8047">數值名稱：IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8047">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8048">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8048">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8049">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8049">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8050">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8051">喜好設定機碼名稱：IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8051">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8052">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8053">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8054">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8054">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8055">針對 Internet Explorer 模式設定增強的當機偵測</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8055">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8056">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8056">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8057">Windows 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8057">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8058">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8058">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8059">「加強當機偵測」是更精細的方法，可在 Internet Explorer 模式中偵測到獨立 Internet Explorer 所使用的網頁。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8059">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8060">當檢測到網頁當機時，瀏覽器將會套用安全防護，以避免其餘的瀏覽器出現當機情形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8060">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8061">這項設定可讓您設定使用增強的 [當機偵測]，以防您遇到與任何網站都不相容的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8061">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8062">只有在當您在 Internet Explorer 模式 (而不是獨立 Internet Explorer) 中看到 (網站) 沒有回應等通知時，建議您停用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8062">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8063">此設定會與下列內容一併執行：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 設定為 'IEMode'，並設定 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 原則，其中該清單至少擁有一個項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8063">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8064">如果將此原則設為 '已啟用' 或未設定，則在 Internet Explorer 模式中執行的網站將會使用增強的當機偵測。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8064">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8065">如果將此原則設為 '已停用'，則會停用增強的當機偵測，而使用者可使用基本的 Internet Explorer 當機偵測行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8065">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8066">若要深入了解 Internet Explorer 模式，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8066">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8067">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8067">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8068">已停用 (0) = 已停用增強的當機偵測</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8068">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8069">已啟用 (1) = 啟用增強的當機偵測</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8069">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8070">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8070">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8071">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8071">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8072">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8072">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8073">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8073">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8074">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8074">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8075">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8075">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8076">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8076">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8077">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8077">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8078">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8078">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8079">GP 唯一名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8079">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8080">GP 名稱：針對 Internet Explorer 模式設定增強的當機偵測</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8080">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8081">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8081">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8082">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8082">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8083">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8083">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8084">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8084">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8085">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8085">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8086">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8086">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8087">數值名稱： InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8087">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8088">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8088">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8089">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8089">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8091">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8091">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8092">設定 Internet Explorer 整合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8092">Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8093">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8093">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8094">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8094">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8095">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8095">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8096">如需有關設定 Internet Explorer 模式的最佳體驗的指導方針，請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8096">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8097">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8097">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8098">None (0) = 無</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8098">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8099">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8099">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8100">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8100">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8101">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8101">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8102">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8102">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8103">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8103">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8104">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8104">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8105">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8105">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8106">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8106">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8107">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8107">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8108">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8108">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8109">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8109">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8110">GP 唯一名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8110">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8111">GP 名稱：設定 Internet Explorer 整合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8111">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8112">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8112">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8113">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8113">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8114">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8114">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8115">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8115">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8116">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8116">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8117">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8117">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8118">數值名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8118">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8119">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8119">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8120">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8120">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```
