  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8122">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8122">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8123">設定 Enterprise Mode Site List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8123">Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8124">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8124">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8125">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8125">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8126">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8126">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8127">如需有關設定 Internet Explorer 模式的最佳體驗的指導方針，請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8127">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8128">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8128">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8129">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8129">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8130">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8130">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8131">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8131">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8132">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8132">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8133">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8133">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8134">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8134">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8135">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8135">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8136">GP 唯一名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8136">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8137">GP 名稱：設定 Enterprise Mode Site List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8137">GP name: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8138">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8138">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8139">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8139">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8140">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8140">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8141">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8141">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8142">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8142">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8143">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8143">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8144">數值名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8144">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8145">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8145">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8146">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8146">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://internal.contoso.com/sitelist.xml"
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8147">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8147">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8148">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8148">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8149">指定從 Internet Explorer 模式頁面啟動時，「頁面內」導覽至未設定網站的方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8149">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8150">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8150">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8151">Windows 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8151">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8152">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8152">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8153">「頁面內」導覽是從連結、指令碼或目前頁面上的表單開始。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8153">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8154">也可以是先前「頁面內」導覽嘗試的伺服器端重新導向。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8154">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8155">相反地，使用者可以使用瀏覽器控制項以多種方式啟動不在「頁面內」且獨立於目前頁面的導覽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8155">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8156">例如透過網址列、返回按鈕或我的最愛連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8156">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8157">此設定可讓您指定是否要從 Internet Explorer 模式下載入的頁面導覽至未設定網站 (未於 Enterprise Mode Site List 中設定) 切換回 Microsoft Edge 或停留在 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8157">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8158">此設定會與下列內容一併執行：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 設定為 'IEMode'，並設定 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 原則，其中該清單至少擁有一個項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8158">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8159">如果停用或未設定此原則，則只有設定在 Internet Explorer 模式中開啟的網站，才會在該模式中開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8159">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8160">所有未設定在 Internet Explorer 模式中開啟的網站，將會重新導向回到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8160">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8161">如果將此原則設定為 ‘預設’，只有設定為在 Internet Explorer 模式中開啟的網站，才會在該模式中開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8161">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8162">所有未設定在 Internet Explorer 模式中開啟的網站，將會重新導向回到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8162">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8163">如果將此原則設定為 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly'，將會獲得預設體驗，但對未設定網站的所有自動導覽 (例如 302 重新導向) 都會保留在 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8163">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8164">如果將此原則設定為 'AllInPageNavigations'，則於 IE 模式載入到未設定網站之頁面的所有導覽，都會保留在 Internet Explorer 模式 (最不建議)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8164">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8165">若要深入了解 Internet Explorer 模式，請參閱 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8165">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8166">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8166">Policy options mapping:</span></span>
  

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8167">預設值 (0) = 預設值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8167">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8168">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = 只保留 Internet Explorer 模式中的自動導覽</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8168">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8169">AllInPageNavigations (2) = 保留所有 Internet Explorer 模式中的頁面內導覽</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8169">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8170">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8170">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8171">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8171">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8172">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8172">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8173">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8173">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8174">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8174">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8175">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8175">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8176">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8176">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8177">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8177">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8178">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8178">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8179">GP 唯一名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8179">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8180">GP 名稱：指定從 Internet Explorer 模式頁面啟動時，「頁面內」導覽至未設定網站的方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8180">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8181">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8181">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8182">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8182">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8183">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8183">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8184">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8184">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8185">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8185">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8186">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8186">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8187">數值名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8187">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8188">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8188">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8189">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8189">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8190">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8190">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8191">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8191">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8192">允許 Internet Explorer 模式測試</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8192">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8193">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8193">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8194">Windows 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8194">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8195">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8195">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8196">此原則是用來取代 ie-mode-test 標誌原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8196">This policy is a replacement for the ie-mode-test flag policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8197">可讓使用者從 UI 功能表選項開啟 IE 模式索引標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8197">It lets users open an IE mode tab from the UI menu option.</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8198">此設定可與下列內容結合使用：將[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 設為 'IEMode' 及 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 原則，其中的清單至少有一個項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8198">This setting works in conjunction with:   [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and   [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8199">如果您啟用此項原則，使用者可以從 UI 選項開啟 IE 模式索引標籤，並將目前的網站導向至 IE 模式網站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8199">If you enable this policy, users can open IE mode tab from the UI option and navigate current site to an IE mode site.</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8200">如果您停用此項原則，使用者就無法在功能表中直接看到 UI 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8200">If you disable this policy, users can't see the UI option in the menu directly.</span></span> 
  
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8201">如果您未設定此原則，您可以手動設定為 ie-mode-test 標誌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8201">If you don't configure this policy, you can set up the ie-mode-test flag manually.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8202">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8202">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8203">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8203">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8204">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8204">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8205">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8205">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8206">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8206">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8207">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8207">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8208">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8208">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8209">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8209">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8210">GP 唯一名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8210">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8211">GP 名稱：允許 Internet Explorer 模式測試</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8211">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8212">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8212">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8213">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8213">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8214">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8214">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8215">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8215">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8216">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8216">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8217">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8217">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8218">數值名稱：InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8218">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8219">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8219">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8220">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8220">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8221">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8221">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8222">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8222">IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8223">為特定來源啟用網站隔離</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8223">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8224">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8224">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8225">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8225">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8226">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8226">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8227">指定要在隔離中於其自己的處理程序中執行的來源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8227">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8228">此原則也會隔離由子網域所指定的來源，例如，指定 https://contoso.com/ 會導致 https://foo.contoso.com/ 隨著 https://contoso.com/ 網站中的一部分隔離。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8228">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8229">如果已啟用原則，以逗號分隔清單中的每個指定來源，將會在自己的處理程序中執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8229">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8230">如果停用此原則，則會同時停用 'IsolateOrigins' 和 'SitePerProcess' 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8230">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8231">使用者仍然可以透過命令列旗標手動啟用 'IsolateOrigins' 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8231">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8232">如果未設定此原則，則使用者可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8232">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8233">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8233">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8234">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8234">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8235">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8235">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8236">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8236">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8237">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8237">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8238">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8238">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8239">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8239">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8240">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8240">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8241">GP 唯一名稱：IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8241">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8242">GP 名稱：為特定來源啟用網站隔離</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8242">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8243">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8243">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8244">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8244">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8245">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8245">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8246">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8246">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8247">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8247">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8248">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8248">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8249">數值名稱：IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8249">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8250">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8250">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8251">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8251">Example value:</span></span>
```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8252">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8252">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8253">喜好設定機碼名稱：IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8253">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8254">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8254">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8255">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8255">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8256">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8256">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8257">允許來自本地提供者的建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8257">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8258">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8258">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8259">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8259">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8260">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8260">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8261">在 Microsoft Edge 的網址列和自動建議清單中，允許來自裝置上建議提供者的建議 (本機提供者)，例如我的最愛和瀏覽歷程記錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8261">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8262">如果啟用此原則，則會使用來自本機提供者的建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8262">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8263">如果停用此原則，則永遠不會使用來自本機提供者的建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8263">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8264">將不會顯示本機歷程記錄和本機我的最愛建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8264">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8265">如果未設定此原則，則會允許來自本機提供者的建議，但使用者可以使用 [設定] 切換來變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8265">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8266">請注意，如果已套用停用此功能的原則，則部分功能可能無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8266">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8267">例如，如果您啟用 [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) 原則，瀏覽歷程記錄建議將無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8267">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8268">此原則需要將瀏覽器重新啟動，才能完成套用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8268">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8269">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8269">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8270">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8270">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8271">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8271">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8272">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8272">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8273">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8273">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8274">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8274">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8275">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8275">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8276">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8276">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8277">GP 唯一名稱：LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8277">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8278">GP 名稱：允許來自本地提供者的建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8278">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8279">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8279">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8280">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8280">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8281">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8281">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8282">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8282">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8283">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8283">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8284">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8284">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8285">數值名稱：LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8285">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8286">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8286">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8287">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8287">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8288">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8288">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8289">喜好設定機碼名稱：LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8289">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8290">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8290">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8291">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8291">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8292">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8292">ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8293">設定我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8293">Configure favorites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8294">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8294">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8295">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8295">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8296">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8296">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8297">設定受管理的我的最愛清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8297">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8298">該原則會建立我的最愛清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8298">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8299">每個我的最愛都包含 "name" 和 "url"，這些機碼會保留我的最愛名稱及其目標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8299">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8300">您可以定義一個不帶 "url" 機碼但帶有一個額外的 "children" 機碼的我的最愛，藉此設定子資料夾，其中包含上面定義的我的最愛清單 (其中部分也可能是資料夾)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8300">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8301">Microsoft Edge 會修訂不完整的 URL，就如同透過網址列提交一般，例如 "microsoft.com" 會變成 "https://microsoft.com/"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8301">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8302">這些我的最愛會放在不能由使用者修改的資料夾中 (但使用者可以選擇將它從我的最愛列隱藏)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8302">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8303">依預設，資料夾名稱是「受管理的我的最愛」，但您可以將包含機碼 "toplevel_name" 並使用所需的資料夾名稱做為值的字典新增至我的最愛清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8303">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8304">受管理我的最愛不會同步到使用者帳戶，且不能由擴充功能修改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8304">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8305">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8305">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8306">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8306">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8307">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8307">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8308">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8308">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8309">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8309">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8310">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8310">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8311">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8311">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8312">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8312">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8313">GP 唯一名稱：ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8313">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8314">GP 名稱：設定我的最愛</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8314">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8315">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8315">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8316">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8316">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8317">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8317">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8318">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8318">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8319">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8319">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8320">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8320">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8321">數值名稱：ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8321">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8322">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8322">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8323">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8323">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8324">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8324">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8325">喜好設定機碼名稱：ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8325">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8326">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8326">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8327">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8327">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8328">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8328">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8329">管理搜尋引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8329">Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8330">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8330">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8331">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8331">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8332">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8332">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8333">讓您設定最多 10 個搜尋引擎的清單，其中一個必須標示為預設搜尋引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8333">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8334">您不需要指定編碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8334">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8335">從 Microsoft Edge 80 開始，suggest_url 和 image_search_url 參數都是選用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8335">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8336">選用參數 image_search_post_params (包含逗號分隔名稱/值對) 從 Microsoft Edge 80 開始提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8336">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8337">從 Microsoft Edge 83 開始，您可以使用 allow_search_engine_discovery optional 選用參數來啟用搜尋引擎探索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8337">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8338">此參數必須是清單中的第一個項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8338">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8339">如果未指定 allow_search_engine_discovery，即預設會停用搜尋引擎探索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8339">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8340">從 Microsoft Edge 84 開始，您可以將此原則設定為建議的原則，以允許搜尋提供者探索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8340">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8341">您不需要新增 allow_search_engine_discovery 選用參數。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8341">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8342">如果啟用此原則，則使用者無法新增、移除或變更清單中的任何搜尋引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8342">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8343">使用者可以將其預設搜尋引擎設定為清單中的任何搜尋引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8343">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8344">如果停用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以視需要修改搜尋引擎清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8344">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8345">如果已設定 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 原則，則會忽略此原則 (ManagedSearchEngines)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8345">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8346">使用者必須將其瀏覽器重新啟動，才能完成套用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8346">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8347">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8347">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8348">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8348">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8349">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8349">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8350">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8350">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8351">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8351">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8352">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8352">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8353">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8353">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8354">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8354">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8355">GP 唯一名稱：ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8355">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8356">GP 名稱：管理搜尋引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8356">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8357">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8357">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8358">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8358">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8359">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8359">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8360">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8360">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8361">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8361">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8362">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8362">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8363">數值名稱：ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8363">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8364">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8364">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8365">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8365">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload",

    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {

    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload",

  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8369">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8369">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8370">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8370">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8371">同時連線到 Proxy 伺服器的最大數目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8371">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8372">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8372">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8373">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8373">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8374">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8374">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8375">指定對 Proxy 伺服器同時連線的上限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8375">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8376">某些 Proxy 伺服器無法處理每個用戶端的大量同時連線，您可以將此原則設定為較低的值來解決此情況。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8376">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8377">此原則的值應低於 100，並高於 6。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8377">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8378">預設值為 32。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8378">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8379">某些 Web 應用程式已知會因為當機的 GET 耗用多個連線。將連線上限降低至低於 32 可能會在開啟許多這類 Web 應用程式時導致瀏覽器網路當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8379">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8380">如果未設定此原則，則會使用預設值 (32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8380">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8381">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8381">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8382">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8382">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8383">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8383">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8384">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8384">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8385">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8385">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8386">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8386">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8387">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8387">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8388">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8388">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8389">GP 唯一名稱：MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8389">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8390">GP 名稱：同時連線到 Proxy 伺服器的最大數目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8390">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8391">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8391">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8392">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8392">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8393">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8393">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8394">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8394">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8395">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8395">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8396">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8396">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8397">數值名稱：MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8397">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8398">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8398">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8399">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8399">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000020
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8400">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8400">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8401">喜好設定機碼名稱：MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8401">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8402">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8402">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8403">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8403">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8404">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8404">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8405">允許 Google Cast 連線至所有 IP 位址上的投射裝置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8405">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8406">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8406">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8407">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8407">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8408">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8408">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8409">啟用此原則以讓 Google Cast 連線至所有 IP 位址上的投射裝置，不只是 RFC1918/RFC4193 私人位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8409">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8410">停用此原則以限制 Google Cast 連線至 RFC1918/RFC4193 私人位址上的投射裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8410">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8411">如果未設定此原則，除非啟用 CastAllowAllIPs 功能，否則 Google Cast 僅會連線至 RFC1918/RFC4193 私人位址上的投射裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8411">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8412">如果 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 原則為已停用，則此原則沒有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8412">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8413">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8413">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8414">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8414">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8415">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8415">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8416">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8416">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8417">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8417">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8418">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8418">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8419">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8419">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8420">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8420">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8421">GP 唯一名稱：MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8421">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8422">GP 名稱：允許 Google Cast 連線至所有 IP 位址上的投射裝置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8422">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8423">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8423">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8424">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8424">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8425">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8425">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8426">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8426">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8427">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8427">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8428">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8428">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8429">數值名稱：MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8429">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8430">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8430">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8431">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8431">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8432">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8432">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8433">喜好設定機碼名稱：MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8433">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8434">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8434">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8435">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8435">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8436">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8436">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8437">啟用使用方式和當機相關的資料報告 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8437">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-8438">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8438">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8439">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8439">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
   
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8440">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8440">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8441">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8441">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8442">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8442">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8443">此原則已被取代。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8443">This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8444">目前支援，但將在 Microsoft Edge 版本 89 中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8444">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in Microsoft Edge 89.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8445">這個原則會由新原則取代：Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS 的 [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8445">This policy is replaced by the new policy:  [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8446">這項原則會由 Win 10 上的允許遙測取代 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8446">This policy is replaced by Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8447">此原則可將Microsoft Edge 使用方式和當機相關資料的報告傳送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8447">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8448">啟用此原則，將使用方式和當機相關資料的報告傳送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8448">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8449">停用此原則，就不會將此資料傳送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8449">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8450">在這兩種情況下，使用者都無法變更或覆寫設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8450">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8451">在 Windows 10 上，如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將預設為使用 Windows 診斷資料設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8451">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8452">如果啟用此原則，則僅當 Windows 診斷資料設定設為「增強」或「完整」時，Microsoft Edge 才會傳送使用狀況資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8452">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8453">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將不會傳送使用狀況資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8453">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8454">根據 Windows 診斷資料設定傳送當機相關的資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8454">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8455">在這裡深入了解 Windows 診斷資料設定：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8455">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8456">在 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS 上，此原則會控制使用方式和當機相關資料的傳送。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8456">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8457">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將預設為使用者的喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8457">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8458">若要啟用此原則，[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 必須設定為 [已啟用]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8458">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8459">如果 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 或 [ SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 未設定或已停用，將不會將此資料傳送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8459">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>
           

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8460">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上或者透過 MDM 管理或透過 MCX 加入網域的 macOS 執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8460">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8461">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8461">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8462">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8462">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8463">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8463">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8464">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8464">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8465">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8465">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8466">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8466">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8467">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8467">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8468">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8468">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8469">GP 唯一名稱：MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8469">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8470">GP 名稱：啟用使用方式和當機相關的資料報告 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8470">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8471">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8471">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8472">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8472">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8473">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8473">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8474">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8474">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8475">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8475">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8476">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8476">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8477">數值名稱：MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8477">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8478">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8478">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8479">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8479">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8480">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8480">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8481">喜好設定機碼名稱：MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8481">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8482">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8482">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8483">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8483">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8484">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8484">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8485">啟用原生視窗遮蔽</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8485">Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8486">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8486">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8487">Windows 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8487">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8488">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8488">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8489">在 Microsoft Edge 中啟用原生視窗遮蔽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8489">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8490">如果啟用此設定，為了降低 CPU 和耗電量，Microsoft Edge 將偵測視窗何時被其他視窗覆蓋，並將暫停工作繪製像素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8490">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8491">如果停用此設定，則 Microsoft Edge 無法偵測某個視窗是否被其他視窗遮蓋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8491">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8492">如果將此原則保留為未設定，則會啟用視窗隱藏偵測。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8492">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8493">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8493">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8494">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8494">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8495">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8495">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8496">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8496">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8497">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8497">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8498">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8498">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8499">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8499">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8500">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8500">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8501">GP 唯一名稱：NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8501">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8502">GP 名稱：啟用原生視窗遮蔽</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8502">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8503">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8503">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8504">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8504">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8505">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8505">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8506">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8506">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8507">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8507">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8508">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8508">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8509">數值名稱：NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8509">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8510">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8510">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8511">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8511">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8512">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8512">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8513">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8513">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8514">針對企業模式網站清單，設定索引標籤瀏覽逾時延遲</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8514">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8515">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8515">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8516">Windows 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8516">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8517">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8517">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8518">可讓您設定適於 Microsoft Edge 索引標籤等候瀏覽的逾時設定 (以秒為單位) ，直到瀏覽器完成下載初始的 [企業模式網站清單] 為止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8518">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8519">此設定可與下列內容結合使用：將[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 設為 'IEMode' 及 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 原則，其中至少擁有清單中的一個項目，並將 [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) 設為「All eligible navigations」(1)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8519">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8520">若要下載 [企業模式網站清單]，索引標籤的等待時間不會長於此逾時設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8520">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8521">如果瀏覽器在逾時設定到期時並未完成下載 [企業模式網站清單]，Microsoft Edge 索引標籤仍會繼續瀏覽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8521">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8522">逾時設定的數值應少於 20 秒且多於 1 秒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8522">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8523">若將此原則中的逾時設置設成大於 2 秒的預設值，系統會在 2 秒之後向使用者顯示資訊列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8523">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8524">資訊列包含可讓使用者在等候 [企業模式網站清單] 下載完成時停止等候的按鈕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8524">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8525">如果未設定此原則，系統將會使用逾時設置的預設值 (2 秒)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8525">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8526">此預設值可會在未來進行變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8526">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8527">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8527">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8528">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8528">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
