  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8529">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8529">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8530">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8530">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8531">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8531">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8532">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8532">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8533">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8533">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8534">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8534">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8535">GP 唯一名稱：NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8535">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8536">GP 名稱：針對 [企業模式網站清單]，設定索引標籤瀏覽逾時延遲</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8536">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8537">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8537">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8538">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8538">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8539">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8539">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8540">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8540">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8541">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8541">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8542">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8542">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8543">數值名稱：NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8543">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8544">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8544">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8545">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8545">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x0000000a
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8546">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8546">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8547">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8547">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8548">啟用網路預測</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8548">Enable network prediction</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8549">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8549">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8550">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8550">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8551">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8551">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8552">啟用網路預測，並防止使用者變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8552">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8553">這會控制 DNS 預先擷取、TCP 和 SSL 預先連線，以及網頁的預先轉譯。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8553">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8554">如果未設定此原則，則會啟用網路預測，但使用者可以變更它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8554">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8555">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8555">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8556">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = 預測任何網路連線上的網路動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8556">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8557">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = 不支援，如果使用這個值，系統會將其視為 '預測任何網路連線上的網路動作' (0) 之設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8557">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8558">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = 不預測任何網路連線上的網路動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8558">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8559">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8559">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8560">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8560">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8561">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8562">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8562">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8563">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8564">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8564">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8565">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8565">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8566">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8566">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8567">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8568">GP 唯一名稱：NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8568">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8569">GP 名稱：啟用網路預測</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8569">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8570">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8571">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8571">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8572">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8573">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8574">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8575">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8575">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8576">數值名稱：NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8576">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8577">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8577">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8578">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8578">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8579">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8580">喜好設定機碼名稱：NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8580">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8581">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8582">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8583">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8583">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8584">設定使用者是否一律擁有其公司或學校帳戶自動登入的預設設定檔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8584">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8585">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8585">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8586">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8586">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8587">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8587">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8588">此原則會決定使用者是否可以移除使用使用者的公司或學校帳戶自動登入的 Microsoft Edge 設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8588">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8589">如果啟用此原則，則會使用使用者的公司或學校帳戶在 Windows 上建立非可移除的設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8589">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8590">無法將此設定檔登出或移除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8590">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8591">如果停用或未設定此原則，則在 Windows 上使用使用者的公司或學校帳戶自動登入的設定檔可由使用者登出或移除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8591">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8592">如果想要設定瀏覽器登入，請使用 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8592">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8593">此原則僅可在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 網域的 Windows 執行個體上、已註冊裝置管理的 Windows 10 專業版或企業版執行個體上取得。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8593">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8594">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8594">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8595">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8595">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8596">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8596">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8597">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8597">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8598">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8598">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8599">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8599">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8600">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8600">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8601">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8601">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8602">GP 唯一名稱：NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8602">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8603">GP 名稱：設定使用者是否一律擁有其公司或學校帳戶自動登入的預設設定檔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8603">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8604">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8604">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8605">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8605">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8606">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8606">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8607">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8607">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8608">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8608">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8609">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8609">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8610">數值名稱：NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8610">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8611">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8611">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8612">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8612">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  


 
   
 

   
  

   

   

  
 
  
 

  
   

   
  
   
   
  
   
 
   
   
   
  
 
 
   
 
   


  
  
   
 
 
   
  

 
  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8613">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8613">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8614">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8614">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8615">控制不安全來源中安全性限制套用的地方</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8615">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8616">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8616">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8617">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8617">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8618">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8618">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8619">指定不安全來源的安全性限制不適用的來源 (URL) 的清單或主機名稱模式 (例如 "\*.contoso.com")。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8619">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8620">此原則可讓您為無法部署 TLS 的舊版應用程式指定允許的來源，或為內部網頁開發設定分段伺服器，使得開發人員不需在分段伺服器上部署 TLS，即可測試需要安全內容的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8620">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8621">此原則也可以防止來源在 omnibox 中被標示為「不安全」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8621">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8622">在此原則中設定 URL 清單，與將命令列旗標 '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' 設定為相同 URL 以逗號分隔的清單具有相同效果。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8622">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8623">如果啟用此原則，則會覆寫命令列旗標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8623">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8624">如需有關安全內容的詳細資訊，請參閱 https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8624">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8625">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8625">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8626">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8626">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8627">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8627">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8628">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8628">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8629">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8629">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8630">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8630">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8631">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8631">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8632">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8632">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8633">GP 唯一名稱：OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8633">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8634">GP 名稱：控制不安全來源中安全性限制套用的地方</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8634">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8635">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8635">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8636">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8636">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8637">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8637">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8638">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8638">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8639">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8639">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8640">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8640">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8641">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8641">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8642">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8642">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8643">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8643">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8644">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8644">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8645">喜好設定機碼名稱：OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8645">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8646">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8646">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8647">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8647">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8648">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8648">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8649">允許網站查詢可用的付款方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8649">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8650">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8650">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8651">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8651">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8652">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8652">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8653">允許您設定網站是否可以檢查使用者是否已儲存付款條件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8653">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8654">如果停用此原則，使用 PaymentRequest.canMakePayment 或 PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API 的網站會收到通知，告知沒有可用的付款方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8654">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8655">如果啟用此原則或未設定此原則，則網站可以檢查使用者是否已儲存付款條件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8655">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8656">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8656">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8657">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8657">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8658">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8658">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8659">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8659">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8660">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8660">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8661">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8661">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8662">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8662">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8663">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8663">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8664">GP 唯一名稱：PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8664">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8665">GP 名稱：允許網站查詢可用的付款方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8665">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8666">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8666">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8667">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8667">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8668">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8668">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8669">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8669">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8670">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8670">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8671">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8671">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8672">數值名稱：PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8672">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8673">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8673">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8674">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8674">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8675">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8675">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8676">喜好設定機碼名稱：PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8676">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8677">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8677">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8678">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8678">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8679">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8679">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8680">透過傳送瀏覽歷程記錄至 Microsoft，允許廣告、搜尋及新聞個人化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8680">Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8681">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8681">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8682">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8682">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8683">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8683">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8684">此原則可防止 Microsoft 收集使用者的 Microsoft Edge 瀏覽歷程記錄，以用於個人化廣告、搜尋、新聞及其他 Microsoft 服務。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8684">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8685">只有擁有 Microsoft 帳戶的使用者才能使用此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8685">This setting is only available for users with a Microsoft account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8686">子帳戶或企業帳戶無法使用此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8686">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8687">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法變更或覆寫設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8687">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8688">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將預設為使用者的喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8688">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8689">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8689">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8690">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8690">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8691">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8691">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8692">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8692">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8693">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8693">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8694">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8694">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8695">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8695">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8696">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8696">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8697">GP 唯一名稱：PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8697">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8698">GP 名稱：透過傳送瀏覽歷程記錄至 Microsoft，允許廣告、搜尋及新聞個人化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8698">GP name: Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8699">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8699">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8700">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8700">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8701">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8701">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8702">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8702">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8703">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8703">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8704">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8704">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8705">數值名稱：PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8705">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8706">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8706">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8707">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8707">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8708">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8708">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8709">喜好設定機碼名稱：PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8709">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8710">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8710">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8711">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8711">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8712">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8712">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8713">允許 [釘選到工作列精靈]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8713">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8714">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8714">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8715">Windows 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8715">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8716">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8716">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8717">Microsoft Edge 使用 [釘選到工作列] 精靈來協助使用者將建議的網站釘選到工作列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8717">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8718">[釘選到工作列] 精靈功能預設會啟用，且可供使用者透過 [設定及其他] 功能表存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8718">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8719">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以從 [設定] 和 [更多] 功能表中呼叫 [釘選到工作列] 精靈。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8719">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8720">也可以透過通訊協定啟動來呼叫精靈。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8720">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8721">如果停用此原則，則會停用功能表中的 [釘選到工作列] 精靈，且無法再透過通訊協定啟動來呼叫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8721">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8722">沒有可用來啟用或停用 [釘選到工作列] 精靈的使用者設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8722">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8723">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8723">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8724">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8724">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8725">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8725">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8726">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8726">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8727">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8727">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8728">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8728">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8729">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8729">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8730">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8730">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8731">GP 唯一名稱：PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8731">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8732">GP 名稱：允許 [釘選到工作列精靈]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8732">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8733">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8733">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8734">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8734">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8735">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8735">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8736">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8736">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8737">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8737">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8738">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8738">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8739">數值名稱：PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8739">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8740">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8740">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8741">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8741">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8742">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8742">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8743">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8743">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8744">啟用主動式驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8744">Enable Proactive Authentication</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8745">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8745">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8746">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8746">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8747">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8747">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8748">讓您設定是否要開啟主動式驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8748">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8749">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會嘗試使用 Microsoft 服務主動驗證登入使用者的身分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8749">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to proactively authenticate the signed-in user with Microsoft services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8750">Microsoft Edge 會定期檢查線上服務，以取得包含控管如何執行此動作之設定的更新資訊清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8750">At regular intervals, Microsoft Edge checks with an online service for an updated manifest that contains the configuration that governs how to do this.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8751">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 不會嘗試使用 Microsoft 服務主動驗證登入使用者的身分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8751">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't try to proactively authenticate the signed-in user with Microsoft services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8752">Microsoft Edge 不再會檢查線上服務是否有包含用於執行此動作之設定的更新資訊清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8752">Microsoft Edge no longer checks with an online service for an updated manifest that contains the configuration for doing this.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8753">如果未設定此原則，則會開啟主動式驗證。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8753">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8754">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8754">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8755">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8755">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8756">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8756">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8757">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8757">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8758">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8758">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8759">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8759">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8760">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8760">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8761">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8761">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8762">GP 唯一名稱：ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8762">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8763">GP 名稱：啟用主動式驗證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8763">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8764">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8764">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8765">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8765">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8766">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8766">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8767">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8767">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8768">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8768">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8769">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8769">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8770">數值名稱：ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8770">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8771">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8771">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8772">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8772">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8773">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8773">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8774">喜好設定機碼名稱：ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8774">Preference Key Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8775">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8775">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8776">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8776">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8777">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8777">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8778">啟用全分頁促銷內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8778">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8779">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8779">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8780">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8780">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8781">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8781">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8782">控制全分頁促銷或教育內容的呈現。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8782">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8783">此設定可控制能夠協助使用者登入 Microsoft Edge、選擇其預設瀏覽器，或了解產品功能的歡迎頁面的呈現方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8783">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8784">如果啟用此原則 (設定為 true) 或未設定，則 Microsoft Edge 可以向使用者顯示完整的索引標籤內容，以提供產品資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8784">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8785">如果您停用此原則 (設為 false)，則 Microsoft Edge 無法向使用者顯示完整的索引標籤內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8785">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8786">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8786">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8787">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8787">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8788">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8788">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8789">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8789">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8790">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8790">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8791">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8791">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8792">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8792">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8793">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8793">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8794">GP 唯一名稱：PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8794">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8795">GP 名稱：啟用全分頁促銷內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8795">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8796">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8796">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8797">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8797">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8798">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8798">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8799">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8799">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8800">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8800">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8801">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8801">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8802">數值名稱：PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8802">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8803">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8803">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8804">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8804">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8805">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8805">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8806">喜好設定機碼名稱：PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8806">Preference Key Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8807">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8807">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8808">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8808">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8809">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8809">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8810">詢問下載檔案的儲存位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8810">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8811">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8811">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8812">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8812">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8813">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8813">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8814">設定是否要在下載之前詢問儲存檔案的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8814">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8815">如果啟用此原則，則會在下載之前詢問使用者儲存每個檔案的位置；如果未設定，則檔案會自動儲存到預設位置，而不會詢問使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8815">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8816">如果未設定此原則，則使用者將可以變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8816">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8817">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8817">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8818">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8818">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8819">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8819">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8820">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8820">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8821">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8821">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8822">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8822">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8823">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8823">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8824">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8824">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8825">GP 唯一名稱：PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8825">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8826">GP 名稱：詢問下載檔案的儲存位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8826">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8827">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8827">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8828">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8828">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8829">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8829">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8830">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8830">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8831">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8831">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8832">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8832">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8833">數值名稱：PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8833">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8834">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8834">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8835">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8835">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8836">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8836">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8837">喜好設定機碼名稱：PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8837">Preference Key Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8838">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8838">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8839">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8839">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8840">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8840">QuicAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8841">允許 QUIC 通訊協定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8841">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8842">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8842">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8843">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8843">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8844">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8844">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8845">允許在 Microsoft Edge 中使用 QUIC 通訊協定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8845">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8846">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則會允許 QUIC 通訊協定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8846">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8847">如果停用此原則，則會封鎖 QUIC 通訊協定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8847">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8848">QUIC 是傳輸層網路通訊協定，可改善目前使用 TCP 的 Web 應用程式效能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8848">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8849">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8849">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8850">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8850">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8851">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8851">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8852">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8852">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8853">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8853">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8854">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8854">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8855">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8855">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8856">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8856">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8857">GP 唯一名稱：QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8857">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8858">GP 名稱：允許 QUIC 通訊協定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8858">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8859">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8859">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8860">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8860">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8861">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8861">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8862">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8862">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8863">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8863">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8864">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8864">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8865">數值名稱：QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8865">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8866">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8866">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8867">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8867">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8868">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8868">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8869">喜好設定機碼名稱：QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8869">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8870">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8870">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8871">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8871">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8872">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8872">RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8873">通知使用者建議或需要重新啟動瀏覽器，以套用擱置中的更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8873">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8874">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8874">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8875">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8875">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8876">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8876">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8877">通知使用者他們必須將 Microsoft Edge 重新啟動，才能套用擱置中的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8877">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8878">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會在頂端功能表列的最右側加上回收圖示，提示使用者重新啟動瀏覽器以套用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8878">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8879">如果啟用此原則，並將其設定為 '建議'，則會出現重複的警告，提示使用者建議重新開機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8879">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8880">使用者可以關閉此警告，並將重新開機延遲。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8880">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8881">如果將原則設定為 '必要'，會出現重複的警告，提示使用者當通知期間過後，瀏覽器將會自動重新啟動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8881">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8882">預設期間為七天。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8882">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8883">您可以使用 [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) 原則來設定此期間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8883">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8884">使用者的工作階段會在瀏覽器重新啟動後還原。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8884">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8885">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8885">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8886">建議 (1) = 建議 - 向使用者顯示重複的提示，指出建議重新啟動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8886">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8887">必要 (2) = 必要 - 向使用者顯示重複的提示，指出必須重新啟動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8887">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8888">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8888">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8889">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8889">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8890">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8890">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8891">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8891">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8892">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8892">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8893">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8893">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8894">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8894">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8895">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8895">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8896">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8896">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8897">GP 唯一名稱：RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8897">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8898">GP 名稱：通知使用者建議或需要重新啟動瀏覽器，以套用擱置中的更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8898">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8899">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8899">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8900">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8900">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8901">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8901">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8902">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8902">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8903">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8903">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8904">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8904">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8905">數值名稱：RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8905">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8906">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8906">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8907">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8907">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8908">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8908">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8909">喜好設定機碼名稱：RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8909">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8910">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8910">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8911">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8911">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8912">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8912">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8913">設定更新通知的時間週期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8913">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8914">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8914">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8915">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8915">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8916">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8916">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8917">讓您設定時間期間 (以毫秒為單位)，經過此時間後便通知使用者必須重新啟動 Microsoft Edge，才能套用擱置中的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8917">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8918">在此時間期間內，使用者將會重複收到需要更新的通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8918">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8919">在 Microsoft Edge 中，經過通知期間的三分之一後，應用程式功能表會變更，以指出需要重新啟動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8919">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8920">此通知會在經過通知期間的三分之二後變更色彩，並在經過整個通知期間後再次變更色彩。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8920">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8921">由 [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) 原則啟用的額外通知會遵循此相同的排程。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8921">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8922">如果未設定，則會使用預設的 604800000 毫秒 (一週)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8922">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8923">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8923">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8924">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8924">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8925">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8925">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8926">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8926">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8927">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8927">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8928">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8928">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8929">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8929">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8930">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8930">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8931">GP 唯一名稱：RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8931">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8932">GP 名稱：設定更新通知的時間週期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8932">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8933">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8933">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8934">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8934">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8935">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8935">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8936">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8936">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8937">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8937">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8938">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8938">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8939">數值名稱：RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8939">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8940">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8940">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8941">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8941">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x240c8400
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8942">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8942">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8943">喜好設定機碼名稱：RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8943">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8944">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8944">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8945">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8945">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8946">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8946">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8947">啟用轉譯器程式碼完整性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8947">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8948">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8948">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8949">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8949">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8950">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8950">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8951">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則會啟用轉譯器程式碼完整性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8951">If this policy is enabled or left unset, then Renderer Code Integrity is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8952">只有當必須在 Microsoft Edge 的轉譯器處理程序內執行的協力廠商軟體發生的相容性問題時，才應該停用此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8952">This policy should only be disabled if compatibility issues are encountered with third party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8953">停用此原則會對 Microsoft Edge 的安全性和穩定性造成不利影響，因為會允許未知且可能有害的程式碼在 Microsoft Edge 的轉譯器處理程序內載入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8953">Disabling this policy has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability because unknown and potentially hostile code will be allowed to load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8954">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8954">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8955">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8955">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8956">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8956">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8957">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8957">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8958">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8958">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8959">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8959">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8960">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8960">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8961">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8961">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8962">GP 唯一名稱：RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8962">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8963">GP 名稱：啟用轉譯器程式碼完整性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8963">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8964">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8964">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8965">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8965">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8966">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8966">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8967">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8967">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8968">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8968">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8969">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8969">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8970">數值名稱：RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8970">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8971">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8971">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8972">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8972">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8973">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8973">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8974">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8974">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8975">指定本機信賴起點是否需要線上 OCSP/CRL 檢查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8975">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
