  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8976">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8976">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8977">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8977">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8978">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8978">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8979">控制是否需要線上撤銷檢查 (OCSP/CRL 檢查)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8979">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8980">如果 Microsoft Edge 無法取得撤銷狀態資訊，則會將這些憑證視為已撤銷 (「封鎖性失敗」)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8980">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8981">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 一律會針對成功驗證且由本機安裝的 CA 憑證簽署的伺服器憑證執行撤銷檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8981">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-8982">如果未設定或停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用現有的線上撤銷檢查設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8982">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8983">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8983">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8984">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8984">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8985">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8985">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8986">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8986">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8987">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8987">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8988">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8988">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8989">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8989">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8990">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8990">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8991">GP 唯一名稱：RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8991">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8992">GP 名稱：指定本機信賴起點是否需要線上 OCSP/CRL 檢查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8992">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8993">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8993">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8994">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8994">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8995">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8995">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8996">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8996">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8997">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8997">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8998">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8998">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-8999">數值名稱：RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-8999">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9000">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9000">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9001">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9001">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9002">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9002">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9003">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9003">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9004">啟用使用 Web 服務來解決導覽錯誤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9004">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9005">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9005">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9006">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9006">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9007">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9007">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9008">允許 Microsoft Edge 向 Web 服務發出無資料連線，以便在旅館和機場 Wi-Fi 之類情況下探測網路的連線能力。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9008">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9009">如果啟用此原則，則會使用 Web 服務來進行網路連線測試。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9009">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9010">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用原生 API 來嘗試解決網路連線和瀏覽問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9010">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9011">**注意**：除了在 Windows 8 和更新版本的 Windows 上，Microsoft Edge *一律*會使用本機 API 來解決連線問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9011">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9012">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會遵守 edge://settings/privacy 的 [服務] 底下所設定的使用者喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9012">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9013">具體來說，有一個使用者可以開啟或關閉的 [使用網頁服務協助您解決瀏覽錯誤]\*\*\*\* 切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9013">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9014">請注意，如果已啟用此原則 (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService)，[使用網頁服務協助您解決瀏覽錯誤]\*\*\*\* 設定會開啟，但使用者無法使用切換來變更設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9014">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9015">如果已停用此原則，則 [使用網頁服務協助您解決瀏覽錯誤]\*\*\*\* 設定會關閉，且使用者無法使用切換來變更設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9015">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9016">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9016">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9017">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9017">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9018">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9018">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9019">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9019">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9020">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9020">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9021">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9021">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9022">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9022">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9023">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9023">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9024">GP 唯一名稱：ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9024">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9025">GP 名稱：啟用使用 Web 服務來解決導覽錯誤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9025">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9026">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9026">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9027">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9027">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9028">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9028">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9029">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9029">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9030">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9030">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9031">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9031">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9032">數值名稱：ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9032">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9033">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9033">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9034">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9034">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9035">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9035">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9036">喜好設定機碼名稱：ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9036">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9037">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9037">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9038">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9038">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9039">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9039">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9040">限制哪些帳戶可用為 Microsoft Edge 主要帳戶</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9040">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9041">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9041">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9042">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9042">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9043">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9043">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9044">決定可以將哪些帳戶設為 Microsoft Edge 中的瀏覽器主要帳戶 (在同步選擇加入流程中選取的帳戶)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9044">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9045">如果使用者嘗試使用不符合此模式的使用者名稱設定瀏覽器主要帳戶，則會封鎖使用者並顯示適當的錯誤訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9045">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9046">您可以使用此模式的 Perl 樣式規則運算式，將此原則設定為符合多個帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9046">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9047">請注意，模式比對會區分大小寫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9047">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9048">如需使用的規則運算式規則之詳細資訊，請參閱 https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9048">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9049">如果未設定此原則或將它保留為空白，則使用者可以將任何帳戶設定為 Microsoft Edge 中的瀏覽器主要帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9049">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9050">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9050">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9051">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9051">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9052">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9052">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9053">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9053">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9054">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9054">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9055">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9055">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9056">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9056">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9057">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9057">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9058">GP 唯一名稱：RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9058">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9059">GP 名稱：限制哪些帳戶可用為 Microsoft Edge 主要帳戶</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9059">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9060">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9060">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9061">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9061">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9062">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9062">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9063">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9063">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9064">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9064">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9065">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9065">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9066">數值名稱：RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9066">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9067">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9067">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9068">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9068">Example value:</span></span>
```
".*@contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9069">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9069">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9070">喜好設定機碼名稱：RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9070">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9071">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9071">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9072">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9072">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9073">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9073">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9074">設定漫遊設定檔目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9074">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9075">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9075">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9076">Windows 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9076">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9077">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9077">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9078">設定用來儲存設定檔快取複本的目錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9078">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9079">Microsoft Edge 會使用已提供的目錄，儲存設定檔的快取複本，若您在啟用此原則時同時也啟用[RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled)原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9079">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9080">若您停用或未設定 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 原則，系統將不會使用儲存在此原則中的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9080">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9081">如欲知道您可使用的變數清單，請參照[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9081">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9082">如果您並未設定此原則，系統將會使用預設的快取設定檔路徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9082">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9083">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9083">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9084">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9084">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9085">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9085">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9086">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9086">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9087">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9087">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9088">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9088">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9089">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9089">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9090">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9090">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9091">GP 唯一名稱：RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9091">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9092">GP 名稱：設定快取設定檔目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9092">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9093">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9093">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9094">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9094">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9095">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9095">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9096">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9096">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9097">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9097">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9098">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9098">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9099">數值名稱：RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9099">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9100">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9100">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9101">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9101">Example value:</span></span>
```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```


  
  
   
 
 
   
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9102">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9102">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9103">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9103">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9104">啟用 Microsoft Edge 設定檔資料的快取副本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9104">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9105">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9105">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9106">Windows 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9106">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9107">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9107">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9108">啟用此原則以使用 Windows 上的快取設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9108">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9109">儲存在 Microsoft Edge 設定檔 ([我的最愛] 和 [喜好設定]) 中的設定，也會儲存至 [漫遊使用者設定檔] 資料夾中儲存的檔案 (或由系統管理員透過 [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) 原則所指定的位置)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9109">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9110">如果您停用或未設定此原則，系統只會使用標準本機設定檔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9110">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9111">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 原則會停用所有資料同步處理、覆寫原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9111">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy disables all data synchronization, overriding policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9112">如需使用漫遊使用者設定檔的詳細資訊，請參閱 https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/storage/folder-redirection/deploy-roaming-user-profiles。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9112">See https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/storage/folder-redirection/deploy-roaming-user-profiles for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9113">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9113">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9114">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9114">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9115">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9115">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9116">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9116">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9117">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9117">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9118">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9118">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9119">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9119">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9120">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9120">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9121">GP 唯一名稱：RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9121">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9122">GP 名稱：啟用 Microsoft Edge 設定檔資料的快取副本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9122">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9123">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9123">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9124">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9124">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9125">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9125">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9126">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9126">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9127">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9127">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9128">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9128">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9129">數值名稱：RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9129">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9130">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9130">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9131">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9131">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  
  
   
 
 
   
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9132">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9132">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9133">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9133">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9134">將 Adobe Flash 內容設定延伸至所有內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9134">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9135">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9135">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9136">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9136">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9137">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9137">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9138">如果啟用此原則，在內容設定中設為允許 Adobe Flash 的網站中內嵌的所有 Adobe Flash 內容 (無論是由使用者或企業原則設定) 將會執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9138">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9139">這包含來自其他來源和/或小型內容的內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9139">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9140">若要控制允許哪些網站執行 Adobe Flash，請參閱 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)、[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) 原則中的規格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9140">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9141">如果停用或未設定此原則，則可能會封鎖來自其他來源 (以上提及的三個原則中未指定的網站) 的 Adobe Flash 或少量內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9141">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9142">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9142">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9143">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9143">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9144">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9144">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9145">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9145">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9146">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9146">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9147">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9147">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9148">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9148">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9149">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9149">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9150">GP 唯一名稱：RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9150">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9151">GP 名稱：將 Adobe Flash 內容設定延伸至所有內容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9151">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9152">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9152">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9153">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9153">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9154">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9154">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9155">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9155">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9156">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9156">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9157">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9157">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9158">數值名稱：RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9158">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9159">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9159">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9160">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9160">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9161">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9161">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9162">喜好設定機碼名稱：RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9162">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9163">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9163">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9164">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9164">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9165">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9165">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9166">允許使用者從 HTTPS 警告頁面繼續進行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9166">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9167">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9167">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9168">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9168">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9169">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9169">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9170">當使用者造訪含有 SSL 錯誤的網站時，Microsoft Edge 會顯示警告頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9170">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9171">如果啟用或未設定 (預設) 此原則，則使用者可以點選這些警告頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9171">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9172">如果停用此原則，則會封鎖使用者，使其無法點選任何警告頁面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9172">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9173">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9173">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9174">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9174">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9175">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9175">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9176">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9176">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9177">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9177">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9178">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9178">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9179">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9179">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9180">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9180">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9181">GP 唯一名稱：SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9181">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9182">GP 名稱：允許使用者從 HTTPS 警告頁面繼續進行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9182">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9183">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9183">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9184">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9184">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9185">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9185">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9186">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9186">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9187">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9187">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9188">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9188">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9189">數值名稱：SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9189">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9190">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9190">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9191">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9191">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9192">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9192">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9193">喜好設定機碼名稱：SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9193">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9194">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9194">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9195">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9195">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9196">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9196">SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9197">已啟用最低 TLS 版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9197">Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9198">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9198">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9199">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9199">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9200">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9200">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9201">設定支援的最低 SSL 版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9201">Sets the minimum supported version of SSL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9202">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用預設的最低版本，TLS 1.0。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9202">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge uses a default minimum version, TLS 1.0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9203">如果啟用此原則，則可以將最低版本設定為下列其中一個值：'TLSv1'、'TLSv1.1' 或 'TLSv1.2'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9203">If you enable this policy, you can set the minimum version to one of the following values: 'TLSv1', 'TLSv1.1' or 'TLSv1.2'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9204">設定時，Microsoft Edge 不會使用低於指定版本的任何 SSL/TLS 版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9204">When set, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9205">任何無法辨識的值都會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9205">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9206">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9206">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9207">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9207">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9208">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9208">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9209">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9209">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9210">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9210">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9211">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9211">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9212">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9212">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9213">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9213">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9214">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9214">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9215">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9215">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9216">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9216">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9217">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9217">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9218">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9218">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9219">GP 唯一名稱：SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9219">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9220">GP 名稱：已啟用最低 TLS 版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9220">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9221">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9221">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9222">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9222">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9223">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9223">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9224">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9224">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9225">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9225">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9226">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9226">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9227">數值名稱：SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9227">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9228">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9228">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9229">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9229">Example value:</span></span>
```
"tls1"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9230">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9230">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9231">喜好設定機碼名稱：SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9231">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9232">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9232">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9233">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9233">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9234">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9234">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9235">在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時儲存 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9235">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9236">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9236">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9237">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9237">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9238">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9238">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9239">啟用此原則時，瀏覽器關閉時，指定的 Cookie 集合不會遭到刪除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9239">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9240">這個原則只有在下列情況下才有效：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9240">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9241">在 [設定/隱私權與服務/清除瀏覽資料] 中設定 [Cookies 及其他網站資料] 切換按鈕為關閉或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9241">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9242">已啟用原則 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9242">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9243">原則 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 設定為 ‘在工作階段期間保留 Cookie’。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9243">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9244">您可以根據 URL 模式定義要在多個工作階段之間保留 Cookie 的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9244">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9245">請注意：使用者仍然可以編輯 Cookie 網站清單，以新增或移除 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9245">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9246">不過，他們無法移除由系統管理員新增的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9246">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9247">如果您啟用此原則，瀏覽器關閉時，Cookie 清單就不會被清除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9247">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9248">如果您停用或未設定此原則，則會使用使用者的個人設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9248">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9249">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9249">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9250">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9250">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9251">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9251">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9252">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9252">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9253">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9253">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9254">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9254">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9255">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9255">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9256">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9256">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9257">GP 唯一名稱：SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9257">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9258">GP 名稱：在 Microsoft Edge 關閉時儲存 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9258">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9259">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9259">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9260">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9260">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9261">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9261">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9262">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9262">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9263">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9263">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9264">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9264">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9265">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9265">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9266">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9266">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9267">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9267">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9268">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9268">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9269">喜好設定機碼名稱：SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9269">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9270">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9270">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9271">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9271">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9272">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9272">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9273">停用儲存瀏覽器歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9273">Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9274">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9274">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9275">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9275">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9276">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9276">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9277">停用儲存瀏覽器歷程記錄，並防止使用者變更此設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9277">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9278">如果啟用此原則，則不會儲存瀏覽歷程記錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9278">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9279">這也會停用索引標籤同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9279">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9280">如果停用或未設定此原則，則會儲存瀏覽歷程記錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9280">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9281">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9281">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9282">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9282">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9283">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9283">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9284">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9284">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9285">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9285">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9286">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9286">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9287">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9287">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9288">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9288">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9289">GP 唯一名稱：SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9289">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9290">GP 名稱：停用儲存瀏覽器歷程記錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9290">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9291">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9291">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9292">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9292">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9293">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9293">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9294">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9294">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9295">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9295">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9296">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9296">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9297">數值名稱：SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9297">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9298">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9298">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9299">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9299">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9300">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9300">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9301">喜好設定機碼名稱：SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9301">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9302">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9302">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9303">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9303">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9304">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9304">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9305">允許或拒絕螢幕擷取畫面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9305">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9306">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9306">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9307">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9307">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9308">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9308">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9309">如果啟用此原則或未設定此原則，則網頁可使用螢幕共用 API (例如 getDisplayMedia () 或桌面擷取擴充功能 API) 來進行螢幕擷取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9309">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9310">如果停用此原則，則對螢幕共用 API 的呼叫將會失敗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9310">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9311">例如，如果您正在使用網路線上會議，視訊或螢幕共用將無法運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9311">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9312">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9312">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9313">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9313">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9314">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9314">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9315">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9315">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9316">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9316">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9317">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9317">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9318">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9318">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9319">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9319">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9320">GP 唯一名稱：ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9320">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9321">GP 名稱：允許或拒絕螢幕擷取畫面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9321">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9322">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9322">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9323">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9323">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9324">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9324">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9325">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9325">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9326">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9326">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9327">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9327">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9328">數值名稱：ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9328">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9329">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9329">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9330">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9330">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9331">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9331">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9332">喜好設定機碼名稱：ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9332">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9333">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9333">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9334">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9334">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9335">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9335">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9336">啟用捲動至在 URL 片段中指定的文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9336">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9337">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9337">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9338">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9338">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9339">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9339">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9340">此功能會超連結和網址列 URL 導覽以網頁上的特定文字為目標，這會在網頁載入完成之後進行捲動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9340">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9341">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則會啟用透過 URL 將網頁捲動至特定文字片段的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9341">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9342">如果停用此原則，則會停用透過 URL 將網頁捲動至特定文字片段的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9342">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9343">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9343">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9344">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9344">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9345">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9345">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9346">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9346">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9347">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9347">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9348">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9348">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9349">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9349">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9350">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9350">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9351">GP 唯一名稱：ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9351">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9352">GP 名稱：啟用捲動至在 URL 片段中指定的文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9352">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9353">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9353">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9354">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9354">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9355">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9355">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9356">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9356">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9357">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9357">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9358">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9358">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9359">數值名稱：ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9359">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9360">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9360">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9361">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9361">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9362">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9362">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9363">喜好設定機碼名稱：ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9363">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9364">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9364">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9365">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9365">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9366">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9366">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9367">啟用搜尋建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9367">Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9368">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9368">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9369">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9369">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9370">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9370">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9371">在 Microsoft Edge 的網址列和自動建議清單中啟用網頁搜尋建議，並防止使用者變更此原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9371">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9372">如果啟用此原則，則會使用 Web 搜尋建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9372">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9373">如果停用此原則，則永遠不會使用 Web 搜尋建議，不過仍會顯示本機歷程記錄和本機我的最愛建議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9373">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9374">如果停用此原則，則不會在對 Microsoft 的遙測中包含所輸入的字元和所造訪的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9374">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9375">如果將此原則保留為未設定，則會啟用搜尋建議，但使用者可以變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9375">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9376">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9376">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9377">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9377">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9378">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9378">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9379">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9379">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9380">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9380">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9381">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9381">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9382">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9382">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9383">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9383">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9384">GP 唯一名稱：SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9384">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9385">GP 名稱：啟用搜尋建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9385">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9386">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9386">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9387">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9387">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9388">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9388">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9389">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9389">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9390">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9390">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9391">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9391">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9392">數值名稱：SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9392">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9393">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9393">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9394">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9394">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9395">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9395">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9396">喜好設定機碼名稱：SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9396">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9397">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9397">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9398">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9398">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9399">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9399">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9400">不需要權限即可使用直接存取安全性金鑰證明的網站或網域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9400">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9401">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9401">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9402">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9402">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9403">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9403">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9404">指定要求來自安全性金鑰的證明憑證時，不需要明確使用者權限的網站和網域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9404">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9405">此外，傳送信號給安全性金鑰，指出它可以使用個別證明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9405">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9406">如果沒有此動作，每次網站要求安全性金鑰的證明時，即會提示使用者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9406">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9407">網站 (例如 https://contoso.com/some/path) 僅符合 U2F appID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9407">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9408">網域 (例如 contoso.com) 僅符合 webauthn RP 識別碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9408">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9409">若要涵蓋特定網站的 U2F 和 webauthn API，您需要列出 appID URL 和網域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9409">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9410">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9410">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9411">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9411">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9412">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9412">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9413">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9413">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9414">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9414">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9415">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9415">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9416">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9416">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9417">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9417">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9418">GP 唯一名稱：SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9418">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9419">GP 名稱：不需要權限即可使用直接存取安全性金鑰證明的網站或網域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9419">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
