  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9420">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9420">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9421">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9421">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9422">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9422">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9423">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9423">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9424">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9424">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9425">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9425">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9426">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9426">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9427">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9427">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9428">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9428">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9429">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9429">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9430">喜好設定機碼名稱：SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9430">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9431">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9431">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9432">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9432">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9433">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9433">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9434">將所有內部網路網站傳送到 Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9434">Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9435">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9435">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9436">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9436">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9437">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9437">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9438">如需有關設定 Internet Explorer 模式的最佳體驗的指導方針，請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9438">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9439">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9439">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9440">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9440">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9441">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9441">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9442">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9442">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9443">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9443">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9444">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9444">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9445">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9445">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9446">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9446">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9447">GP 唯一名稱：SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9447">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9448">GP 名稱：將所有內部網路網站傳送到 Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9448">GP name: Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9449">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9449">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9450">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9450">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9451">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9451">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9452">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9452">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9453">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9453">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9454">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9454">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9455">數值名稱：SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9455">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9456">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9456">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9457">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9457">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9458">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9458">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9459">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9459">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9460">傳送網站資訊以改善 Microsoft 服務 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9460">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-9461">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9461">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9462">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9462">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
   
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9463">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9463">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9464">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9464">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9465">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9465">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9466">此原則已被取代。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9466">This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9467">目前支援，但將在 Microsoft Edge 版本 89 中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9467">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in Microsoft Edge 89.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9468">這個原則會由新原則取代：Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS 的 [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9468">This policy is replaced by the new policy:  [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9469">這項原則會由 Win 10 上的允許遙測取代 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9469">This policy is replaced by Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9470">此原則允許傳送有關使用 Microsoft Edge 造訪網站的資訊給 Microsoft，以改善服務 (如搜尋)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9470">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

   
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9471">啟用此原則，以傳送有關使用 Microsoft Edge 造訪網站的資訊給 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9471">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9472">停用此原則，以不要傳送有關使用 Microsoft Edge 造訪網站的資訊給 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9472">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9473">在這兩種情況下，使用者都無法變更或覆寫設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9473">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9474">在 Windows 10 上，如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將預設為使用 Windows 診斷資料設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9474">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9475">如果啟用此原則，而且 Windows 診斷資料設定設為「完整」時，Microsoft Edge 將僅傳送有關在 Microsoft Edge 中所造訪網站的資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9475">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9476">如果停用此原則，Microsoft Edge 將不會傳送有關造訪網站的資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9476">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9477">深入了解 Windows 診斷資料設定：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9477">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9478">在 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS 上，此原則會控制所造訪網站相關資訊的傳送。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9478">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9479">如果未設定此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將預設為使用者的喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9479">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9480">若要啟用此原則，[MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 必須設定為 [已啟用]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9480">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9481">如果 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 或 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 未設定或已停用，將不會將此資料傳送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9481">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>
             

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9482">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9482">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9483">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9483">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9484">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9484">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9485">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9485">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9486">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9486">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9487">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9487">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9488">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9488">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9489">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9489">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9490">GP 唯一名稱：SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9490">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9491">GP 名稱：傳送網站資訊以改善 Microsoft 服務 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9491">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9492">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9492">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9493">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9493">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9494">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9494">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9495">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9495">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9496">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9496">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9497">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9497">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9498">數值名稱：SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9498">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9499">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9499">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9500">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9500">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9501">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9501">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9502">喜好設定機碼名稱：SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9502">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9503">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9503">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9504">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9504">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9505">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9505">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9506">允許存取特定網站上的感應器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9506">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9507">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9507">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9508">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9508">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9509">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9509">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9510">根據 URL 模式，定義可以存取及使用感應器（如動作和光線感應器）的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9510">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9511">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9511">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9512">針對未符合此原則的 URL 模式，使用的優先順序依序為：[SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 原則（若符合的話）、[DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 原則（若有設定）、或使用者的個人設定值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9512">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9513">在此原則中定義的 URL 模式不能與 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 原則中的設定相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9513">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9514">您不能將 URL 同時設定為允許和封鎖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9514">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9515">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9515">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9516">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9516">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9517">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9517">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9518">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9518">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9519">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9519">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9520">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9520">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9521">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9521">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9522">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9522">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9523">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9523">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9524">GP 唯一名稱：SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9524">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9525">GP 名稱：允許存取特定網站上的感應器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9525">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9526">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9526">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9527">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9527">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9528">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9528">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9529">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9529">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9530">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9530">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9531">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9531">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9532">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9532">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9533">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9533">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9534">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9534">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9535">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9535">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9536">喜好設定機碼名稱：SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9536">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9537">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9537">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9538">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9538">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9539">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9539">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9540">封鎖存取特定網站上的感應器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9540">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9541">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9541">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9542">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9542">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9543">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9543">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9544">根據 URL 模式，定義不可存取感應器（例如動作和光線感應器）的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9544">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9545">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9545">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9546">針對未符合此原則的 URL 模式，使用的優先順序依序為：[SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 原則（若符合的話）、[DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 原則（若有設定）、或使用者的個人設定值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9546">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9547">在此原則中定義的 URL 模式不能與 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 原則中的設定相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9547">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9548">您不能將 URL 同時設定為允許和封鎖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9548">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9549">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9549">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9550">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9550">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9551">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9551">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9552">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9552">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9553">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9553">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9554">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9554">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9555">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9555">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9556">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9556">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9557">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9557">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9558">GP 唯一名稱：SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9558">GP unique name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9559">GP 名稱：封鎖存取特定網站上的感應器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9559">GP name: Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9560">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9560">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9561">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9561">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9562">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9562">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9563">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9563">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9564">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9564">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9565">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9565">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9566">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9566">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9567">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9567">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9568">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9568">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9569">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9569">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9570">喜好設定機碼名稱：SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9570">Preference Key Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9571">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9571">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9572">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9572">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9573">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9573">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9574">允許特定網站的 Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9574">Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9575">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9575">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9576">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9576">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9577">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9577">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9578">根據 URL 的模式，定義可要求使用者取得序列通訊埠存取權的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9578">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9579">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9579">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9580">針對未符合此原則的 URL 模式，使用的優先順序依序為：[SerialBlockedForUrls ](#serialblockedforurls) 原則（若符合的話）、 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting ](#defaultserialguardsetting) 原則（若有設定）、或使用者的個人設定值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9580">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9581">在此原則中定義的 URL 模式不可與 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 原則中的設定相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9581">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9582">您不能將 URL 同時設定為允許和封鎖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9582">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9583">如需有效 url 模式的詳細資訊，請參照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9583">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9584">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9584">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9585">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9585">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9586">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9586">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9587">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9587">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9588">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9588">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9589">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9589">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9590">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9590">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9591">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9591">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9592">GP 唯一名稱：SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9592">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9593">GP 名稱：允許特定網站的 Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9593">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9594">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9594">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9595">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9595">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9596">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9596">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9597">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9597">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9598">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9598">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9599">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9599">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9600">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9600">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9601">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9601">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9602">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9602">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9603">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9603">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9604">喜好設定機碼名稱：SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9604">Preference Key Name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9605">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9605">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9606">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9606">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9607">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9607">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9608">封鎖特定網站的 Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9608">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9609">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9609">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9610">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9610">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9611">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9611">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9612">根據 URL 的模式，定義無法要求使用者授與其序列通訊埠存取權的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9612">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9613">如果未設定此原則，則會對所有網站使用來自 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 原則 (如有設定) 或使用者個人設定的全域預設值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9613">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9614">針對未符合此原則的 URL 模式，使用的優先順序依序為：[SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 原則（若符合的話）、[DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 原則（若有設定）、或使用者的個人設定值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9614">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9615">在此原則中定義的 URL 模式不能與 [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 原則中的設定相衝突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9615">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9616">您不能將 URL 同時設定為允許和封鎖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9616">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9617">如需有效 URL 模式的詳細資訊，可參照 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9617">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9618">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9618">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9619">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9619">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9620">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9620">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9621">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9621">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9622">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9622">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9623">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9623">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9624">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9624">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9625">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9625">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9626">GP 唯一名稱：SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9626">GP unique name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9627">GP 名稱：封鎖特定網站的 Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9627">GP name: Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9628">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9628">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9629">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9629">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9630">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9630">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9631">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9631">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9632">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9632">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9633">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9633">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9634">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9634">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9635">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9635">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9636">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9636">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9637">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9637">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9638">喜好設定機碼名稱：SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9638">Preference Key Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9639">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9639">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9640">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9640">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9641">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9641">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9642">在 [我的最愛] 列中顯示 Microsoft Office 捷徑 (已取代)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9642">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-9643">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9643">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9644">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9644">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9645">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9645">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9646">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9646">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9647">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9647">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9648">由於操作要求的變更，此原則無法按預期運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9648">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9649">因此，它已遭取代，因而不應該使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9649">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9650">指定是否要在我的最愛列中加入 Office.com 的捷徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9650">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9651">針對已登入 Microsoft Edge 的使用者，該捷徑可帶領使用者前往其 Microsoft Office 應用程式和文件中。如果您啟用或不設定此原則，則使用者可以透過變更 [我的最愛] 列內容功能表中的切換來選擇是否要看到該捷徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9651">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9652">如果您停用此原則，就不會顯示捷徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9652">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

                                                       

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9653">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9653">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9654">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9654">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9655">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9655">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9656">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9656">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9657">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9657">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9658">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9658">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9659">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9659">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9660">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9660">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9661">GP 唯一名稱：ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9661">GP unique name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9662">GP 名稱：在 [我的最愛] 列中顯示 Microsoft Office 捷徑 (已取代)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9662">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9663">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9663">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9664">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9664">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9665">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9665">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9666">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9666">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9667">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9667">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9668">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9668">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9669">數值名稱：ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9669">Value Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9670">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9670">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9671">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9671">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9672">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9672">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9673">喜好設定機碼名稱：ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9673">Preference Key Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9674">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9674">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9675">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9675">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9676">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9676">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9677">啟用 Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支援</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9677">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9678">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9678">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9679">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9679">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9680">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9680">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9681">啟用 Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) 的支援。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9681">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9682">如果未設定或已啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會接受將網頁內容做為 Signed HTTP Exchange。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9682">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9683">如果將此原則設為已停用，則無法載入 Signed HTTP Exchange。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9683">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9684">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9684">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9685">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9685">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9686">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9686">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9687">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9687">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9688">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9688">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9689">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9689">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9690">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9690">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9691">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9691">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9692">GP 唯一名稱：SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9692">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9693">GP 名稱：啟用 Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支援</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9693">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9694">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9694">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9695">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9695">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9696">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9696">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9697">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9697">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9698">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9698">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9699">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9699">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9700">數值名稱：SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9700">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9701">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9701">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9702">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9702">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9703">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9703">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9704">喜好設定機碼名稱：SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9704">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9705">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9705">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9706">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9706">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9707">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9707">SitePerProcess</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9708">為每個網站啟用網站隔離</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9708">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9709">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9709">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9710">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9710">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9711">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9711">Description</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9712">'SitePerProcess' 原則可用於防止使用者選擇退出隔離所有網站的預設行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9712">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9713">請注意，您也可以使用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 原則來隔離其他更精細的來源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9713">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9714">如果啟用此原則，則使用者將無法選擇退出每個網站都是以自己的處理程序執行的預設行為。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9714">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9715">如果您停用或未設定此原則，使用者可以選擇退出網站隔離。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9715">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9716">(例如，使用 edge://flags 中的 [停用網站隔離] 項目。) 停用原則或未設定原則，並無法關閉網站隔離。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9716">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9717">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9717">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9718">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9718">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9719">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9719">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9720">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9720">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9721">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9721">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9722">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9722">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9723">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9723">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9724">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9724">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9725">GP 唯一名稱：SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9725">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9726">GP 名稱：為每個網站啟用網站隔離</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9726">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9727">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9727">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9728">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9728">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9729">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9729">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9730">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9730">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9731">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9731">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9732">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9732">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9733">數值名稱：SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9733">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9734">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9734">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9735">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9735">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9736">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9736">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9737">喜好設定機碼名稱：SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9737">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9738">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9738">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9739">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9739">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9740">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9740">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9741">啟用拼字檢查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9741">Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9742">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9742">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9743">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9743">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9744">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9744">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9745">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以使用拼字檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9745">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9746">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法使用拼字檢查，且會停用 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9746">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9747">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9747">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9748">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9748">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9749">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9749">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9750">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9750">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9751">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9751">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9752">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9752">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9753">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9753">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9754">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9754">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9755">GP 唯一名稱：SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9755">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9756">GP 名稱：啟用拼字檢查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9756">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9757">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9757">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9758">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9758">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9759">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9759">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9760">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9760">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9761">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9761">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9762">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9762">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9763">數值名稱：SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9763">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9764">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9764">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9765">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9765">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9766">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9766">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9767">喜好設定機碼名稱：SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9767">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9768">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9768">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9769">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9769">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9770">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9770">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9771">啟用特定拼字檢查語言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9771">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9772">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9772">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9773">Windows 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9773">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9774">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9774">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9775">啟用不同語言的拼字檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9775">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9776">將忽略您指定、無法辨識的任何語言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9776">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9777">如果啟用此原則，則會針對指定的語言及使用者啟用的任何語言啟用拼字檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9777">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9778">如果未設定或停用此原則，則不會對使用者的拼字檢查喜好設定進行任何變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9778">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9779">如果 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 原則為已停用，則此原則沒有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9779">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9780">如果在 'SpellcheckLanguage' 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 原則中同時包含某個語言，則會啟用該拼字檢查語言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9780">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9781">支援的語言為：af、bg、ca、cs、cy、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9781">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9782">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9782">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9783">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9783">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9784">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9784">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9785">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9785">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9786">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9786">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9787">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9787">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9788">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9788">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9789">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9789">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9790">GP 唯一名稱：SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9790">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9791">GP 名稱：啟用特定拼字檢查語言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9791">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9792">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9792">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9793">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9793">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9794">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9794">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9795">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9795">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9796">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9796">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9797">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9797">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9798">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9798">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9799">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9799">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9800">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9800">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9801">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9801">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9802">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9802">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9803">強制停用拼字檢查語言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9803">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9804">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9804">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9805">Windows 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9805">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9806">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9806">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9807">強制停用拼字檢查語言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9807">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9808">該清單中無法辨識的語言將會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9808">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9809">如果啟用此原則，則會針對指定的語言停用拼字檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9809">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9810">使用者仍可以為清單中沒有的語言啟用或停用拼字檢查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9810">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9811">如果未設定此原則或停用，則不會對使用者的拼字檢查喜好設定進行任何變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9811">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9812">如果 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 原則設為已停用，則此原則沒有作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9812">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9813">如果在 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' 原則中同時包含某個語言，則會啟用該拼字檢查語言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9813">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9814">目前支援的語言為：af、bg、ca、cs、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9814">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9815">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9815">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9816">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9816">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9817">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9817">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9818">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9818">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9819">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9819">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9820">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9820">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9821">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9821">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9822">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9822">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9823">GP 唯一名稱：SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9823">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9824">GP 名稱：強制停用拼字檢查語言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9824">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9825">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9825">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9826">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9826">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9827">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9827">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9828">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9828">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9829">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9829">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9830">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9830">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9831">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9831">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9832">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9832">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9833">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9833">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9834">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9834">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9835">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9835">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9836">針對混合內容啟用更嚴格的處理 (已淘汰)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9836">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-9837">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9837">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9838">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9838">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9839">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9839">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9840">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9840">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9841">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9841">Description</span></span>
