  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9842">此原則已遭取代，因為此原則只是一個短期機制，用於讓企業在發現其 Web 內容與嚴格混合內容的處理不一致時，可以有更多時間來更新其 Web 內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9842">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9843">無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9843">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9844">此原則可控制在瀏覽器中處理混合內容 (HTTPS 網站中的 HTTP 內容) 的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9844">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9845">如果將此原則設定為 true 或未設定，音訊和視訊混合內容將會自動升級為 HTTPS (也就是說，URL 將會重寫為 HTTPS，且如果資源無法透過 HTTPS 使用，也不會遞補)，且會在影像混合內容的 URL 列中顯示「不安全」警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9845">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9846">如果將原則設定為 false，則會停用音訊和視訊的自動升級，且不會顯示影像的警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9846">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9847">此原則不會影響音訊、視訊和影像以外的其他類型混合內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9847">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>


  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9848">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9848">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9849">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9849">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9850">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9850">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9851">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9851">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9852">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9852">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9853">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9853">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9854">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9854">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9855">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9855">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9856">GP 唯一名稱：StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9856">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9857">GP 名稱：針對混合內容啟用更嚴格的處理 (已淘汰)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9857">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9858">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9858">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9859">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9859">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9860">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9860">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9861">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9861">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9862">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9862">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9863">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9863">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9864">數值名稱：StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9864">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9865">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9865">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9866">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9866">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9867">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9867">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9868">喜好設定機碼名稱：StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9868">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9869">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9869">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9870">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9870">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9871">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9871">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9872">隱藏不支援的 OS 警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9872">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9873">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9873">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9874">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9874">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9875">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9875">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9876">隱藏當 Microsoft Edge 於已不再受支援的電腦或作業系統上執行時將會顯示的警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9876">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9877">如果此原則為 false 或未設定，則會在這類不受支援的電腦或作業系統中顯示警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9877">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9878">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9878">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9879">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9879">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9880">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9880">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9881">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9881">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9882">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9882">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9883">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9883">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9884">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9884">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9885">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9885">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9886">GP 唯一名稱：SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9886">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9887">GP 名稱：隱藏不支援的 OS 警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9887">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9888">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9888">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9889">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9889">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9890">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9890">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9891">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9891">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9892">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9892">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9893">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9893">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9894">數值名稱：SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9894">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9895">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9895">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9896">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9896">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9897">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9897">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9898">喜好設定機碼名稱：SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9898">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9899">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9899">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9900">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9900">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9901">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9901">SyncDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9902">透過 Microsoft 同步服務停用資料同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9902">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9903">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9903">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9904">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9904">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9905">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9905">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9906">停用 Microsoft Edge 中的資料同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9906">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9907">此原則也會防止顯示同步同意提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9907">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>


 
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9908">如果未設定此原則或將它套用為建議，則使用者將可以開啟或關閉同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9908">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9909">如果將此原則套用為強制，則使用者將無法開啟同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9909">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9910">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9910">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9911">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9911">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9912">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9912">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9913">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9913">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9914">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9914">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9915">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9915">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9916">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9916">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9917">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9917">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9918">GP 唯一名稱：SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9918">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9919">GP 名稱：透過 Microsoft 同步服務停用資料同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9919">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9920">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9920">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9921">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9921">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9922">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9922">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9923">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9923">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9924">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9924">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9925">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9925">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9926">數值名稱：SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9926">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9927">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9927">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9928">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9928">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9929">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9929">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9930">喜好設定機碼名稱：SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9930">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9931">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9931">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9932">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9932">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9933">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9933">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9934">設定同步服務將排除的類型清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9934">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9935">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9935">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9936">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 83 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9936">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9937">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9937">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9938">如果啟用此原則，則所有指定的資料類型將會從同步中排除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9938">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9939">此原則可用來限制上傳至 Microsoft Edge 同步服務的資料類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9939">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9940">您可以針對此原則提供下列其中一個資料類型：「favorites」、「settings」、「passwords」、「addressesAndMore」、「extensions」、「history」和 「collections」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9940">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9941">請注意，這些資料類型名稱需區分大小寫。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9941">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9942">使用者將無法覆寫已停用的資料類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9942">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9943">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9943">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9944">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9944">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9945">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9945">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9946">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9946">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9947">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9947">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9948">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9948">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9949">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9949">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9950">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9950">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9951">GP 唯一名稱：SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9951">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9952">GP 名稱：設定同步服務將排除的類型清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9952">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9953">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9953">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9954">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9954">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9955">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9955">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9956">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9956">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9957">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9957">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9958">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9958">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9959">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9959">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9960">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9960">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9961">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9961">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9962">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9962">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9963">喜好設定機碼名稱：SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9963">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9964">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9964">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9965">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9965">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9966">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9966">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9967">啟用適於本機信賴起點的 TLS 1.3 安全性功能 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9967">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-9968">已過時：此原則已過時，且無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 及之後的版本中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9968">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9969">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9969">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9970">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 81 到 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9970">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9971">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9971">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9972">此原則已無法運作，因為其只是一種短期機制，目的是要讓企業有更多時間升級受影響的 Proxy。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9972">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9973">此原則會控制 TLS 1.3 中可保護連線對抗降級攻擊的安全性功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9973">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9974">它是回溯相容且不會影響與相容 TLS 1.2 伺服器或 Proxy 的連線。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9974">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9975">不過，部分舊版 TLS 攔截 Proxy 具有實作缺陷，導致它們不相容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9975">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9976">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則 Microsoft Edge 將會針對所有連線啟用這些安全性保護。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9976">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9977">如果停用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 將針對使用本機安裝的 CA 憑證進行驗證的連線，停用這些安全性保護。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9977">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9978">針對使用公開信任的 CA 憑證進行驗證的連線，這些保護一律會啟用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9978">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

                                                            

             

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-9979">此原則可用來測試任何受影響的 Proxy，並進行升級。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9979">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9980">受影響的 Proxy 預期會連線失敗，出現錯誤碼 ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9980">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9981">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9981">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9982">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9982">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9983">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9983">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9984">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9984">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9985">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9985">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9986">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9986">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9987">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9987">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9988">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9988">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9989">GP 唯一名稱：TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9989">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9990">GP 名稱：針對本機信賴起點啟用 TLS 1.3 安全性功能 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9990">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9991">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9991">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9992">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9992">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9993">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9993">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9994">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9994">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9995">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9995">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9996">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9996">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9997">數值名稱：TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9997">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9998">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9998">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-9999">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-9999">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10000">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10000">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10001">喜好設定機碼名稱：TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10001">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10002">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10002">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10003">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10003">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10004">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10004">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10005">指定欲停用的 TLS 加密套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10005">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10006">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10006">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10007">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 85 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10007">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10008">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10008">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10009">設定 TLS 連線停用的加密套件清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10009">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10010">若您設定此原則設定，在建立 TLS 連線時將不會使用已設定的加密套件清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10010">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10011">若您未設定此原則，瀏覽器將會自選要使用的 TLS 加密套件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10011">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10012">若要停用加密套件值，請將其指定為16位的十六進位值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10012">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10013">這些值是由 Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) 登錄所指派。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10013">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10014">TLS 1.3 須有 TLS 1.3 加密套件 TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) ，且不可被此原則停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10014">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10015">此原則不會影響 QUIC 式連線。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10015">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10016">您可以透過 [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) 原則關閉 QUIC。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10016">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10017">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10017">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10018">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10018">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10019">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10019">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10020">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10020">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10021">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10021">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10022">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10022">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10023">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10023">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10024">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10024">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10025">GP 唯一名稱：TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10025">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10026">GP 名稱：指定欲停用的 TLS 加密套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10026">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10027">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10027">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10028">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10028">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10029">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10029">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10030">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10030">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10031">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10031">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10032">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10032">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10033">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10033">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10034">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10034">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10035">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10035">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10036">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10036">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10037">喜好設定機碼名稱：TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10037">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10038">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10038">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10039">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10039">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10040">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10040">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10041">允許凍結背景索引標籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10041">Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10042">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10042">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10043">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 79 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10043">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10044">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10044">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10045">控制 Microsoft Edge 是否可以凍結在背景中至少 5 分鐘的索引標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10045">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10046">凍結索引標籤會降低 CPU、電池和記憶體使用量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10046">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10047">Microsoft Edge 使用啟發學習法來避免凍結在背景中執行實用工作 (例如：顯示通知、播放音效和串流視訊) 的索引標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10047">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10048">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則在背景中至少 5 分鐘的索引標籤可能會遭到凍結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10048">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10049">如果停用此原則，則不會凍結任何索引標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10049">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10050">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10050">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10051">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10051">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10052">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10052">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10053">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10053">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10054">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10054">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10055">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10055">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10056">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10056">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10057">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10057">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10058">GP 唯一名稱：TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10058">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10059">GP 名稱：允許凍結背景索引標籤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10059">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10060">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10060">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10061">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10061">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10062">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10062">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10063">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10063">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10064">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10064">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10065">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10065">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10066">數值名稱：TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10066">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10067">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10067">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10068">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10068">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10069">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10069">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10070">喜好設定機碼名稱：TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10070">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10071">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10071">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10072">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10072">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10073">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10073">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10074">啟用在瀏覽器工作管理員中結束處理程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10074">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10075">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10075">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10076">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10076">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10077">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10077">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10078">如果啟用或未設定此原則，則使用者可以在瀏覽器工作管理員中結束處理程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10078">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10079">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法結束處理程序，且瀏覽器工作管理員中的 [結束處理程序] 按鈕會停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10079">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10080">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10080">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10081">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10081">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10082">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10082">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10083">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10083">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10084">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10084">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10085">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10085">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10086">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10086">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10087">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10087">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10088">GP 唯一名稱：TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10088">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10089">GP 名稱：啟用在瀏覽器工作管理員中結束處理程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10089">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10090">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10090">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10091">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10091">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10092">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10092">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10093">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10093">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10094">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10094">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10095">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10095">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10096">數值名稱：TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10096">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10097">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10097">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10098">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10098">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10099">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10099">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10100">喜好設定機碼名稱：TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10100">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10101">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10101">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10102">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10102">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10103">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10103">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10104">設定單一 Microsoft Edge 執行個體可以使用的記憶體容量限制 (MB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10104">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10105">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10105">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10106">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10106">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10107">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10107">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10108">設定開始捨棄索引標籤以節省記憶體之前，單一 Microsoft Edge 執行個體可以使用的記憶體數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10108">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10109">索引標籤使用的記憶體將會釋出，且在切換至該索引標籤時，必須重新載入它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10109">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10110">如果啟用此原則，則瀏覽器將會在超過限制之後，開始捨棄索引標籤來節省記憶體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10110">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10111">不過，無法保證瀏覽器一律會在限制內執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10111">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10112">低於 1024 的任何值都會進位為 1024。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10112">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10113">如果未設定此原則，則瀏覽器只會在偵測到其電腦上的實際記憶體數量不足時才嘗試儲存記憶體。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10113">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10114">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10114">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10115">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10115">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10116">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10116">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10117">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10117">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10118">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10118">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10119">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10119">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10120">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10120">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10121">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10121">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10122">GP 唯一名稱：TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10122">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10123">GP 名稱：設定單一個 Microsoft Edge 執行個體可以使用的記憶體容量限制 (MB)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10123">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10124">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10124">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10125">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10125">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10126">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10126">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10127">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10127">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10128">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10128">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10129">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10129">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10130">數值名稱：TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10130">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10131">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10131">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10132">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10132">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000800
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10133">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10133">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10134">喜好設定機碼名稱：TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10134">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10135">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10135">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10136">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10136">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10137">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10137">TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10138">封鎖使用者的網頁瀏覽活動追蹤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10138">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10139">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10139">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10140">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 78 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10140">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10141">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10141">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10142">讓您決定是否要封鎖網站，使其無法追蹤使用者的 Web 瀏覽活動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10142">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10143">如果停用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以設定自己的防止追蹤層級。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10143">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10144">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10144">Policy options mapping:</span></span>
   
 

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10145">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = 關閉 (無防止追蹤)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10145">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10146">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = 基本 (封鎖有害的追蹤器，內容與廣告會進行個人化)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10146">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10147">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = 平衡 (封鎖有害的追蹤器以及來自使用者尚未造訪網站的追蹤器；內容與廣告的個人化程度較低)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10147">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10148">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) =嚴格 (封鎖有害的追蹤器以及來自所有網站的大部分追蹤器；內容與廣告的個人化程度最低。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10148">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10149">網站的某些部分可能無法運作)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10149">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10150">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10150">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10151">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10151">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10152">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10152">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10153">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10153">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10154">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10154">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10155">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10155">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10156">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10156">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10157">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10157">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10158">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10158">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10159">GP 唯一名稱：TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10159">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10160">GP 名稱：封鎖使用者的網頁瀏覽活動追蹤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10160">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10161">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10161">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10162">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10162">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10163">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10163">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10164">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10164">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10165">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10165">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10166">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10166">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10167">數值名稱：TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10167">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10168">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10168">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10169">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10169">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10170">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10170">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10171">喜好設定機碼名稱：TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10171">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10172">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10172">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10173">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10173">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10174">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10174">TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10175">啟用翻譯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10175">Enable Translate</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10176">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10176">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10177">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10177">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10178">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10178">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10179">在 Microsoft Edge 上啟用整合式 Microsoft 翻譯服務。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10179">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10180">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會透過在適當時顯示整合的翻譯飛出視窗，以及按滑鼠右鍵功能表中的翻譯選項，為使用者提供翻譯功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10180">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10181">停用此原則可停用所有內建的翻譯功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10181">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10182">如果未設定原則，則使用者可以選擇是否要使用翻譯功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10182">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10183">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10183">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10184">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10184">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10185">可以建議：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10185">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10186">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10187">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10187">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10188">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10188">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10189">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10189">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10190">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10191">GP 唯一名稱：TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10191">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10192">GP 名稱：啟用翻譯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10192">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10193">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10193">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10194">GP 路徑 (建議)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge - 預設設定 (使用者可以覆寫)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10194">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10195">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10196">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10197">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10197">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10198">路徑 (建議)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10198">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10199">數值名稱：TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10199">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10200">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10200">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10201">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10201">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10202">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10202">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10203">喜好設定機碼名稱：TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10203">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10204">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10204">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10205">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10205">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10206">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10206">URLAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10207">定義受允許的 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10207">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10208">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10208">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10209">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10209">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10210">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10210">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10211">允許存取所列的 URL，做為 URL 封鎖清單的例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10211">Allow access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to the URL block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10212">根據 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 來設定 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10212">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10213">您可以使用此原則來對限制性封鎖清單開放例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10213">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10214">例如，您可以在封鎖清單中包含 '\*' 以封鎖所有要求，然後使用此原則來允許對受限的 URL 清單的存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10214">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10215">您可以使用此原則來開放特定配置、其他網域的子網域、連接埠或特定路徑的例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10215">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10216">最特定的篩選會判斷是否已封鎖或允許某個 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10216">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10217">允許清單優先於封鎖清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10217">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10218">此原則限制在 1000 個項目；後續的項目會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10218">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10219">此原則也可讓瀏覽器自動叫用註冊為通訊協定處理常式的外部應用程序，例如「tel:」或「ssh:」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10219">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10220">如果未設定此原則，則 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 原則的封鎖清單中沒有例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10220">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10221">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10221">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10222">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10222">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10223">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10223">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10224">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10224">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10225">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10225">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10226">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10226">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10227">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10227">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10228">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10228">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10229">GP 唯一名稱：URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10229">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10230">GP 名稱：定義受允許的 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10230">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10231">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10231">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10232">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10232">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10233">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10233">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10234">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10234">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10235">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10235">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10236">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10236">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10237">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10237">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10238">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10238">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10239">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10239">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10240">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10240">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10241">喜好設定機碼名稱：URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10241">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10242">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10242">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10243">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10243">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10244">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10244">URLBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10245">封鎖存取 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10245">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10246">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10246">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10247">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10247">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10248">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10248">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10249">根據 URL 的模式，定義遭封鎖的網站清單 (您的使用者無法載入該清單)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10249">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10250">根據 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 來設定 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10250">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10251">您可以在 [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) 原則中定義例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10251">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10252">這些原則限制在 1000 個項目；後續的項目會被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10252">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10253">請注意，不建議封鎖內部 'edge://\*' URL，這可能會導致意外的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10253">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10254">此原則無法防止頁面透過 JavaScript 動態更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10254">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10255">例如，如果您封鎖 'contoso.com/abc'，則使用者仍可能可以造訪 'contoso.com'，並按一下連結來覽 'contoso.com/abc' (只要不重新整理頁面)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10255">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10256">如果未設定此原則，則不會封鎖任何 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10256">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10257">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10257">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10258">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10258">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10259">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10259">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10260">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10260">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10261">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10261">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10262">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10262">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10263">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10263">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10264">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10264">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10265">GP 唯一名稱：URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10265">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10266">GP 名稱：封鎖存取 URL 清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10266">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10267">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10267">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10268">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10268">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10269">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10269">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10270">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10270">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10271">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10271">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10272">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10272">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10273">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10273">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10274">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10274">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10275">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10275">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10276">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10276">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10277">喜好設定機碼名稱：URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10277">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10278">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10278">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
```
