``` xml
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10279">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10279">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10280">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10280">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10281">啟用使用者代理程式用戶端提示功能 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10281">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-10282">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10282">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10283">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10283">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10284">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10284">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10285">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10285">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10286">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10286">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10287">此原則已遭取代，因為此原則只是一個短期機制，用於讓企業在發現其 Web 內容與使用者代理程式用戶端提示功能不一致時，可以有更多時間來更新其 Web 內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10287">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10288">無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 89 中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10288">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 89.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10289">啟用 [使用者代理程式用戶端提示] 功能時，會傳送提供使用者瀏覽器相關資訊 (例如瀏覽器版本) 和環境 (例如系統架構) 的細微要求標頭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10289">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10290">這是一項累加功能，但新的標頭可能會破壞某些網站，這些網站限制了要求可能包含某些字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10290">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10291">如果您啟用或未設定此原則，則會啟用 [使用者代理程式用戶端提示] 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10291">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10292">如果您停用此原則，則無法使用此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10292">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10293">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10293">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10294">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10294">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10295">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10295">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10296">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10296">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10297">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10297">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10298">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10298">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10299">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10299">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10300">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10300">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10301">GP 唯一名稱：UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10301">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10302">GP 名稱：啟用使用者代理程式用戶端提示功能 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10302">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10303">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10303">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10304">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10304">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10305">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10305">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10306">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10306">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10307">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10307">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10308">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10308">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10309">值名稱：UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10309">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10310">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10310">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10311">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10311">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10312">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10312">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10313">喜好設定機碼名稱：UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10313">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10314">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10314">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10315">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10315">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10316">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10316">UserDataDir</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10317">設定使用者資料目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10317">Set the user data directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10318">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10318">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10319">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10319">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10320">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10320">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10321">設定用來儲存使用者資料的目錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10321">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10322">如果啟用此原則，則 Microsoft Edge 會使用指定的目錄，而無論使用者是否已設定 '--user-data-dir' 命令列旗標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10322">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10323">如果未啟用此原則，則會使用預設的設定檔路徑，但使用者可以使用 '--user-data-dir' 旗標來覆寫它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10323">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10324">使用者可以在 edge://version/ 的「設定檔路徑」底下找到設定檔的目錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10324">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10325">若要避免資料遺失或其他錯誤，請勿將此原則設定為磁碟區的根目錄或用於其他用途的目錄，因為 Microsoft Edge 會管理其內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10325">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10326">如需可使用的變數清單，請參閱[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10326">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10327">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10327">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10328">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10328">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10329">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10329">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10330">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10330">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10331">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10331">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10332">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10332">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10333">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10333">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10334">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10334">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10335">GP 唯一名稱：UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10335">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10336">GP 名稱：設定使用者資料目錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10336">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10337">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10337">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10338">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10338">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10339">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10339">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10340">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10340">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10341">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10341">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10342">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10342">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10343">數值名稱：UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10343">Value Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10344">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10344">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10345">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10345">Example value:</span></span>
```
"${users}/${user_name}/Edge"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10346">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10346">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10347">喜好設定機碼名稱：UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10347">Preference Key Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10348">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10348">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10349">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10349">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10350">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10350">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10351">限制保留的使用者資料快照數量，以便在緊急復原時使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10351">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10352">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10352">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10353">Windows 上，版本 86 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10353">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10354">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10354">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10355">在每個主要版本更新之後，Microsoft Edge 將會建立使用者瀏覽資料的部分內容快照，以便日後需要暫存版本復原的緊急情況。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10355">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10356">如果在使用者有對應快照的版本中執行暫存復原，可還原快照中的資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10356">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10357">這可讓使用者保留如書簽和自動填寫資料等設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10357">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10358">如果您未設定此原則，採用的預設值為 3 個快照。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10358">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10359">如果您設定了此原則，舊版快照將會視需要而被刪除，以遵守您設定的限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10359">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10360">如果您將此原則設為0，則不會拍攝任何快照。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10360">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10361">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10361">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10362">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10362">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10363">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10363">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10364">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10364">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10365">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10365">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10366">整數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10366">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10367">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10367">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10368">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10368">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10369">GP 唯一名稱：UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10369">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10370">GP 唯一名稱：限制保留的使用者資料快照數量，以便在緊急復原時使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10370">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10371">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10371">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10372">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10372">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10373">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10373">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10374">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10374">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10375">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10375">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10376">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10376">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10377">數值名稱：UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10377">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10378">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10378">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10379">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10379">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000003
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10380">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10380">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10381">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10381">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10382">允許使用者意見反應</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10382">Allow user feedback</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10383">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10383">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10384">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10384">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10385">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10385">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10386">Microsoft Edge 使用 Edge 意見反應功能 (預設為啟用)，以允許使用者傳送意見反應、建議或客戶問卷調查，並報告有關瀏覽器的任何問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10386">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10387">此外，使用者預設無法停用 (關閉) Edge 意見反應功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10387">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10388">如果啟用此原則或未設定，則使用者可以叫用 Edge 意見反應。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10388">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10389">如果停用此原則，則使用者無法叫用 Edge 意見反應。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10389">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10390">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10390">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10391">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10391">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10392">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10392">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10393">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10393">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10394">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10394">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10395">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10395">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10396">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10396">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10397">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10397">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10398">GP 唯一名稱：UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10398">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10399">GP 名稱：允許使用者意見反應</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10399">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10400">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10400">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10401">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10401">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10402">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10402">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10403">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10403">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10404">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10404">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10405">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10405">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10406">數值名稱：UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10406">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10407">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10407">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10408">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10408">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10409">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10409">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10410">喜好設定機碼名稱：UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10410">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10411">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10411">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10412">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10412">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10413">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10413">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10414">允許或封鎖視訊擷取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10414">Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10415">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10415">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10416">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10416">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10417">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10417">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10418">控制網站是否可以擷取視訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10418">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10419">如果已啟用或未設定 (預設)，則使用者會被詢問有關所有網站的視訊擷取存取權，在 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 原則清單中已設定 URL 的這些網站除外，這些網站不需提示就會授與存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10419">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10420">如果停用此原則，則不會提示使用者，且視訊擷取僅可供 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 原則中設定的 URL 使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10420">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10421">此原則會影響所有類型的視訊輸入，而不僅僅是內建的相機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10421">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10422">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10422">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10423">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10423">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10424">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10424">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10425">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10425">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10426">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10426">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10427">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10427">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10428">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10428">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10429">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10429">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10430">GP 唯一名稱：VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10430">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10431">GP 名稱：允許或封鎖視訊擷取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10431">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10432">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10432">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10433">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10433">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10434">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10434">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10435">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10435">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10436">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10436">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10437">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10437">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10438">數值名稱：VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10438">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10439">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10439">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10440">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10440">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10441">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10441">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10442">喜好設定機碼名稱：VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10442">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10443">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10443">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10444">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10444">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10445">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10445">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10446">無需要求權限即可存取視訊擷取裝置的網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10446">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10447">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10447">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10448">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10448">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10449">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10449">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10450">根據 URL 模式指定可使用視訊擷取裝置的網站，而不詢問使用者提供權限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10450">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10451">此清單中的模式會對照要求端 URL 的安全性來源進行比對。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10451">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10452">如果符合，則網站會自動獲授與視訊擷取裝置的存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10452">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10453">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10453">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10454">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10454">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10455">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10455">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10456">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10456">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10457">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10457">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10458">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10458">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10459">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10459">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10460">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10460">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10461">GP 唯一名稱：VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10461">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10462">GP 名稱：無需要求權限即可存取視訊擷取裝置的網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10462">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10463">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10463">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10464">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10464">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10465">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10465">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10466">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10466">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10467">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10467">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10468">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10468">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10469">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10469">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10470">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10470">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10471">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10471">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10472">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10472">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10473">喜好設定機碼名稱：VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10473">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10474">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10474">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10475">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10475">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10476">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10476">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10477">設定 WPAD 最佳化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10477">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10478">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10478">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10479">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10479">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10480">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10480">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10481">允許您關閉 Microsoft Edge 中的 WPAD (Web Proxy AutoDiscovery) 最佳化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10481">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10482">如果停用此原則，則會停用 WPAD 最佳化，這會讓瀏覽器等候 DNS 型 WPAD 伺服器較長的時間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10482">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10483">如果啟用或未設定該原則，則會啟用 WPAD 最佳化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10483">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10484">無論此原則是否已啟用或如何啟用，使用者皆無法變更 WPAD 最佳化設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10484">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10485">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10485">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10486">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10486">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10487">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10487">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10488">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10488">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10489">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10489">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10490">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10490">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10491">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10491">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10492">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10492">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10493">GP 唯一名稱：WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10493">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10494">GP 名稱：設定 WPAD 最佳化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10494">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10495">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10495">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10496">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10496">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10497">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10497">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10498">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10498">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10499">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10499">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10500">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10500">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10501">數值名稱：WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10501">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10502">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10502">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10503">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10503">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10504">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10504">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10505">喜好設定機碼名稱：WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10505">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10506">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10506">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10507">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10507">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10508">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10508">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10509">設定強制安裝 Web 應用程式的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10509">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10510">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10510">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10511">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10511">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10512">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10512">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10513">指定以無訊息方式安裝、不需使用者互動且無法由使用者解除安裝或停用的網站清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10513">Specifies a list of websites that are installed silently, without user interaction, and which can't be uninstalled or disabled by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10514">原則中的每個清單項目都是含有下列成員的物件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10514">Each list item of the policy is an object with the following members:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10515">"url"，這是強制項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10515">"url", which is mandatory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10516">"url" 應該是要安裝之 Web 應用程式的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10516">"url" should be the URL of the web app to install.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10517">選用成員的值如下：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10517">Values for the optional members are:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10518">"launch_container" 應該是 "window" 或 "tab"，以指出 Web 應用程式安裝後將如何開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10518">"launch_container" should be either "window" or "tab" to indicate how the Web App will be opened after it's installed.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10519">如果應該在 Windows 上建立桌面捷徑，則 "create_desktop_shortcut" 應為 true。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10519">"create_desktop_shortcut" should be true if a desktop shortcut should be created on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10520">如果省略 "default_launch_container"，則應用程式預設會在索引標籤中開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10520">If "default_launch_container" is omitted, the app will open in a tab by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10521">無論 "default_launch_container" 的值如何，使用者都可以變更應用程式將在其中開啟的容器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10521">Regardless of the value of "default_launch_container", users can change which container the app will open in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10522">如果省略 "create_desktop_shortcuts"，則不會建立任何桌面捷徑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10522">If "create_desktop_shortcuts" is omitted, no desktop shortcuts will be created.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10523">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10523">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10524">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10524">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10525">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10525">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10526">動態原則重新整理：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10526">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10527">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10527">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10528">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10528">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10529">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10529">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10530">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10530">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10531">GP 唯一名稱：WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10531">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10532">GP 名稱：設定強制安裝 Web 應用程式的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10532">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10533">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10533">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10534">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10534">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10535">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10535">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10536">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10536">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10537">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10537">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10538">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10538">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10539">數值名稱：WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10539">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10540">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10540">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10541">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10541">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10542">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10542">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10543">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10543">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10544">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10544">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10545">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10545">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10546">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10546">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10547">在 M84 前，重新啟用 Web 元件 v0 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10547">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  
  
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-10548">已過時：此原則已過時，且無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 84 及之後的版本中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10548">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10549">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10549">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10550">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 至 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10550">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10551">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10551">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10552">此原則無法運作，因為此原則允許您在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 之前，選擇性地重新啟用這些功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10552">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10553">Web 元件 v0 API (Shadow DOM v0、Custom Elements v0 和 HTML Imports) 已在 2018 年過時，且已預設在 Microsoft Edge 版本 M80 中開始停用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10553">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10554">如果將此原則設定為 True，則會為所有網站啟用網頁元件 v0 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10554">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10555">若您將此原則設定為 False 或未設定此原則，從 Microsoft Edge 版本 M80 開始，已預設停用 Web 元件 v0 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10555">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10556">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10556">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10557">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10557">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10558">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10558">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10559">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10559">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10560">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10560">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10561">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10561">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10562">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10562">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10563">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10563">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10564">GP 唯一名稱：WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10564">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10565">GP 名稱：在 M84 前，重新啟用 Web 元件 v0 API (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10565">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10566">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10566">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10567">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10567">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10568">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10568">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10569">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10569">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10570">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10570">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10571">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10571">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10572">數值名稱：WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10572">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10573">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10573">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10574">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10574">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10575">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10575">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10576">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10576">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10577">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10577">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10578">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10578">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10579">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10579">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10580">允許 WebDriver 覆寫不相容原則 (已過時) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10580">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>
  
  
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-10581">已過時：此原則已過時，且無法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 84 及之後的版本中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10581">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10582">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10582">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10583">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 到 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10583">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10584">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10584">Description</span></span>
  
  
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10585">此原則無法運作，因為 WebDriver 目前相容於所有現有原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10585">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10586">此原則會允許讓 WebDriver 功能的使用者覆寫可能干擾其操作的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10586">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10587">目前此原則會停用 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 和 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10587">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10588">如果已啟用此原則，WebDriver 將可以覆寫不相容的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10588">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10589">如果停用或未設定原則，則將不允許 WebDriver 覆寫不相容的原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10589">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10590">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10590">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10591">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10591">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10592">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10592">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10593">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10593">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10594">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10594">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10595">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10595">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10596">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10596">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10597">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10597">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10598">GP 唯一名稱：WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10598">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10599">GP 名稱：允許 WebDriver 覆寫不相容原則 (已過時)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10599">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10600">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10600">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10601">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10601">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10602">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10602">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10603">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10603">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10604">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10604">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10605">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10605">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10606">數值名稱：WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10606">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10607">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10607">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10608">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10608">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10609">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10609">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10610">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10610">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10611">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10611">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10612">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10612">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10613">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10613">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10614">管理由 WebRTC 暴露的本機 IP 位址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10614">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10615">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10615">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10616">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 80 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10616">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10617">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10617">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10618">指定應該由 WebRTC 公開本機 IP 位址的來源 (URL) 或主機名稱模式 (例如 "*contoso.com*") 的清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10618">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10619">如果啟用此原則，並設定來源 (URL) 或主機名稱模式清單，當 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns 為啟用時，WebRTC 會在符合清單中模式的情況下公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10619">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10620">如果停用或未設定此原則，且 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns 為已啟用，則 WebRTC 將不會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10620">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10621">本機 IP 位址會使用 mDNS 主機名稱隱藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10621">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10622">如果啟用、停用或未設定此原則，且 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns 為已停用，則 WebRTC 將會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10622">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10623">請注意，此原則會使得系統管理員可能需要的本機 IP 位址的保護變弱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10623">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10624">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10624">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10625">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10625">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10626">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10626">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10627">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10627">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10628">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10628">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10629">字串清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10629">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10630">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10630">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10631">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10631">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10632">GP 唯一名稱：WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10632">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10633">GP 名稱：管理由 WebRTC 暴露的本機 IP 位址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10633">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10634">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10634">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10635">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10635">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10636">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10636">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10637">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10637">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10638">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10638">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10639">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10639">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10640">數值名稱：1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10640">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10641">數值類型：REG_SZ 的清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10641">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10642">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10642">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10643">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10643">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10644">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10644">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10645">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10645">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10646">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10646">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10647">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10647">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10648">限制由 WebRTC 暴露的本機 IP 位址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10648">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10649">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10649">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10650">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10650">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10651">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10651">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10652">允許您設定 WebRTC 是否公開使用者的本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10652">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10653">如果將此原則設定為「AllowAllInterfaces」或 「AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces」，則 WebRTC 會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10653">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10654">如果將此原則設定為「AllowPublicInterfaceOnly」或「DisableNonProxiedUdp」，則 WebRTC 不會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10654">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10655">如果未設定此原則，或如果停用此原則，則 WebRTC 會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10655">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10656">原則選項對應：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10656">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10657">AllowAllInterfaces (預設) = 允許所有介面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10657">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10658">這會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10658">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10659">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = 允許透過 HTTP 預設路由的公用和私人介面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10659">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10660">這會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10660">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10661">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = 允許透過 HTTP 預設路由的公用介面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10661">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10662">這不會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10662">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10663">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = 除非 Proxy 伺服器支援 UDP，否則使用 TCP。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10663">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10664">這不會公開本機 IP 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10664">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10665">設定此原則時，請使用上述資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10665">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10666">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10666">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10667">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10667">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10668">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10668">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10669">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10669">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10670">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10670">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10671">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10671">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10672">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10672">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10673">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10673">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10674">GP 唯一名稱：WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10674">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10675">GP 名稱：限制由 WebRTC 暴露的本機 IP 位址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10675">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10676">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10676">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10677">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10677">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10678">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10678">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10679">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10679">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10680">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10680">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10681">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10681">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10682">數值名稱：WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10682">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10683">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10683">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10684">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10684">Example value:</span></span>
```
"default"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10685">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10685">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10686">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10686">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10687">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10687">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10688">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10688">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10689">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10689">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10690">限制 WebRTC 所使用的本機 UDP 連接埠範圍</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10690">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10691">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10691">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10692">Windows 和 macOS 上，版本 77 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10692">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10693">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10693">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10694">將 WebRTC 所使用的 UDP 連接埠範圍限制在指定的連接埠間隔 (包括端點)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10694">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10695">透過設定此原則，您可以指定 WebRTC 可以使用的本機 UDP 連接埠範圍。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10695">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10696">如果未設定此原則，或將它設定為空白字串或無效的連接埠範圍，則 WebRTC 可以使用任何可用的本機 UDP 連接埠。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10696">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10697">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10697">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10698">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10698">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10699">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10699">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10700">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10700">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10701">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10701">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10702">字串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10702">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10703">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10703">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10704">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10704">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10705">GP 唯一名稱：WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10705">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10706">GP 名稱：限制 WebRTC 所使用的本機 UDP 連接埠範圍</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10706">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10707">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10707">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10708">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10708">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10709">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10709">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10710">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10710">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10711">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10711">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
