  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10712">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10712">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10713">數值名稱：WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10713">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10714">值類型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10714">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10715">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10715">Example value:</span></span>
```
"10000-11999"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10716">Mac 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10716">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10717">喜好設定機碼名稱：WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10717">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10718">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10718">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10719">回到頁首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10719">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10720">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10720">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10721">使用 Windows proxy 解析程式 (已過時) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10721">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="bead8-10722">已過時：此原則已過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10722">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10723">目前支援，但將在未來版本中過時。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10723">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10724">支援的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10724">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10725">Windows 上，版本 84 或更新版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10725">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10726">說明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10726">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10727">此原則已過時，因為未來版本中會有類似的功能將之取代，請參閱 https://crbug.com/1032820。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10727">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10728">使用 Windows 解析所有瀏覽器網路的 proxy，而不是 Microsoft Edge 內建的 proxy 解析程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10728">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10729">Windows proxy 解析程式可以啟用 Windows proxy 功能如 DirectAccess/NRPT。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10729">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10730">此原則所帶來的問題如述 https://crbug.com/644030。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10730">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10731">這會導致 Windows 代碼取得 PAC 檔案並執行之，包括透過 [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 原則設定的 PAC 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10731">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10732">由於 PAC 檔案的網路擷取是經由 Windows 而不是由 Microsoft Edge 代碼，因此像是 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 的網路原則不適用於 PAC 檔案的網路擷取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10732">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10733">如果您啟用此原則，系統就會使用 Windows proxy 解析程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10733">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bead8-10734">如果您停用或未設定此原則，系統將會使用 Microsoft Edge proxy 解析程式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10734">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10735">支援的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10735">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10736">可強制執行：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10736">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10737">可以建議：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10737">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10738">動態原則重新整理：否 - 需要重新啟動瀏覽器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10738">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10739">Data Type:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10739">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10740">布林值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10740">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10741">Windows 資訊和設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10741">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10742">群組原則 (ADMX) 資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10742">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10743">GP 唯一名稱：WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10743">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10744">GP 名稱：使用 Windows proxy 解析程式 (已過時) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10744">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10745">GP 路徑 (強制)：系統管理範本/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10745">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10746">GP 路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10746">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10747">GP ADMX 檔案名稱：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10747">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10748">Windows 登錄設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10748">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10749">路徑 (強制)：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10749">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10750">路徑 (建議)：不適用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10750">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10751">數值名稱：WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10751">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10752">值類型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10752">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="bead8-10753">範例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bead8-10753">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```
